Mukuutu bangaanga-nzaambi wateleme na baba kintwaari na nde, kabu dya Basaduki, baluula mu musoki,
bo bakaanga bantumu na baba soko mu boroko dya bobanso.
Kasi mbasi Mfumu wadzibula myeelu mya boroko mu butsuku, wabapalisa na wabaleele ti:
Yendeenu, bu lutelemini, yikiseenu baatu munsa Nzo-nzaambi, maampu momanso ma kidziingu kimaki.
Bu bayuka, bo bakoto mu minkyeelu mya bwiisi mu Nzo-nzaambi na bayikisa.
Mukuutu bangaanga-nzaambi bu katubuka, nde na baatu ba nde watumisa kikuutu kya Bayudayo, na mfuundu baala ba Isaheli, baheeke baatu ku boroko mu kweebaholo.
Bu batubuka, bisari bahele kubamono mu boroko; bu babvutuka, bayala mampolo
baleele ti: "Beetu tumwiinyee boroko dyakaangu mu bunkete bwobunso, bakebi bateleme ha myeelu, ngo bu tudziburi, twahele kumono muutu ti mosi munsa-kati."
Bu bayuka maampu mamo, mukuutu Nzo-nzaambi na bakuutu ba bangaanga-nzaambi, makwa ma bawa, na basaka mu kuyaaba mambangukulu ma mamo.
Muutu mosi wayisa kubaleele ti: "Mono, baatu balwasokiri mu boroko, bateleme mu Nzo-nzaambi na bari mu kuyikisa baatu.
Haho mukuutu Nzo-nzaambi wayende na bisari mu kubaholo, kari mu makwa ko, bukuri baba bata ti baatu bakwiisa kubadzusila mu matari.
Bu babanata, babatelemese ha busu bwa kikuutu. Mukuutu bangaanga-nzaambi wabafuula,
wabaleele ti: "Beetu twaludikiri mu kuyikisa mu nkuumbu Yesu, na monee, beenu lumwaaluulusa Yerusalemi mu nyikusulu dza beenu, na beenu lutiiri kutetekele makila ma muutu wunde ha yulu beetu."
Petelo na bantumu babvutula ti: "Diri dyayelemene mu kutumuma kuri Nzaambi, nkani ka kuri baatu ko.
Nzaambi ya bataayi beetu yafulukisi Yesu wulwadzusiri beenu mu myooko myeenu, lwamumanikini ha muti.
Nzaambi, wamudzaangisiri mu koko kwaandi kwa lubakala, mu kuba Mfumu na Mubvuukisi, [mpisi] kaha kuri Isaheli nyiingulu madyeele na mpemusunu masumu.
Beetu turi bambaangi ba myominso mimyo, na Nzaambi waha Mpeeve Yangisi kuri babo batumumaa kuri nde."
Baatu bu bayuku mimyo, babaka nkesi, na basaka kudzusa bantumu.
Mosi, mu Bafarisi, nkuumbu yaandi Ngamalyele, muyikisi mangisi, wabvumina kuri baatu bobanso, bu kateleme ha kakati dya kikuutu, waloombo kuri ti bapalisa bantumu mpisi bayukusina,
nde waleele kuri bambaasi ti: "Baatu ba Isaheli, kebee kweenu mu baatu bamaba, na mu ma lutiiri kuyirika mu bo.
Tekesele biluumbu bi, kwapala Teda, waba kweleele ti nde muutu wa lukiinsu, baatu balaka bamunama, kampe nkama na dza baatu. Bamudzusa na baba ha lumbisa lwa nde batsamukina, musamu wunde wadzima.
Ha mambisa ma wunde, kwateleme Yuda wa ku Ngalili, mu biluumbu bya ntaangulu baatu. Nde wawukumuna baatu, na wafwa, na bobanso baba kwemunamana, batsamukusu.
Ngo mu lumalu, me nyileele kuri beenu ti: sasikee kweenu na baatu ba, na bahemesee; bukuri mbuti dyaambu di bunu pe kisalu ki kya baatu, lo sa kyafwa;
ngo mbuti dya Nzaambi, lo beenu lubangusina kubatsyamikisa ko. Yaa lusaka kunwaanisa Nzaambi ko!" Bo bamywiila.
Bu batumusa bantumu, babalata nkwaasulu, na babasika mu kuhele kudzoonsolo mu nkuumbu Yesu, na babapatula.
Hango bantumu bayende kwaaku mu kiminu ha busu bwa kikuutu, bukuri bamonikini ti bo bayelemene kubama mu ntoono nkuumbu.
Mpisi kiluumbu, mu Nzo-nzaambi na ku nzo, bo baba bahele kuhoto mu kuyikisa na mu kuyaabisa Musamu Wamubwete wa Kiristo Yesu.
Mu biluumbu bibyo, bayiki baba beki balaka. Mvungutulu ya Bahelene mu Bahebeleho yayukukuna, bukuri bakyeetu babo bafwiiri balumi baba banyaafunu mu nkabukulu byandya, ya kiluumbu ngo kiluumbu.
Bo kuumi na boolo, bateele mpuumbu bayiki, baleele ti: "Bwahele kuyelemene ti beetu tubwoongolo maampu ma Nzaambi mu kisalu kya kabula byandya.
Saakeenu bampaangi nsaamu, ha kakati dya beenu, bari na kimbaangi kyakibwete, baluula mu Mpeeve na mu madyeele, batuheenee kisalu kikyo.
Beetu ngo bari, tunamitina mu lusaambulu na mu kisalu kya kuyikisa.

Mpuumbu yoyinso yamono kiminu mu musamu wunde. Bo basoolo Estefano, muutu waluula mu kanyi, na mu Mpeeve Yangisi, basoolo Filipo, Porokoro, Nikanoro, Timoni, Paremena na Nikolayo munsaambiri wa ku Antyoke.
Tumi ha babasoongo kuri bantumu, bu basaambila, babatetekele myooko.
Maampu ma Nzaambi maba kwetsamikinana kwalaka, na lutaangu lwa bayiki lwaba kwefununa kwalaka ku Yerusalemi, na mpuumbu bisari bya mu Nzo-nzaambi yatumuma mu kanyi.
Estefano waba waluula mu bweese na mu mpinu, waba kweyirika bimaangu na bidiimbu byabinene, ha kakati dya baatu.
Ngo kwateleme mwaa-ndaambu baatu ba nzo-nkutukunu, yi bakooteela ti ya baatu bakuuluka, bari ku Kirene, bari Alekanderi, bari Kilikya, na bari Asya basa nkalikisi na Estefano.
Bo baba bahele na makwa ma kutungukila madyeele na mpeeve byamonoko mu nzoonsulu Estefano.
Bo baha mboongo kuri baatu, mpisi baleele ti beetu twayukiri, nde wusa nzoonsulu dza nsaanunu mu Moose na mu Nzaambi.
Bo basinda baatu, bakulu ba babakala na batini ba mangisi; bu batubuka, bakwaata Estefano na bamunata ku kikuutu.
Bo batelemese bambaangi bampya mu kuleele ti: "Muutu wumawu wahele kuhoto kwedzoonsolo bwabubi mu Kibeendu kyangisi [ki] na mu Mangisi.
Beetu twamuyukiri wukweleele ti, Yesu wa ku Nadzareti sa katsyaamuna Kibeendu kyangisi ki, na sa kayiinga bifu bya tusisikila Moose.
Bobanso baba badzakala ha kikuutu bamusungumina kisoosi, na bamono kidziri kyaandi bunu kidziri kya mbasi.
Mukuutu bangaanga-nzaambi wamufuula ti: "Buri mamo mari mangwanwa?"
Estefano wabvutula: "Bampaangi na bataayi, yukeenu. Nzaambi ya nkeembu wamonikini kuri Abalaami, taayi dyeetu bu kaba ku Mesopotamya tekesele kadzakala ku Karana.
Nzaambi waleele kuri nde ti: "Pala mu nsi yaaku, [kunsa] kaanda dyaaku, na yende ku nsi yiyo yi nyikusoongo me."
Haho nde wapala mu nsi ya bari Bakaledayo, watuunga ku Karana. Tumi ha mambisa ma lufwa lwa taayi dyaandi, bamunata mu nsi yi, yi luri lwa dzakala mu lumalu.
Nzaambi wahele kumuha saala ti dimosi, ti kibeendu kya kusuusa lutaambi; ngo wataasila kumuha nsi yimayi, kuri yiba saala kuri babutuka mu nde. Mu ntaangu yiyo Abalaami waba wakiri mwaana pe.
Nzaambi wadzoonso bumabu: "Bilesi bya ye sa byadzakala mu nsi ya bunzeense, sa baba bankutu na sa babakwaamisa mu nkama na dza bibvu.
Nzaambi wabweese kuleele ti, me sa nyatsuundisa kaanda didyo dyabasiiri mu bunkutu. Ha mambisa haho, bo sa basaambila me, ha kibeendu kimaki.

Nzaambi wamuha lulelusunu mu nteendulu bubakala; na ha keki butaana Isaki, na nde wamuteende bubakala mu kiluumbu kyampoomo, na Isaki wasa bwobumosi kuri Yakobe, na Yakobe kuri bankaaka bo kuumi na boolo.

Bankaaka babakila Yosefi musoki, na bamuyarika ku Ngipiti. Ngo Nzaambi waba na nde, 
ACT.7.10	nde wamukuula mu manyoongi maandi momanso, na wamuha bweese na madyeele ha busu bya Falaho, mbyaasi ya ku Ngipiti, wamusuusa mfumu mu Ngipiti na [mu] nzo yaandi yoyinso. 
ACT.7.11	Nzala yayisa mu Ngipiti yoyinso, na ku Kanana. Manyoongi maba malaka, na bataayi ba beetu baba bahele kubaka byandya. 
ACT.7.12	Yakobe bu kayuka ti ku Ngipiti kuri byandya, nde waheeke bataayi ba beetu mbala yatete, 
ACT.7.13	mu mbala yadzoolo, Yosefi wayabakana kuri bampaangi baandi, na kitsuumbu [kya] Yosefi, kyayabakana kuri Falaho. 
ACT.7.14	Yosefi watumisa Yakobe taayi dyaandi na kaanda dyodinso, baatu makuumi nsaamu na bataanu. 
ACT.7.15	Yakobe wayende ku Ngipiti na wafwiila kukwo na bataayi ba beetu. 
ACT.7.16	Bo banata biyisi bya bo ku Sikeme, na babidziika mu mampeembe, ma basuumba Abalaami mu mboongo, kuri baala ba Emoro ku Sikeme.
ACT.7.17	Ntaangu ya lulelusunu ya sooriri Nzaambi, kuri Abalaami bu yakokosolo, kaanda dyabutuna na dyafununa ku Ngipiti,
natee kwayookiri mbyaasi yikimi [ku Ngipiti], yiri yahele kuyaaba Yosefi.
Mbyaasi yiyo yawuna kitsuumbu kya beetu, na wakwaamisa bataayi [ba beetu] mu kudzusa baala batsoombo.
Mu ntaangu yiyo Moose kabutuka, nde waba wabweeye kuri Nzaambi. Mangoondo matatu nde kari kasa mu nzo taayi,
bu bamuyekele, mwaana Falaho wa mukyeetu, wamuholo na wamubukusa bunu mwaana waandi.
Moose wayika [kunsa] madyeele momanso ma bari Ngipiti, nde waba na mpinu mu maampu, na mu biyiriki byaandi.
Bu kakukisa mibvu makuumi mana, nde wabaka kitsimi mu kweemono bampaangi baandi, baala ba Isaheli.
Bu kamono bari mu kukwaamisa mpaangi mosi, nde wamukala na wabvutula kitete, na wadzusa wa ku Ngipiti.
Nde watsima ti kampe bampaangi ba nde, sa babakula ti Nzaambi wubakuula mu kooko kwaandi, kasi bo basii bakula ko.
Kiluumbu kikimi, nde wamono bampaangi baandi bari mu kunwaana. Nde wasaka bwa kusa nyukusunu ha kakati dya bo, waleele ti: "Baatu ba, beenu ti bampaangi luri, nki luri mu kwebakana beenu na beenu?"
Kasi wunde wabakwaamisa mbaasi wamusindikila na waleele ti: "Na wa kusiiri mukuutu na mularimi ha yulu beetu?
Buri ye tiiri kudzusa me se, bu wadzusiri wa ku Ngipiti dzoono?"
Moose, kayukaa maampu mamo, wayitika ku nsi ya Madyani, wadzakala ku nsi yiyo, na kukwo wabuta baala boolo.

Mibvu makuumi mana bu myakuka, mbasi yamumonokono mu mulaka mbaawu, mu bvuunda dya miti, ku nsi yankatu ku mulaandu wa Sinayi. 
ACT.7.31	Moose bu kamono, wakimuka mu mamono-miisu, nde wakokosolo mu kukyeese kwakubwe, ngo mbeembu Mfumu yaleele ti: 
ACT.7.32	Me ngo Nzaambi bataayi baaku, Nzaambi ya Abalaami, na Isaki Na Yakobe". Moose wabwiilila kinkuuku, wakoono kukyeese.
Mfumu wamuleele ti: "Yisila masapaatu mu miilu myaaku, bukuri kibeendu ki wuri wateleme kikyo kiri kyangisi.
Me nyamwiini bu bari mu kukwaamisa kaanda dyaami mu Ngipiti; na me nyayukiri nkuumunu yaaku. Na me nsundukiri mu kubakuula; na mu lumalu yende, me nyikuheekiri ku Ngipiti."
Moose wunde wu batunini na wu baba leele ti: "Na wa kusiiri mukuutu na mularimi?" Wunde Nzaambi [se] kari kaheeke bunu mukuutu na mupalisi, mu lubakusu lwa mbasi, yamumonokono mu bvuunda dya miti.
Moose wabapalisa, mu nyirikulu bidiimbu mu nsi ya Ngipiti, ha Mubu Wabeenge na mu nsi yankatu mu makuumi mana ma bibvu.
Wumawu ngo Moose waba leele kuri baala ba Isaheli ti: "Nzaambi sa katelemese, ha kakati dya bampaangi ba beenu, mubikiri wuba bunu me.

Mu ntaangu yaba yakutukuna baatu ku nsi yankatu, nde waba wateleme mu kuyuka myaba leelaana mbasi ku yulu mulaandu, na kutubula kuri bataayi beetu. Nde wataamburi maampu ma mwooyo, mu kuha kuri beenu.
Ngo bataayi ba beetu basii tya kutumuma kuri nde ko, bamutekiri mbisa na batalisiri bitsimi bya bo ku nsi ya Ngipiti.
Bo baleele kuri Aaloni ti: "Yirikila beetu banzaambi bakweyende ha busu bweetu; bukuri Moose wapalisiri beetu ku nsi ya Ngipiti, twahele kuyaaba ma kabwanikinyee na mo."
Na bo batsula mwaana ngoombo mu biluumbu bibyo, badzusa kibulu mu kikabu kuri kiteki kikyo, na bamono kiminu mu biyiriki bya myooko myaaku.
Nzaambi wabatekele mbisa na wabayekele, mpisi basaambila bambwetete ba yulu, bunu bu diri dyatinu mu mukaanda babikiri:

Nzo ya Isaheli, buri kari kuri me
ACT.7.42	beenu luri luha bikabu, na bibulu bya kudzusa
ACT.7.42	mu mibvu makuumi mana ku nsi yankatu ko?
ACT.7.43	Beenu lwaneti musaampu Moloko
ACT.7.43	na mbwetete ya nzaambi [yeenu] Layifana,
ACT.7.43	biteki bibyo beenu luri lwayirika, na luri lwasaambila.
ACT.7.43	Mu ntoono yiyo me sa nyalunata ku bunkutu ku Babiloni.

Bataayi ba beetu baba na musaampu wa kimbaangi ku nsi yankatu, bunu bwa batuma Nzaambi kuri Moose, mu kuyirika musaampu mu kifwaani bunu bu kamwiini. 
ACT.7.45	Bataayi beetu, ha mambisa ma kumutaambula, bakotiso nde mu lutumu lwa Yoswa mu mansi, ma baheeri Nzaambi, ha mambisa ma kubinga makaanda, natee mu biluumbu bya Davidi. 
ACT.7.46	Nde wabakiri bweese ha busu bwa Nzaambi, Na waloombo miswa mya kutuunga nzo yangisi kuri bilesi bya Yakobe. 
ACT.7.47	Ngo Solomo wamutuungila nzo. 
ACT.7.48	Ngo Mwa-yulu ka koodzakala mu manzo matuunguma mu myooko mya baatu ko, bunu buleele mubikiri ti:
ACT.7.49	Yulu ngo mboloko yaami,
na butoto ngo nkata-miilu yaami.
Nkya nzo beenu lutuungila me, bu leele Mfumu;
bunu pe, nkya kibeendu kya mpuumunu beenu luyirikila me?
Buri kari myooko mya me myayirika byobinso bibyo ko?"
Beenu baatu luri bangaa-tungu, luri na mitima na makutu makaangu, beenu lutungukilaa Mpeeve Yangisi mu mantaangu momanso, bunu bwaba bataayi beenu!
Nkya mubikiri wuri bataayi beenu bahele kukwaamisa? Bo badzusiri batekisiri kudzoonsolo mu nyisulu wasuunguma, mu lumalu mu wunde beenu lwakitukiri bayariki na badzusi.
Beenu lwataamburi mangisi kuri bambasi, ngo lwahele kumakebe."
Bu bayuka mamo, babaka mankesi munsa mitima mya bo, na bamukweetele miinu.
Estefano, bu kaluula mu Mpeeve Yangisi, watala ku yulu, wamono nkeembu Nzaambi, na wamono se Yesu wateleme ha lubakala lwa Nzaambi,
waleele ti: "Mono, me nyiri mu kumono mayulu mari mwaasi, na Mwaana muutu wateleme ha lubakala lwa Nzaambi.
Bu bafula misaakulu mu mbeembu yamakwa, baduka makutu ma bo, na mu mutima mosi, bo babwa mu nyutu Estefano.
Bo bamutuba ku mbisa bula, na bamudzusila mu matari. Bambaangi basuusaa biyuungu bya bo ha miilu mya kituuti kimosi, nkuumbu yaandi Sawulo.
Bo badzusa Estefano mu matari. Estefano wasaambila waleele ti: "Mfumu Yesu! Taambula kiluunsi kyaami."
Bu katsukuma, wafula musaakulu mu mbeembu yayinene ti: "Mfumu, yaa bataangula sumu dimadi ko." Bu kaleele mamo, Nde wabwa tolo.
Sawulo wamono ti bwabubwe bu badzusa Estefano.
Mu kiluumbu kikyo, kwabwa nkwamusunu dzadzinene mu dibuundu dya Yerusalemi. Bobanso batsyamikina mu mansi ma Yudaya na ma Samariya; ha yulu bani bantumu bari basii yitika ko.
Baatu bari na kinzaambi kyangwanwa badziika Estefano na bamudila mu ngebe dzalaka.
Sawulo waba kwetsaamuna dibuundu; nde waba kwekoto mu nzo-nzo, waba kwepalisa mu makwa babakala na bakyeetu, na kubasoko mu boroko.
Bobanso baba tsyamikisi bayaabisa Musamu Wamubwete mu baba kweyendaana.
Filipo wasunduka ku bvula [dimosi] dya mu nkoonsi ya Samariya, mu kuyaabisa Kiristo kuri baatu.
Mu mutima mosi, mampuumbu ma baatu maba makaangama mu nyikusulu dza Filipo, mu kuyuka na kumono bidiimbu bi kaba kwesa.
Mukwongo, mampeeve mamabi maba mu baatu balaka mapala, kuri makwefula misaakulu myaminene. Balaka babobo binamu na babeele miilu batsiinikini.
Kiminu kyalaka kyamonikini munsa bvula didyo.

Mubakala mosi, nkuumbu yaandi Simoni watekisiri kuba ha bulu bubwo, waba kwesalilaana bungaanga, na baatu bari Samariya baba pamukaana mu mi kaba kweyirikaana. Nde-meene waba kwetsimaana ti nde muutu wamunene.
Bobanso, kuholosono bakuutu natee bilesi, baba bakaangama mu nde, na baba kweleelaa ti: "Muutu wumawu ngo mpinu dza Nzaambi, dzi bateelaa ti "Dzadzinene"."
Bo baba bakaangama mu nde, mu ntoono yiri ti, kuholosono na kidzika, mu mukisi waandi, nde waba kwebapamunaana.
Mu ntaangu yi basiiri bo kanyi mu Filipo wayaabisiri Musamu Wamubwete, wa Kimfumu kya Nzaambi, na wa nkuumbu ya Yesu Kiristo, babakala na bakyeetu bataambula mbotokulu
Simoni nde-meene se wasa kanyi na wataambula mbotokulu. Nde wakaangama na Filipo na wapamuka, bu kaba kwemonaana bidiimbu na bimaangu byabinene byaba kweyirimaana.
Bantumu basiiri ku Yerusalemi, bu bayuka ti bari Samariya bataambirye maampu ma Nzaambi, baheeke Petelo na Yowane kuri bo.
Bu basunduka, basaambila mu bo mpisi bataambula Mpeeve Yangisi.
Mukwongo, Mpeeve Yangisi yaba yakiri kubwa pe ti mu mosi mu bo, kunu kubotoko baba bamwaabotoko mu nkuumbu Mfumu Yesu.
Hanaho, ba Petelo na Yowane babatetekele myooko, na bataambula Mpeeve Yangisi.
Simoni bu kamono ti, Mpeeve bayiha mu ntetukulu myooko mya bantumu, wabaha mboongo,
waleele ti: "Heenee me se lutumu lulwo, mpisi kuri wunde wunyitetekele me se myooko, kataambula Mpeeve Yangisi."
Petelo waleele kuri nde ti: "Mboongo dzaaku kintwaari na ye fuukeenu, bukuri ye kutsima ti kikabu kya Nzaambi kusuumba mu mboongo!
Ye wahele na ndaambu, wahele se na kikuuku mu maampu mamama, bukuri mutima ye wahele kusuunguma ha busu bwa Nzaambi;
Hango yiinga madyeele mu bubi bwaaku, na saambila Mfumu, kampe bakuhemisini bitsimi bya mutima waaku.
Me nyimono ti ye wuri na lubelu na bubayi."
Simoni wabvutula waleele ti: "Beenu-meene saambikilee me kuri Mfumu, mpisi mpele kubwilikila dyaambu ti dimosi, mu ma luleeriri beenu."
Hango bo, bu bata kimbaangi na kuyaabisa maampu ma Mfumu, babvutuka ku Yerusalemi. Bo bayaabisa Musamu Wamubwete mu mabula malaka ma ku Samariya.
Mbasi Mfumu yadzoonso kuri Filipo, waleele ti: "Teleme na holo nzila ya ku sude, yisunduka ku Yerusalemi natee ku Ngadza, nzila yiyo yahele na baatu."
Bu kateleme wayende. Na mono, muutu mosi wampokoro wa ku Etyopi, kisari kyakinene kya Kandake, mukebi busina bwa mbyaasi ya mukyeetu ya ku Etyopi, wayensi ku Yerusalemi mu kusaambila.
Nde waba weki mu kubvutuka, na wadzakala munsa kikokolo kyaandi, wukwetaanga mubikiri Esaya.
Mpeeve yaleele kuri Filipo ti: "Kokosolo na bakila kikokolo kikyo.
Bu kadzumuna, Filipo wayuka, nde wuri mu kwetaanga mukaanda wa mubikiri Esaya, waleele ti: "Buri wuri mu kuyuka ma wuri mu kwetaanga?"
Nde waleele ti: "Dyaburi nyiyaabila, mbuti muutu wahele kubaangula kuri me? Na nde wateele Filipo mu kunwaata na wadzakala ha mpele nde.
Maampu ma kaba kwetaanga maba mamama:

Nde waba bunu kimeeme ki bari mu kunata ku kudzusa,
ACT.8.32	na bunu mwaana kimeeme wahele na mbeembu,
ACT.8.32	ha busu bwa wuri mu kumutebe myoosi.
ACT.8.32	Nde wahele kudzibula munwa waandi.
ACT.8.33	Kusa kusaana kubamusaanini,
ACT.8.33	nde kasii baka wumukalila buungu ko.
ACT.8.33	Na wuyaabisa kiseendu kyaandi?
ACT.8.33	Bukuri kidziingu kyaandi basukisiri ha butoto.
Mpokoro muutu bu kadzibula munwa waleele ti: "Leele me, mubikiri mu na kari mu kudzoonsolo? Mu nde-meene hoti mu mukimi?
Filipo wabaandika mu kuyikisa matinu, wayaabisa Musamu wamubwete wa Yesu kuri nde.
Bu baba mu kweyende mu nzila, batubuka hari maampa. Mpokoro muutu waleele ti: "Mono maampa moma, nki bi kakisila ye mu kubotoko me?" [
Nde watelemese kikokolo, Filipo na muutu wampokoro basunduka bo boolo mu maampa, na Filipo wamubotoko.
Bu bantoomboko ku nkoto, Mpeeve ya Mfumu yayisila Filipo; muutu wampokoro kasii bweese kumumono ko. Nde wanamitina nzila yaandi mu kiminu.
Filipo bamumono ku Adzoti, mu kweyikisa Musamu mu mabvula momanso natee watubuka ku Kayisareya.
Sawulo waba kwesilikina kusa bubi na kudzusa bayiki ba Mfumu, nde wakokosolo kuri mukuutu bangaanga-nzaambi,

Nde wamuloombo mikaanda mya kwekoto mu manzo-mankutukunu mari ku bvula dya Damasiko, mu kuri ti, mbuti bweeni bamosi bari mu nzila, baba babakala bunu pe bakyeetu, lo kabankaangana, wubaneti ku Yerusalemi.
Mu ntaangu yi kari mu kweende, wakokosolo na Damasiko, na sisuu, buungi bwafumini ku yulu, bwamudzungukila,
bu kabwa ha nsi, nde wayuka mbeembu yaleele kuri nde ti: "Sawuli, Sawuli, mu nki ye wuri mu kwekwaamisa me?".
Nde wafuula ti: "Ye na, Mfumu?" Wumawu waleele ti: "Wu me Yesu wu wuri mu kwekwaamisa,
ngo kasi teleme na koto kunsa bvula na sa bakuleele mamo ma yelemini ye kusa."
Bambasi baba kintwaari na nde mu budyeengi bateleme, bafwa mapana, bayuka mbeembu, ngo bahele kumono muutu ti mosi.
Sawulo watelemusu ha butoto, miisu myaandi miri mwaasi, ngo wahele kumono ti kyabu; bu bamukwaata mu koko, bakoto ku Damasiko.
Nde wasa biluumbu bitatu kuri wahele kumono, wahele kudya na kunwa.
Ku Damasiko kwaba muyiki mosi, nkuumbu yaandi Ananya. Mfumu, mu mamono-miisu, waleele kuri nde ti: "Ananya". Ananya waleele ti: "Me ndewu Mfumu!"
Mfumu waleele kuri nde ti: "Teleme, yende mu nzila yi bateelaa ya Lubakala, na saka mu nzo Yuda, muutu wa ku Taraso, nkuumbu yaandi Sawulo. Nde wuri mu kusaambila,
na nde wamono [mu mamono-miisu] muutu wuri nkuumbu Ananya; bu kakoto mu nzo, wateteke myooko ha yulu nde mpisi kabweese kumono.
Ananya wabvutula ti: "Mfumu, baatu balaka badzoonsiri me mu muutu wu, nde wayirika mamabi malaka kuri bangisi baaku ku Yerusalemi.
Na hamaha, nde wuri na lutumu lwa bakuutu ba bangaanga-nzaambi mu kukaanga bobanso basaambila nkuumbu yaaku.
Mfumu waleele kuri nde ti: "Yende, bukuri weki kisalulu kya me ki nyiri nyasoolo, mu kunata nkuumbu yaami ha busu bwa makaanda, na se ha busu bwa bambyaasi na baala ba Isaheli;
bukuri, me sa nyamusoongo mamo mayelemini kuri nde, mu kumono mpasi mu nkuumbu yaami."

Ananya wayende na wakoto mu nzo, na bu kamutetekele myooko, waleele ti: "Sawuli mpaangi yaami, Mfumu heekiri me, Yesu wukumonikinye mu nzila yi bee kwiisa, mpisi heki ye bweese kumono, na se ba waluulusu mu Mpeeve."
Hanaho, byaba mu miisu mya nde biri bunu makala byasonoko, na nde wabweese kumono, na bu kateleme wataambula mbotokulu,
bu kadya byandya, wabweese kubaka makwa.
Nde wadzakala ku Damasiko, mu mwaa-biluumbu byantele, kintwaari na bayiki,
na hanaho, nde wayikisa mu manzo ma nkutukunu ti Yesu ngo Mwaana Nzaambi.

Bobanso baba yuka, bakimuka na baleele ti: "Buri kari wumawu ko wabee kwenwaanisa ku Yerusalemi babo babee kwetaanguna nkuumbu Yesu, na hamaha nde kwiisa kari mu kubakaanga na kubanata kuri bakuutu ba bangaanga-nzaambi ko?"
Ngo Sawulo wabaka makwa ha yulu makwa, Na wasukuka Bayudayo baba dzakalaana ku Damasiko, mu kubasoongo ti Yesu ngo Kiristo.
Biluumbu byalaka bu byaluta, Bayudayo bakaanga kitsimi bya kumudzusa;
mfuundu bo, ya mu Sawulo bu yabakana, bakebe myeelu butsuku na mwiini, mpisi bamudzusa;
bayiki bu bayuka, bamusoko mu mpiri, na bamusundula butsuku ku mbisi kibaka.
Bu katubuka ku Yerusalemi, nde watsiitsa kuba na bayiki, na bobanso baba na boomo bwa nde, na baba bahele kusa kanyi ti nde weki muyiki.

Ngo Barnaba bu kamuholo, wamunata kuri bantumu, na Sawulo wabaangula kuri bo, bunu bu kamwiinini Mfumu mu nzila, na bunu bu kadzoonsiri kuri nde, na bunu bu kadzoonsiri, ku Damasiko, mu nsiitu nkuumbu Yesu.
Nde waba kintwaari na bo, mu kotulu na mu mpalulu na bo ku Yerusalemi, wukwe dzoonsolo mu nsiitu mu nkuumbu Mfumu.
Nde waba kwedzoonso, na waba kwesaa se nkalikisi se na Bahelene; ngo bamaba basaka bwa kumudzusa;
Bampaangi bu bayaaba, banata Sawulo ku Kayisareya, na bamubvutula ku Taraso.
Dibuundu dyaba na kidzuunu mu Yudaya dyodinso, mu Ngalili na mu Samariya, dyatuunguma na dyadyaata mu kibvumi kya Mfumu, na mu mboondulu ya Mpeeve Yangisi, dyo dyaba Kwefununaana.
Petelo wayooko mwomunso, na kiluumbu kimosi, wasunduka kuri bangisi badzakala ku Lida.
Nde wamono muutu mosi, nkuumbu yaandi Ayineya, wabwa mambwolokoto, kuholosono mibvu mpoomo, waneŋesene ha mbuka
Petelo waleele kuri nde ti: Ayineya, Yesu Kiristo wu kutsinikisi! Teleme kwaaku na yirika mbuka yaaku. Hanaho nde wateleme.
Bobanso baba ku Lida na baba ku Sarono bamumono, bo bayiingiri madyeele mu Mfumu.
Ku Yope kwaba muyiki mosi wa mukyeetu, nkuumbu yaandi Tabita, mambangukulu "Dorka". Nde waba waluula mu biyiriki byabibwete na waba kwehaanaa lubakusu.
Mu biluumbu bibyo nde wabwa kubeele na wafwa. Bu bamuyooso, basuusa [nde] mu kwarita dya ku yulu.
Lida dyaba bebele na Yope, bayiki bu bayuka ti Petelo waba kukwo, bamuheekele baatu boolo, mu kumuteele: "Yaa dziingila ko, wasa natee kuri beetu."

Petelo bu kateleme, wayisa na bo. Bu katubuka, bamunwaatisa ku kwarita dya ku yulu, bafwiiri bobanso bamumonokono kuri bari mu kudila, na bamusoongo binkuta na biyuungu byaba tuunga Dorka, bu kaba kintwaari na bo.
Petelo bu kapalisa bobanso ku mbasi, nde watsukuma, wasaambila, na bu kasyeeteke kwaba nyutu waleele ti: "Tabita, teleme". Tabita wadzibula miisu, bu ka mono Petelo, nde dzakiri.
Bu kamukwaata mu kooko, Petelo wamutelemese; bu kateele bangisi na bafwiiri, Petelo wasoongo Tabita kuri wuri mwooyo.
Mamo mayabakana mu Yope dyodinso na balaka basa kanyi mu Mfumu.
Petelo wadzakala biluumbu byalaka ku Yope, ku nzo Simoni waba musari mukaanda ngoombo.
Ku Kayisareya, kwaba muutu mosi, nkuumbu yaandi Kornelyo; nde waba mukuutu mukaangu wa nkama bayongolo, yibateele "Italiko".
Nde waba munsaambiri wamakwa, waba se na kibvumi kya Nzaambi, kaanda dyaandi se dyodinso. Nde waba haana lubakusu kwalaka kuri baatu, na waba saambilaana Nzaambi mu ntaangu ngo ntaangu.
Nde wamono mbasi Nzaambi, mu mamono-miisu kwa bu kyensekelee, kampe kyaba kilookolo kyawa kya mwiini. Mbasi Nzaambi yakoto mu nzo yaandi na yamuteele mbila: "Kornelyo".
Nde watala yo kisoosi tumi na boomo bwobunso, nde waleele ti: "Bi nki Mfumu?" Mbasi yaleele ti: "Nsaambulu dzaaku na lubakusu lwaaku bitoombokirye bunu kikabu ha busu bwa Nzaambi.
Na mu lumalu heeke baatu ku Yope na tumisa Simoni wubateelaa Petelo;
Nde wuri ku nzo musari mukaanda ngoombo, wuri mu nzo yiri ku simu dya mubu."
Mbasi yaba dzoonso na nde, bu yabvutuka, nde wateele boolo mu bisari byaandi na muyongolo mosi wakwiikama mu bakaangama na nde,
na bu kabaangula myominso kuri bo, nde wabaheeke ku Yope.
Ha mambisa ma kiluumbu kikyo, bu baba bakiri mu nzila na baba kwekokosolo na bvula, Petelo wanwaata ku yulu nzo mu kusaambila mu kilookolo kyabisaamunu.
Nde wakolo nzala na waba tiiri kudya. Bu bari mu kumulambukila byandya, nde wamono mamono-miisu,
nde wamono yulu dyadzibula na kitotolo kimosi, bunu nsaanda yayinene yaleleke mu manto mo mana, kyasunduka ha butoto,
munsa yo mwaba bibulu bya makaanda, banyoko ba butoto na banoni ba yulu.
Mbeembu mosi yayukukuna kuri nde ti: "Teleme, Petelo, dzusa na dya."
Petelo waleele ti: "Ti bele pe, Mfumu, bukuri me nyadyaanaa ti kimosi kyasumuka na kyamviindu ko."
Mbeembu yayukukuna lwadzoolo kuri nde ti: "Bibyo biri Nzaambi mwaatsyeemese, ye wuri ndeelele ko ti byasumuka."
Bubwo bwamonoko mbala tatu, na hanaho, kitotolo kikyo kyatoombulu ku yulu.
Petelo, mu nde-meene madyeele mamuwa mu mamono-miisu mamo, nki matiiri kuleele; mono baatu baheekiri Kornelyo, bafuulaa nzo Simoni, bateleme ha mweelu,
bateele na basaka kuyaaba, mbuti Simoni wubateelaa Petelo haho kakoodzakalaa.
Petelo, bu kari mu kwetsima mu ntoono ya mamono-miisu, Mpeeve yileeriri kuri [nde] ti: "Mono, baatu batatu basaka ye.
Ngo, teleme, sunduka na yende na bo kwahele maketi-keti, bukuri me nyibaheekirye.
Petelo bu kasunduka, waleele kuri baatu babo ti: "Me ngo muutu wunde wu luri mu kwesaka. Nkya ntoono yilutweesi kuri?"

Bo baleele «Kornelyo wuri mukuutu nkama bayongolo, muutu wasuunguma na wuri na kibvumi kya Nzaambi, kaanda dyodinso dya Bayudayo bamuteelaa kimbaangi kyakibwete, mbasi yangisi yimulubiryee mu kutumisa ye ku nzo yaandi, na kuyuka maampu ma ye.»
Petelo wabakotoso mu nzo, na nde wabadzakasa. Ha mambisa ma kiluumbu kikyo, bu kateleme, wayende na bo, kintwaari na bampaangi ba ku Yope.
Ha mambisa ma kiluumbu kikyo, nde wakoto ku Kayisareya. Kornelyo waba bakiingilaana, wateele kaanda dyaandi, na banduku baandi ba mutima.
Petelo bu kaba mu kukoto mu nzo, Kornelyo wayende mu kumubwaana, wabwa ha miilu mya Petelo, wamutsukumina.
Petelo wamutelemese na wamuleele ti: "Teleme, me se muutu nyiri"
Bu kadzoonso na nde, wakoto mu nzo, na wamono baatu balaka bakutukina.

Nde waleele kuri bo ti: "Beenu luyaari ti diri dyadiku kuri Muyudayo mu kukaangama bunu pe mu kukokosolo na wunde wahele Muyudayo; ngo kasi Nzaambi soongiri me ti yaa ndeele kuri muutu ko ti wasumuka bunu pe wuri mviindu.
Mu bubwo me nyiisiri kwahele kukalikisa, na ntiiri kuyaaba mu nki ntoono beenu lutumusinyee me?"
Kornelyo waleele ti: "Kuholosono kiluumbu kyabina ki natee kilookolo ki kyawa, lo me nyiri mu lusaambulu mu nzo yaami, na mono muutu mosi wateleme ha busu bwa me mu binkuta biseme,
nde ti: "Kornelyo, lusaambulu lwa ye luyukukini mu yulu, Na Nzaambi babukiri mwooyo mu bikabu bi koohaanaa ye kuri bawelu.
Heeke baatu ku Yope mpisi tumisa Simoni wubateelaa Petelo. Nde wadzakala ku nzo Simoni musari mukaanda ngoombo wuri ku simu dya mubu.
Hanaho me mpeekiri baatu kuri ye, na ye yirikiri bwabubwe bu wiisiri. Mu lumalu beetu bobanso turi ha busu bwa Nzaambi mu kuyuka momanso ma kusikiryee Mfumu mu kudzoonso."
Petelo bu kadzibula munwa waleele ti: "Mu ngwanwa me mbakiri ti Nzaambi wahele na nsobokoso mu baatu,
ngo mu mpisi kaanda, wunde wumubvumina na wusalila nsungumunu, lo wabweeye kuri nde.
Nde waheeke maampu maandi kuri baala ba Isaheli, mu kuyaabisa Musamu Wamubwete wa kiyeengi mu Yesu Kiristo, nde wuri Mfumu ya bobanso.
Beenu luyaari maampu mayirimini mu Yudaya dyodinso, kubaandika ku Ngalili ha mambisa ma mbotokulu ya yaabisiri Yowane.

Dyaburi Nzaambi kalwiikirye Yesu wa ku Nadzareti Mpeeve Yangisi na mu mpinu. Nde wabee kwelutaana mu kweyirika mamabwe na kwetsinikisa bobanso babeeri kunsa nkwamusunu dza dyabulu, bukuri Nzaambi wabeeri na nde.
Na beetu turi bambaangi mu myominso mi kayirika mu nkoonsi ya Bayudayo na [ku] Yerusalemi. Nde bamudzusiri mu kumumanika ha muti.
Ngo Nzaambi wamufulukisa [mu] kiluumbu kyabitatu na wamuha miswa mu kwemonokono,
ngo kari kuri baatu bobanso ko, ngo kasi kuri beetu, bambaangi bari Nzaambi watekisiri kusoolo, beetu twadiiri na twanwiini kintwaari na nde, ha mambisa ma mfulukulu yaandi mu bafwa;
Nde watutuma mu kuyaabisa kuri kaanda na kutswiikisa ti Nzaambi nde kari kasa mutsuundisi bafwa na bamwooyo.
Babikiri bobanso bateele nde kimbaangi, mpisi wusa kanyi mu nde, sa kataambula mpemisi ya masumu mu nkuumbu yaandi."
Petelo bu kaba wakiri mu kudzoonso, Mpeeve Yangisi yabwa ha yulu bobanso babayuka maampu.
Bayudayo basaa kanyi mu nteendulu bubakala bayisiri na Petelo bapamuka, Bukuri kikabu kya Mpeeve Yangisi se kyabwa ha yulu bangooyi.
Bo bayuka baba dzoonso mu mandiinga mahele kuyabakana, na badumusa Nzaambi. Haho Petelo kabangula mbeembu ti:
Buri lo bakabikisi muutu kubotoko mu maampa, mu babo bamwaataambula Mpeeve Yangisi bunu beetu?
Nde wabaha miswa mu kutaambula mbotokulu mu nkuumbu Yesu Kiristo. Haho, bamuloombo mu kudzakala mwaa biluumbu na bo.
Bantumu na bampaangi bari ku Yudaya bayuka ti bangooyi se bataamburi maampu ma Nzaambi.
Ha toombokiri Petelo ku Yerusalemi, bateende bubakala bakalikisa na nde
baleele ti: "Ye wakotiri mu manzo ma baatu bahele kuteende bubakala na wadiiri kintwaari na bo!"
Haho Petelo, bu kabaandika, wabasoongo bunu bwa yookiri misamu, waleele ti:

Me nyaba ku bvula dya Yope, kunsa lusaambulu. Na nyabaka mamono-miisu, kitotolo kimosi kyasunduka, bunu nsaanda yayinene, yikwe sunduka mu manto mo mana, yatsingisa mu yulu, yatubuka natee ha nyaba me. 
ACT.11.6	Bu nyaba tala, me nyamono bibulu bya miilu mina bya ha butoto, bya ku bitiiti, banyoko na banoni ba mayulu. 
ACT.11.7	Me nyayuka mbeembu yaleele kuri me ti: Teleme, Petelo, dzusa na dya.
Ngo me nyaleele ti: "Ka buba ko! Mfumu, bukuri kyasumuka bunu pe kyabviimfuka ti kimosi kyakotiri mu munwa me ko.
Mbeembu, mu lwadzoolo, yayukukuna mu yulu ti: "Bi tsyeemisini Nzaambi, ye yaa hololo byo ti byasumuka
Mimyo myamonoko mbala tatu, na byobinso ha byeki kweendaa ku yulu.
Hanaho baatu batatu bantelemini ku nzo ku twaba; bari Kayisareya babaheekiri kuri me.
Mpeeve yaleele kuri me ti, me nyeende kintwaari na bo, kwahele kusa maket-keti Bampaangi basaamunu, biisiri na me ha, bakoto mu nzo muutu wunde.
Nde watuyaabisa bunu bu kamwiini mbasi yateleme munsa dzo yaandi na yaleele ti: "Heeke baatu ku Yope, na tumisa Simoni wu bateelaa ti Petelo,
nde wukuleele maampu, mu mo ye wubvuuka, ye na nzo yaaku yoyinso.
Me bu nyabaandika mu kudzoonso, Mpeeve Yangisi yabwa ha yulu bo, bunu bu yabwiiriri beetu kunu mbandukulu.
Me nyibaambuka mwooyo mu maampu ma Mfumu, bunu bu kaba leele: "Yowane wabotokiri mu maampa, ngo beenu sa lwaba lwabotoko mu Mpeeve Yangisi
Ngo mbuti Nzaambi heeri kuri bo kikabu kyokimosi na beetu twasa kanyi mu Mfumu Yesu Kiristo, lo buri me nyaketi kubangisina kuhaakula Nzaambi?
Bo bu bayuka mamo, bawura na badumisa Nzaambi, baleele ti: "Na kuri bangooyi se Nzaambi heeri nyiingulu madyeele ma kidziingu.
Hango babo babatsyamikisa mu nwanusunu yanata lufwa lwa Estefano, bayookolo natee ku Foyiniki, ku Kiporo, na ku Antyoke, kwahele kuyikisa maampu kuri muutu, mbuti ka kunu ku Bayudayo.
Bunu bamosi mu bo, baba bari Kiporo na bari Kirene, bayisiri ku Antyoke bayikisa kuri Bahelene mu nyabusulu Musamu Wamubwete wu Mfumu Yesu.
Kooko kwa Mfumu kwaba na bo, na lutaangu lwa baatu balaka basiiri kanyi na basyeetukiri kuri Mfumu.
Musamu wayukukuna mu makutu ma badibuundu bari ku Yerusalemi. Bo baheeke Barnaba mu kuyookolo kukwo natee ku Antyoke.
Nde bu katubuka, wamoono bweese bwa Nzaambi, wakeembe na wasyaamisa bobanso mu mutima mosi, mu kukaangama mu Mfumu,
bukuri nde waba muutu wamubwete, waluula mu Mpeeve Yangisi na mu kanyi. Na mpuumbu yalaka yabweeseme kuri Mfumu.
Barnaba wayende ku Taraso mu kwesaka Sawulo,
na bu kamumono, nde wamunata ku Antyoke. Bo balutisa mubvu wamutsiina, mu kukutukunaa mu dibuundu, na mu kuyikisa mpuumbu yalaka. Ku Antyoke, mbala yatete bateele bayiki ti bakiristo.
Mu biluumbu bibyo babikiri basunduka ku Yerusalemi mu kweende ku Antyoke.
Angabo, mosi mu bo, bu kateleme, wayaabisa mu Mpeeve ti, sa kwaba nzala yayinene mu nsi yoyinso, na yamonoko mu ntaangu ya Kolodyo.
Bayiki bakaanga kitsimi, kya kuheeke, bunu buri lubaku lwa muutu-muutu, lubakusu kuri bampaangi badzakala ku nsi ya Yudaya.
Bubwo se basiiri, baheeke lubakusu kuri bakulu ba babakala mu myooko mya Barnaba bo na Sawulo.
Mu ntaangu yiyo, mbyaasi Erode wakwaata bamosi mu bari mu dibuundu, mu kubakwaamisa.
Nde wadzusa Yakobo, mpaangi Yowane, mu mbeesi yayila.
Bu kamono ti mimyo myaba myamibwe kuri Bayudayo, nde wakaanga kitsimi mu kusa Petelo mu boroko. Byaba biluumbu bya munkeembu wa mampa mahele lufunusu.
Nde wamukwaata na wamusoko mu boroko, na wamukebese kuri mampuumbu mana, ma bayongolo bana-bana, watya ti ha mambisa ma munkeembu wa Paaka, nde kamutsuundisa ha busu baatu.
Petelo waba mu boroko, ngo dibuundu dyasaambila Nzaambi mu makwa mu ntoono nde.
Erode watya kutsuundisa Petelo. Mu butsuku bubwo, Petelo wabwa tolo ha kakati dya bayongolo boolo, bamukaanga mu bikonyi bya biseengu; ha mweelu boroko basuusiri bakebi boolo.
Mono, mbasi Mfumu yamonokono na buungi bwaluulusa nzo. Bu kamulata mu lubaansi, wasiimbila Petelo na wamuleele ti: "Teleme mu mawasu", na bikonyi byasonoko mu myooko myaandi.
Mbasi yamuleele ti: "Lwaata musweele waaku, na masaapatu maaku, nde wasa bubwo; mbasi yabweese kuleele kuri nde ti: "Teeteke kiyuungu kyaaku na nama me."
Petelo bu kapala, wamunama wahele kuyaaba ti mari mu kweyirika mbasi mangwanwa; nde waba kutsima ti mamono-miisu kari mu kumono.

Bu bataba kihekiri kyatete na kyabyoolo kya bakebi, batubuka ha mweelu wa biseengu wa kweende kunsa bvula. Mweelu nde-meene dzibumini mu bo, bu bapala, banamitina kweende mu nzila yomosi, na hanaho, mbasi yasasika na Petelo.
Petelo bu kabvutuka mu nde-meene, waleele ti: "Mu lumalu, me nyaari mu ngwanwa ti Mfumu heekirye mbasi yaandi, mu kutaandala me mu myooko mya Erode, na mu bubi bu bee bwataasila baatu ba Bayudayo."
Bu kamana kubakula, nde wayende ku nzo Mariya, nguri Yowane, Yowane wuri nkuumbu se Malako, kwaba kwa kutukuna baatu balaka na ku baba saambilaana.
Bu kakomboto ha mweelu, kisari kya mukyeetu kiri nkuumbu Lode, kyakokosolo mu kuywiila,
nde wayaabula ti yiyo mbeembu Petelo; mu kiminu, nde wahele kudzibula mweelu, wabvutuka munsa nzo, mu kweyaabisa ti wukombotiri Petelo.
Bo baleele kuri nde ti: "Ye wa lawuka." Nde wasika ti ngwanwa nde. Bo baleele ti: "Ngo lo mbasi yaandi."
Petelo wanamitina mu kukomboto. Bu badzibula, bamumono na bapamuka.
Nde wabawurisa mu naangukunu kooko, nde wayaabisa [kuri bo], dyaburi Mfumu kamupalisiri mu boroko, na waleele ti: "Yaabisee kuri Yakobo na bampaangi mamama. Bu kapala, wayende ku kibeendu kikimi.
Bwiisi bu bwakya, kisaangila kyabwa ha kakati dya bayongolo, bakwefulusina ti: "Bee Petelo, na keki.
Erode waloombo ti bamunatina Petelo, ngo bahele kumumono. Bafuula bakebi na waha lutumu mpisi baba dzusa. Bu kasunduka ku Yudaya, wayende ku Kayisareya na wadzakala kukwo.

Erode waba na nkesi dzamakwa mu baatu ba ku Tiro na bari ku Sidoni. Mu nyukusunu mosi, bo baba haho ha busu bwa nde. Bu bayukusa Balasto, kisari kya mbyaasi mu mitariri kihekiri kya tolo, baloombo kiyeengi, bukuri mansi ma bo maba taambulaa byalaka mu nsi Erode.
Mu kiluumbu kya nyukusunu, Erode waba walwaata binkuta bya bumbyaasi [na] wadzakala ha yulu kibala kya mutsuundu, wuri mu kubadzoonsolo.
Baatu babikisa ti: "Mbeembu yiyo mbeembu Nzaambi nkani ka ya muutu ko!"
Hanaho mbasi Mfumu yamulata, bukuri nde kasii ha nkeembu kuri Nzaambi ko; na mitaka bu myamudya, nde wafwa.
Hango maampu ma Nzaambi maba kweyukuna kwalaka na kwefununa.
Barnaba bo na Sawulo haba bvutuka ku Yerusalemi, bamana kusa kisalu, ha banata Yowane wu bateelaana ti Malako.

Mu dibuundu dyaba ku Antyoke, kwaba babikiri na bayikisi: Barnaba, Simehoni wu baba teelaana ti Ningere, Lukyo wa ku Kirene, Manahene wunde wabuukiri ha kimosi na Erode mfumu mankoonsi mana, na Sawulo.
Bu baba mu kusaambila Mfumu, na baba bakoto loomi, Mpeeve Yangisi yabaleele bumabu ti: "Nsuusuleenu ha luteke Barnaba na Sawulo mu ntoono kisalu ki nyabateeriri mbila.
Haho, bu bakoto loomi, bo ba saambila na babatetekele myooko, na ha babasindika.
Mpeeve Yangisi bu kabasindika, bo basunduka ku Selekeya, haho bayende ku nsi ya Kiporo.
Bu batubuka ku Salami, bo bayaabisa maampu ma Nzaambi munsa manzo ma nkutukunu ma Bayudayo. Yowane waba na bo bunu mubakisi.
Bu bataba kibuma kyokinso natee ku Pafo, bo bamono Muyudayo mosi ngaa-mpaanu, mubikiri wampya nkuumbu yaandi Baryesu.
Nde waba kintwaari na ngoforo Serengyo Pawulo, muutu wa madyeele. Nde watumisa Barnaba na Sawulo mu nzala kuyuka kwa ngwanwa maampu ma Nzaambi.
Elima ngaa-mpaanu, bubwo babangulaa nkuumbu yaandi, wasaka kuwumuna ngoforo yiyo la na kanyi.
Hango Sawulo wu bateelaana ti Pawulo, waluula mu Mpeeve Yangisi, wamupana kisoosi
waleele ti: "Ho ye waluula mu mawunu na mu kwiibi, mwaana dyabulu, mutaatu nsungumunu, buri ye wuhoto ko mu kwetengemese ma nzila [ma] Mfumu masuunguma?
Na mono, mu lumalu, koko kwa Mfumu kweki ha yulu ye, na ye sa fwa miisu, wubweese kumono ntaangu ko mu mwaa-kilookolo. Na hanaho mubuungi na mampimbisi mamubwiila, wadyeengele na wasaka bamunata.
Hango ngoforo, bu kamwiini myayirimini, wasa kanyi mu nyikusulu dza Mfumu.
Bu bayende ku Pafo, Pawulo na banduku baandi batubuka ku Perenge, dya ku Pamfilya, Yowane bu kabasisa, wabvutuka ku Yerusalemi
Basisaa Perenge, batubuka ku Antyoke dya ku Pisidya. Bu bakoto munsa nzo ya nkutukunu, mu kiluumbu kya mpuumunu ha badzakala.
Ha mambisa ma ntaangulu mangisi na babikiri, bamfumu ba nzo-nkutukunu baleele kuri bo ti: "Bampaangi, mbuti luri na dyaambu dya mboondulu dya kudzoonsolo kuri baatu, lo dzoonsee kweenu."
Pawulo, bu kateleme na bu kanaanguna koko, waleele ti: "Baatu ba Isaheli na beenu lubvuminaa Nzaambi, yukeenu!
Nzaambi ya kaanda dya Isaheli wasooriri ba taayi beetu, na wafunisa kaanda didyo, mu ntaangu yi badzakala ku nsi ya Ngipiti; na mu kwa dya kooko kwaandi, nde wabapalisa mu yo,
na wabakuunda mu mibvu kampe makuumi mana mu nsi yankatu.
Bu katsyaamuna makaanda nsaamu ma mu nsi ya Kanana, nde wabaha nsi bo yiyo bunu saala.
Kampe mu nkama na makuumi mataanu ma mibvu.
Ha mambisa haho, nde wabaha balarimi natee mu mubikiri Samweli.
Kuholosono haho, bo baloombo mbyaasi, na Nzaambi wabaha Sawuli, mwaana Kise, muutu wa mu kaanda dya Benyamini, wadzakiri mu mibvu makuumi mana,

bu kamuyekele, watelemese Davidi, mbyaasi kuri bo, kuri nde kari kaleele mu kimbaangi ki kari kata ti: "Me ndzuukiryee Davidi, mwaana Yesayi, muutu wuri bunu bu ntiiri mu mutima waami, wuyirika momanso ma ntiiri.
Mu kaanda dya nde, bunu buri nsiilulu dzaandi, Nzaambi kari kapalisa Mubvuukisi Isaheli, Yesu.
Yowane wayaabisa, tekesele nyisulu yaandi, mbotokulu ya nyiingula madyeele, kuri kaanda dyodinso dya Isaheli.

Yowane bu kaba mu kumana kisalu kyaandi, waleele ti: "Beenu na lutsimini ti me nyiri". Pele me nyiri nde ko! Ngo mono kukwiisa muutu ku mambisa ma me, wunde wuri, me nyahele kukuka mu kunyanguna misiinga mya masaapatu ma nde.
Bampaangi baami, baala ba kitsuubu kya Abalaami, na babo bari ha kakati dya beenu babvumunaa Nzaambi, kuri beetu bari baheeke maampu ma mvuukulu.
Bari ku Yerusalemi na bamfumu ba bo, bamudziimbiri, na bahele kubakula maampu ma babikiri, ma bataangaa mu mpisi kiluumbu kya mpuumunu, ngo bakukisa mo, mu kumudzeengele mukanu wa lufwa.
Mu kumono, bahele kumubakila kibila mu kumudzeengele mukanu wa lufwa, baloombo kuri Pilato mu kumudzusa.
Bu bakukisa momanso maba tinini mu nde, bamusundula ha muti, na bamusuusa mu mukala.
Kasi Nzaambi wamufulukisa mu bafwa.
Nde wamonoko mu biluumbu byalaka kuri babo batoombikiri na nde kuholosono Ngalili natee ku Yerusalemi, na babo bari mu lumalu bambaangi baandi kuri baatu.
Na beetu turi mu kuluyaabisa Musamu Wamubwete, na lusiilulu lu kasa kuri bataayi beetu,
luri Nzaambi walukukisiri mu baala [ba bo] beetu, mu kufulukisa Yesu, bunu bu diri dyatinu mu mukuunga wa myoolo ti:

Ye ngo Mwaana me,
ACT.13.33	bwalolo me nyi kubutiri.
Nzaambi wamufulukisi mu bafwa, mu kuri ti nde kahele kubvutuka ku mbolulu, bu kari kaleele:

Me sa nyaluha byangisi
ACT.13.34	bi nyatambukiri Davidi.
Hango nkuumbu, nde wabweese kutswiikisa mu matinu makaka ti:
Ye ka wutala ko ti waaku wangisi kamono mbolulu.
Davidi ha mambisa ma kusalila mya tiri Nzaambi, mu ntaangu yaandi, nde wafwa na bamusuusa ha pele bataayi baandi, na nde wamono mbolulu.
Kasi mu wumawu, Nzaambi wamufulukisa na wahele kumono mbolulu.
Hango di diba dyayabakana kuri beenu, bampaangi baami, mu nde bayaabisiri beenu mpemusunu masumu [na] na momanso ma lwaheriri kubangisina kusa mu mangisi ma Moose, mu kuba lwalulukusu,
Mu nde, mpisi musi kanyi lo sa kaba walulukusu.
Hango, kebeenu kweenu, ma leele babikiri yaa malutubukila ko:

Taleenu beenu bangaa-nsanunu,
ACT.13.41	pamukeenu na dziimbileenu!
ACT.13.41	Bukuri me sa nyakukisa kisalu mu biluumbu bya beenu,
ACT.13.41	kisalu kiri beenu lusiila kyo kanyi ko, mbuti muutu wuluyaabisiri kyo!
Bu bapala, babaloombo mu kubweese kwiisa kubvutuka, mu biluumbu bya mpuumunu bikimi, mu kubweese kuyikisa munu mu musamu wunde.
Buundu bu dyatsyamikina, Bayudayo balaka na minsaambiri mya Nzaambi bo, banama Pawulo na Barnaba. Bamaba badzoonso na bo, babayukusa mu kukaangama mu bweese bwa Nzaambi.
Kiluumbu kya mpuumunu kyanama, kampe bvula dyodinso dyakutukuna mu kuyuka maampu ma Mfumu.
Bayudayo, bu bamono mampuumbu ma baatu, baluula mu musoki, basaana na ba beke kunwaanisa ma leele Pawulo.

Kasi Pawulo na Barnaba bu baba baluula mu nsiitu baleele ti: "Kuri beenu baketyee kuyikiseeti maampu ma Nzaambi; ngo mu bukuri beenu luri mu kulooso mo, na lumono mu beenu-meene ti lwahele kukuka mu kidziingu kya mantaangu momanso; mono beetu tusyeetukiri kuri bangooyi.
Bukuri Mfumu watutumini:

Me nyakusuusa mu kuba buungi bwa mansi,
ACT.13.47	na mu kunata mvuukulu
ACT.13.47	natee ku nsukulu butoto.
Bangooyi bu bayuka bubwo, bamono kiminu, badumusa maampu ma Mfumu, na bobanso ba bataasiri kidziingu kya mantaangu momanso, basa kanyi.
Maampu ma Mfumu matsamukusu mu nsi yoyinso.
Kasi Bayudayo basinda minsaambiri mya bakyeetu balukiinsu na bamfumu ba bvula, mu kutsuba nwanusunu mu Pawulo bo na Barnaba, na bababinga natee ku mandilu mabvula.
Bamaba bakubula fufunda dya bitaambi bya bo, na bayende ku Ikonyo.
Bayiki baba baluula mu kiminu na mu Mpeeve Yangisi.
Bwayirima bumosi ku Ikonyo, Pawulo na Barnaba bakoto mu nzo-nkutukunu ya Bayudayo, na bo badzoonso mu kiteesu kiri mpuumbu yayinene ya Bayudayo na ya Bahelene basa kanyi.
Ngo kasi Bayudayo, bari basii sa kanyi ko, basinda bangooyi mu kusa bubi kuri bampaangi
Hango, bo balutisa mwaa-ntaangu yalaka, badzoonsolo mu nsiitu mu Mfumu, wata kimbaangi mu maampu ma bweese bwaandi, na wa baha mpinu mu kuyirika bidiimbu na bimaangu mu myooko mya bo.
Mpuumbu ya bvula yakabuma mu bibari byoolo; bamosi baba mu kibari kya Bayudayo, bakaka mu kya bantumu.
Bukuri kwamonoko kutya kuri bangooyi na kuri Bayudayo kintwaari na bamfumu ba bo, mu kubakwaamisa na mu kubadzusila mu matari,
bo bu bayaaba, bayitika ku mabvula ma Likahonya, Listara, Derbe na mari loonde didyo.
Kukwo bo bayikisa Musamu Wamubwete.
Ku Listara, kwaba muutu mosi waba wabobo miilu, wabeeriri miilu bu kaba wakiri mu mwooyo nguri; nde kaba kweyendaa ko.
Nde wayuka Pawulo mu kunzoonso. Pawulo bu kamutala na bu kamono ti waba na kanyi mu kuba wabvuukusu,
waleele mu mbeembu yamakwa ti: "Teleme kwaaku kuri wasuunguma mu miilu mya ye-meene." Nde wadumuka na wadyaata.
Mampuumbu ma baatu bu bamono ma yirikiri Pawulo, badzaangisa mambeembu ma bo, baleele mu ndiinga ya ku Likahonya ti: "Banzaambi bakitikiri baatu na basundukiri kuri beetu,"
bo bateele Barnaba mu nkuumbu Dzese na Pawulo Ereme, bukuri Pawulo ngo waba mutuburi misamu.
Ngaanga-nzaambi Dzese waba munsa bvula, waholo balumi ba bangoombo ba bayende kweleleke bifulu, na wasuusa ha myeelu mya bvula, kintwaari na mampuumbu, mu kudzusa mu kikabu.
Bantumu bu bayuka, Barnaba na Pawulo bakaakala binkuta, babingikila kuri mpuumbu, bafula misaakulu

na baleele ti: "Bampaangi, buri lusa mya bu mi? Beetu se turi na bitsimi byobimosi na beenu, beetu turi baatu bunu beenu; Musamu Wamubwete wutuluyaabisiri, ngo mu kubwoongolo myahele mufunu mi, mu kusyeeteke kuri Nzaambi ya mwooyo, wayirika yulu, butoto, mubu na byobinso biri mu byo;
nde Nde wuri mu biseendu byaluta, waha miswa kuri makaanda momanso, mu kunama manzila ma bo-meene.
Ngo ti hayuku bubwo, mani mamabwe nde ka kooluyirikilaa: ku yulu, wuluhaa bvula, mantaangu ma bikunu bibuta, na wululuulusaa mu byandya na kiminu mu mitima myeenu."
Bu kaleele mamo, bamono mpasi mu kukabikisa mampuumbu, mu kuri ti bahele kubayokolo bikabu.
Bayudayo bafumini ku Antyoke na ku Ikonyo bu bayisa, bu basinda mampuumbu ma baatu, na bu balata Pawulo mu matari, bo bamukoko ku mbasi bvula, bu batsima ti kampe wafwa.
Bayiki baandi bu bamudyengekele, nde wateleme, na wakoto ku bvula. Bu bwakya, wapala bo na Barnaba mu kweende ku Derbe.
Bu bamana kuyikisa Musamu Wamubwe kunsa bvula dimadi, na kusa bayiki balaka, bo babvutuka ku Listara, ku Ikonyo na ku Antyoke,
bo bakumisa mitima mya bayiki, babasyaamisa mu kunamitina mu kanyi, na kubaleele ti mu nwanusunu dza makwa, tukotoleenu mu Kimfumu kya Nzaambi.
Mu mpisi dibuundu, bo basoolo bakulu ba babakala, babasaambikila, na bakoto loomi, bayekele bo kuri Mfumu mu wunde wubari basa kanyi.
Bu bataba Pisidya, bayisa ku Pamfilya,
bu bayikisa maampu ku Perenge, bo basunduka ku Atalya.
Bayisikaa haho, bakoto bwaatu mu kweende ku Antyoke, kukwo ku bataamburi bweese bwa Nzaambi, mu kisalu ki bakukisiri.
Bu batubuka, bakutukisa dibuundu, bayaabisa momanso ma yirikiri Nzaambi kintwaari na bo, mu kudzibukila bangooyi mweelu wa kanyi.
Bo balutisa mwaa-mantaangu malaka kukwo kintwaari na bantumu.
Bamosi banangukini ku nsi ya Yudaya, bayikisa kuri bampaangi ti: «Mbuti beenu lwahele kuteende bubakala, bunu buri kifu kya Moose, lo beenu lubvuuka ko.»

Yumu na nkalikisi dza makwa byabwa ha kakati dya bayisiri babo na Pawulo, wuri waba kibari kimosi na Barnaba. Bakaanga kitsimi kiri ti Pawulo, Barnaba na bamosi bayisiri, batoomboko ku Yerusalemi, kuri bantumu na bakulu ba babakala, mu mitariri nkalikisi dzidzo.
Dibuundu dyabaheeke, bataba Foyiniki na Samariya, kuri bakweyaabisa bunu bwayiingiri bangooyi madyeele, na bampaangi bobanso bamono kiminu kyalaka.
Bu batubuka ku Yerusalemi, dibuundu, bantumu na bakulu ba babakala bababwaana, baleele momanso mari mu kweyirika Nzaambi mu bo.
Bamosi bari mu kabu dya ba Bafarisi basii kanyi bateleme, baleele ti: "Buri bwayelemene ti bateende bubakala, mu kukebe mangisi ma Moose."
Bantumu na bakulu ba babakala bakutukina mu kumono dyaambu didyo.

Nkalikisi dzadzinene dzabwa, Petelo wateleme, waleele: "Bampaangi baami, beenu luyaari ti, kuholosono mantaangu mamakulu, Nzaambi wasooriri me ha kakati dya beenu, mpisi heki bangooyi bayuka, mu munwa me, maampu ma Musamu Wamubwe na basa kanyi.
Na Nzaambi wu yaari mitima mya baatu, wubateeriri kimbaangi, mu kubaha Mpeeve Yangisi, bunu bu kaheeri beetu,
na wahele kusa nsobokoso ha kakati dya bo na beetu, bukuri mu kanyi, Nzaambi katsyeemisinyee mitima mya bo.
Hango mu lumalu, buri lutiiri kusindukila Nzaambi, mu kukolokoso kihaangu mu mankiingu ma bayiki, kiri, ti bataayi beetu, ti beetu-meene twasii baka makwa ma kukinata ko?
Ngo mu bweese bwa Mfumu Yesu, turi na kanyi ti sa batubvuukisa mu nzelu yomosi na bo."
Mpuumbu yoyinso yawura, yiyuka Barnaba na Pawulo bari mu kuyaabisa momanso mari mu kweyirika Nzaambi, bidiimbu na bimaangu ha kakati dya bangooyi mu kisalu kya bo.
Ha mambisa ma kuhura kwa bo, Yakobo wabvutula, waleele ti: «Bampaangi baami, ywiilee me!
Simehoni baanguri dyaburi Nzaambi katekisiri kumonoko mu kusolo ha kakati dya bangooyi baatu mu nkuumbu yaandi.
Na mimyo mya kwelesene na maampu ma babikiri bunu bu di dyatinu ti:

Ha mambisa ma mimyo, me sa nyabvutuka,
ACT.15.16	sa nyabweese kutuunga musaampu Davidi wabee wabwa,
ACT.15.16	sa nyabweese kutuunga bibaka bya nde byakosoko
ACT.15.16	na sa nyabweese kumutelemese;
ACT.15.17	mpisi heki baatu basaala babo basaka Mfumu,
ACT.15.17	na makaanda momanso ma bari bataangukuna
ACT.15.17	nkuumbu yaami masa bwobumosi,
ACT.15.17	buleele Mfumu, muyiriki bitotolo bibyo
ACT.15.18	byayabakana kuholosono mantaangu mahele
ACT.15.18	mbandukulu na manunu.»
Hango nkuumbu, «me nsimini ti kubamisa pe bangooyi bamwaayiinga madyeele mu kwiisa kuri Nzaambi.
Kasi batinineenu mu mukaanda ti yaa besumuka mu biteki ko, yaa besa buyala ko, yaa bedya toongo twa bibulu byadzusa mu tsukusulu muwuumunu, na bedya makila ko.
Bukuri kuholosono mu biseendu byabikulu, Moose wuri na bayikisaa mangisi maandi mu mpisi bvula, mu manzo ma nkutukunu mu mpisi kiluumbu kya mpuumunu bakoomataangaa.»

Mukwongo, bantumu na bakuutu bayukusina na dibuundu dyodinso, mu kusoolo baatu munsa bo na mu kubaheeke ku Antyoke, kintwaari na Pawulo na Barnaba na Yuda wu bakotelaa ti Barsaba na Sila baatu balukiinsu ha kakati dya bampaangi.
Bo batina mu mukaanda mu myooko mya bo-meene ti: "Bantumu na bakuutu bampaangi beenu, kuri bampaangi bari kunsa bangooyi ku Antyoke, ku Sirya na ku Kilikya mboto yeenu!
Bu twayukiri ti babamosi mu beetu bu bayisiri kuri beenu, kuri twahele kubaha ntumunu, balubamisini mu miheebulu,
beetu twamwiini ti bwayelemene mu kusoolo baatu ba kuheeke ha kimosi na bampaangi beetu ba mutima Barnaba na Pawulo;
baatu babo baha kidziingu kyaaku mu kuumbu ya Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo.
Mu bubwo beetu twaheekiri Yuda bo na Sila, bakwiisa kululeele ha munwa musamu wunu wunde.
Hango Mpeeve Yangisi na beetu-meene se twatsimini ti yaa tulukwiikisa bilemu bikimi ko, ha yulu bini biri mufunu.

Beenu biseenu toongo twa bibulu byadzusulu mu kikabu kuri biteki, makila, na toongo twa bibulu byadzusu mu nsukusulu muwuumunu, na buyala; mbuti lukebiri manyutu meenu mu mimyo, lo bubwo bwabubwe lusa. Mamboto menu!
Babatumisini bayisikaa haho, ha basunduka ku Antyoke, bo bakutukusaa baatu ha baheeri mukaanda wunde.
Bu bataanga mukaanda, bamono kiminu mu nsyamusunu dzidzo.
Yuda na Sila, bu baba bo-meene babikiri, bo basyaamisa bampaangi na babakumisa mu dzoonsolo dzalaka.
Mwaa-ntaangu bu yaluta, bampaangi bababvutula mu kidzuunu kuri babo baba heekiri. [
Pawulo bo na Barnaba badzakala ku Antyoke, ku baba kweyikisaa na kweyaabisaa Musamu Wamubwete wa Mfumu kintwaari na bambaasi bakimi balaka.
Mwaa-mantaangu bu maluta, Pawulo waleele kuri Barnaba ti: Tubvutuka mu kwemono bampaangi mu mpisi bvula di twayaabisiri maampu ma Mfumu, mpisi tuyaaba kari buri bari basiila.
Ngo Barnaba waba na nzala kunata se Yowane, wu bakootelaa Malako.
Kasi Pawulo waba wahele kutya kubweese kuholo muutu wunde wabayekiri ku Pamfilya, na wuri kasii kuba kintwaari na bo mu kisalu ko.
Hango nkalikisi bu dzabvulula, bo bahambikisa bo na bo. Barnaba waholo Malako na nde na wayende ku Kiporo.
Pawulo waholo Sila na wayende, bampaangi bamanaana kubaloombolo bweese bwa Mfumu.
Nde walutila ku Sirya na ku Kilikya mu kwesyaamisa mabuundu.
Ha mambisa haho, Pawulo watubuka ku Derbe, tumi ku Listara. Kukwo kwaba muyiki mosi, nkuumbu Timoteho, mwaana mukyeetu wa Muyudayo wuri na kanyi, ngo kasi taayi waba Muhelene.
Bampaangi ba ku Listara na ba ku Ikonyo baba tanaa kimbaangi kyakibweete mu nde.
Pawulo waba tiiri kweende na nde. Bu kamuholo, wa muteende bubakala, mu ntoono Bayudayo baba mu loondolo didyo; bukuri bobanso baba bayaari ti taayi dya nde Muhelene kaba.
Mu mabvula ma baba kwelutaana, bo baba kweyikisaana mu kukebe mangisi ma heeri bantumu na bakulu ba babakala bari ku Yerusalemi.
Mabuundu maba kwesyaama mu kanyi na kwefununa mu lutaangu lwa baatu mpisi kiluumbu.
Mpeeve Yangisi bu kabadika kuyaabisa musamu ku Asya, bo bataba nkoonsi ya Firingya na ya Ngalatya.
Bu batubuka bebele na Misya, bo basaka kukoto ku Bitinya ngo kasi Mpeeve Yesu ya bisiri kubaha miswa.
Bu batabaa Misya, bo basuunduka ku Torowasi.
Ngo mu butsuku, Pawulo wabaka mamono-miisu: muutu mosi wa ku Makedonya waba wateleme na waba muyiingikila, na kumuleele ti: "Wasa ku Makedonya, wutubakisa."
Hanaho, bu kamono mamo, beetu twasaka mu kweende ku Makedonya, mu nsiitu ti Nzaambi wututeeriri mu kunata Musamu Wamubwete kuri bo se.
Bu twaholo bwaatu ha Torowasi, twasuunguma na soongo-soongo ku Samotarake, na mu kiluumbu kyanama twayende ku Neyapoli.
Bu twayisika haho, twayende ku Filipo, bvula dyatete dya nkoonsi ya Makedonya, kimvuka kya bari Loma. Beetu twalutisa mwaa-biluumbu ha bvula didyo.

Mu kiluumbu kya mpuumunu, beetu twapala ku mbasi, mu kukweende ku simu dya muwiilu maampa, kukwo twaba tsima ti kuri kibeendu kya lusaambulu. Beetu twadzakala kukwo na twadzoonso kuri bakyeetu baba bakutukini haho.

Ngo mukyeetu mosi, nkuumbu Lidya, waba tuywiilaana, nde waba muyariki mansaanda mamabwe mabeenge, waba ku bvula dya Tyatira, nde waba bvuminaa Nzaambi. Mfumu wa dzibula mutima nde, kuri nde kangamini mu mimyo mya ba dzoonsaana Pawulo.

Bamanaa kumubotoko, nde na kaanda dyaandi, ha katuyiingukila, na waleele ti: "mbuti beenu lumono ti me nyiri na kanyi mu Mfumu, lo wasee lukoto na ludzakala ku nzo me." Na nde watukwiikisa mu kutaambula.

Kiluumbu kimosi bu twaba kweende ku kibeendu kya lusaambulu, kisari kimosi kya mukyeetu kyaba na mpeeve ya mboomo, wayisa kutubwaana. Nde waba bakilaa bamfumu baandi ndaandu yalaka mu mbikukulu dzaandi.
Nde wabeke mu kwetunama, Pawulo na beetu, kuri wukwefula misaakulu wukweleele ti:" Baatu bamaba, bisari bya Nzaambi Mwa-Yulu bari, bo bari mu kweluyaabisa nzila ya mvuukulu.

Nde wasa bubwo mu biluumbu byalaka. Nduungusu dzibvulilaana, Pawulo wasyeeteke, na waleele kuri mpeeve yiyo ti: "me nyikutumini mu nkuumbu Yesu Kiristo, pala mu nde!" Mu kilookolo kinikyo, mpeeve ya pala.
Bamfumu baandi bubamono ti nsiitu mu ndaandu yaaku yi mwaakweende, bo bakaanga Pawulo na Sila na babanata ha kibeendu kya baatu bobanso ha busu bwa bamfumu.
Na bu babanata kuri batsuundisi ba bari Loma, baleele ti: "Baatu bamaba bari mu kwesa kisaangila kunsa bvula dyeetu. Bo bayudayo,
na bo bari mu kweyikisaa bifu biri beetu twahele na miswa mu ku bitaambula bunu pe mu kubisalila, beetu bari Loma."
Mpuumbu baatu yabaka nkesi mu bo. Batsuundisi batuma ti babasyoonono binkuta, na babalata nkwaasulu.
Bu bamana kubalata nkwaasulu, babatuba mu boroko na batumisa kuri mukebi boroko mu kubakebe kwakubwe.
Bu kataambula lutumu lwa bubwo, nde wabasoko kunsa kihekiri kya boroko na wakaanga miilu mya bo mu kidu.
Mu kakati dya butsuku, Pawulo bo na Sila baba saambilaana na baba yimbilaana mu kudumusa Nzaambi, na baba mu boroko bakaka baba baywiilaana.
Hanaho, na sisuu butoto bwateembele mu makwa, kuri lufulu lwa nzo boroko lwawa kutsyaamuka, ha nsi na nsi bidzibuku byobinso byawa kudzibuma na bikonyi bya maboroko byobinso byawa kunyanguka.
Mukebi boroko bu kasiimbuka, nde wamono myeelu mya nzo boroko myadzibulu; bu kanana mbeesi yayila, nde wasaka kudzusa nyutu nde-meene, nde bu kaba tsima ti maboroko ma mwaayitika.
Pawulo wafula mu mbeembu yayinene, waleele ti: "yasa bubi mu nyutu yaaku ko, bukuri beetu-banso turi haka."
Mukebi boroko bu kaloombo buungi, nde wabingukila na kinkuuka kyokinso, wabwa ha miilu mya Pawulo bo na Sila.
Tumi, bu kabanata ku mbasi, nde waleele ti: "Bamfumu, me nki nyelemini kusa mu kuri ti me bvuuka?"
Bo baleele ti: "Siila kanyi mu Mfumu Yesu na ye sa bvuuka, ye na nzo yaaku."
Bo bayaabisa maampu ma Mfumu, kuri nde na kuri bobanso baba mu nzo yaandi.
Bunu butsuku bubwo, nde wabaholo, waswaaka mamputa ma bo, na hanaho, nde bamubotoko, na baatu baandi bobanso.
Bu kabanata ku nzo yaandi, nde wabaha byandya ha taabala. Nde wamono kiminu na nzo yaandi yoyinso, bu basiiri kanyi mu Nzaambi.
Bu bwakya, batsuundisi baheeke bayongolo, mu kuleele kuri mukebi boroko ti: "patala baatu babo."
Mukebi boroko wayisa kuleele maampu mamo kuri Pawulo ti: "Batsuundisi baheekiri mukeensu ti balupatula haaka na haaka, ngo palee kweenu, yendee mu kiyeengi."

Kasi Pawulo waleele kuri bo ti: "bo bu batumini ti balata beetu nkwaasulu ha busu bwa baatu, kwahele kututsuundisa, beetu baatu ba ku Loma, na batutubiri mu boroko; mu lumalu bo batiiri kutupatula mu mansweeki? Ngo pele, bo-meene biisa batupatula."
Bayongolo bayende kutubula misamu mimyo kuri batsuundisi. Bo babaka boomo bayukaa ti bo baatu ba ku Loma bari.
Bo bayisa, babayiingukila, babapalisa ku mbasi, na babatuma ti bayisika ha bvula didyo.
Bu bapala mu boroko, Pawulo na Sila ba yende ku nzo Lidya, na bu bamono bampaangi, babasyaamisa, tumi ha bayende.
Bu bataba Amfipoli na Apolonya, bo batubuka ku Tesalonika kwaba Bayudayo na nzo-nkutukunu.
Bunu bwaba kifu kyaandi, Pawulo wayende ku bamono. Nde wadzoonso na bo mu Matinu mu biluumbu bya mpuumunu bitatu.
Nde wabaangula na wasoongo ti: Kiristo waba wayelemene kumono mpasi, na kufuluka mu bafwa, na ti: "Yesu, wu nyiri mu kuluyaabisa me wunde ngo Kiristo."
Babamosi mu bo bataambula mamo, na babvuutuna na Pawulo na Sila, ha kimosi na mpuumbu Bahelene, bari na kinzaambi, na bakyeetu balaka ba lukiinsu.

Kasi Bayudayo bamono musoki, na baholo baatu ba babakala bari na mutima-bubi, babakutukisa na basa kisaangila kunsa bvula. Bu batubuka ha nzo Yasoni, bo basaka Pawulo na Sila mu ku banata ha busu bwa baatu.
Bahelaa kubamono, bo banata Yasoni na bampaangi babamosi kuri batsuundisi, na babeke mu kwefula misaakulu ti: "Baatu bamaba ngo bakotisiri tungu mu nsi yansiina, mu lumalu beki hamaha."
Yasoni wubataamburyee ku nzo yaandi, na bobanso bakwetuungukila misiku mya Kayisari, bo bakweleele ti kuri mbyaasi yikimi, yiri nkuumbu Yesu."
Bu bayuka bubwo, mpuumbu baatu na bamfumu ba nsi batekete.
Bamfumu bu baholo mboongo kuri Yasoni na baatu bakaka, ha ba bapatula.
Hanaho, mu butsuku bampaangi, basiindika Pawulo na Sila ku Beroya. Bu batubuka, bayende ku nzo-nkutukunu ya Bayudayo.
Babo baba babvuri bitsimi bubwete ti na bari Tesalonika. Bo bataamburi maampu mu kiminu kyalaka. Mpisi kiluumbu, bo baba fyongokinaana Matinu, mu kumono kari myominso myatswiika.
Mu bo, baatu balaka basiiri kanyi, kwaba Bahelene, bakyeetu ba lukiinsu, na babakala balaka.
Ngo kasi Bayudayo ba ku Tesalonika, bayabaana ti Pawulo wuri mu kweyaabisa maampu ma Nzaambi ku Beroya, bo bayende kukwo na babeke kunyiingisa mpuumbu na kusa kisaangila.
Hanaho, bampaangi baholo baatu mu kunata Pawulo ku teke mubu; Sila bo na Timoteho ngo bari basii sala ku Beroya.
Baba kweyende Pawulo, bamunata natee ku Atena. Tumi bo babvutuka na mukeensu wuri ti Sila bo na Timoteho beende mu mawasu kuri kari nde.
Pawulo mu ntaangu yi kaba kingaana bambaasi ku Atena, wabama kunsa mitima waandi bu kamono ti bvula didyo dyaba dyaluula mu biteki.
Nde waba dzoonsaana ku nzo-nkutukunu bo na Bayudayo, na minsaambiri Nzaambi, na ha kibeendu kya bobanso mpisi kiluumbu, nde waba dzoonsaana na baatu baba haho.

Babamosi se baba kooleelaa ti ba-epikure na ba-estoyiko baba yolaa na nde. Bamosi baba leelaa ti: "Ngaa-lusuku wu se ti nki katiiri kuleele?" Bakaka ti: "Bunu ti muyikisi banzaambi banzeense nde kari", bukuri nde waba yaabisaana Musamu wamubwete wa Yesu na mfulukulu ya bafwa.
Bo bamukangaana bamunata ha kibeendu kya mfuundu bakuutu ba bvula, ha bamuleele ti: "Buri beetu lo tutsiitsiri kuyaaba nkya nyikusulu dzamoono ye wuri mu kweyaabisa?
Ye wuri mu kuyukusa beetu misamu myanzeense na beetu tutiiri kuyaaba mambangukulu mu myo."
Mukwongo, bari Atena na banzeense badzakala ha bvula didyo baba lutisaa ntaangu yaaku mu kudzoonso, bunu pe kuyuka mampolo mamoono.
Pawulo katelemaa ha kakati dya kibeendu kya mfuundu bakuutu, wabeke mu kuleele ti: "Baatu ba ku Atena, me nyiri mu kumono ti beenu luri na kinzaambi kyalaka mu myominso.

Bu nyabee kweyunga, na kwetala bimama byeenu byangisi, me nyamwiini dziku dimosi di bari batina ti: "kuri nzaambi yiri bayiyaa ko." Ngo, bibyo bi luri mu kwesaambila kwahele kuyaaba, bibyo me nyiisiri mu kuluyabisa.
Nzaambi yiyo ya yirika nsi na byobinso biri mu nsi, nde ngo Mfumu yulu na butoto, nde ka koodzakala mu manzo-nzaambi matuungu mu myooko mya baatu ko.
Nde wahele se na nzala kuri ti myooko mya baatu mimusalisa, kari na nzala kitotolo ti kimosi se ko, nde koohaanaa kuri bobanso kidziingu na muwuumunu na byobinso.
Mu muutu mosi, nde wayirika bitsuumbu byobinso bya baatu, na wabasuusa ha butoto bwabutsiina, nde wasa mandilu mu mantaangu, mandilu ma mansi ma kwedzakala baatu,
mpisi bemusaka, ti ha yuka ba kwebumbula mu nzala kumudzuukila, koomosoko nde wahele la na mpisi muutu mu beetu.
Mukwongo, mu nde beetuneenu turi bamwooyo, na turi mu kwedyaata, na turi na kidziingu. Bunu bwa leele babamosi mu baatu bangaa-lungwensu ti: "Beetu se turi mu kitsuumbu kya nde."
Ngo bu turi kitsuumbu kimosi na Nzaambi, lo yaa tutsima ko ti nde wafwanikina na woolo, na palata, na tari bunu pe kiteki kyahala mu bunkete na mu bitsimi bya baatu.
Nzaambi wahele kubweese kutsima mantaangu ma bunzimbu bwa baatu, mu lumalu nde wuloombo kuri baatu ba mansi momanso ti bayiinga madyeele.
Bukuri nde wasoolo kiluumbu ki katsuundisa nsi mu nsungumunu, mu muutu wunde wu kari kasoolo, na nde wasoongo kimbaangi kuri bobanso mu kumufulukisa mu bafwa."
Bu bayuka mfulukulu ya bafwa, babamosi bamusiila munsiku, bakaka baleele ti: "beetu ngo bari tumi bee tukuywiila mu mamo kiluumbu kikimi."
Haho, Pawulo kayisika ha kakati dya bo.
Mukwongo, baatu babamosi bakaangamini mu nde, basiila kanyi, mu bo kwaba Deni mosi waba mu mfuunda bakuutu, na mukyeetu wuri nkuumbu Damari na bakaka se.
Ha mambisa haho, Pawulo wasiisa Atena na wayende ku Korinto.

Nde wabwaana Muyudayo mosi, wuri nkuumbu Akila, wabutuka ku nkoonsi ya Pontiko. Kidzika kyantele kaba kamwaasa, wafumuni ku Italya, bo na Piriska, mukasi waandi, mu ntoono Kolodyo waheeri lutumu ti Bayudayo bapala mu Loma. Nde wakokosolo na bo,
na bukuri waba kisalu kimosi na bo, nde wadzakala kuri bo na wasala kintwaari na bo. Bo baba batuungi ba misaampu.
Nde waba dzoonsaana mu nzo-nkutukunu, mpisi kiluumbu kya mpuumunu, na waba yukusaana misamu ku Bayudayo na Bahelene.
Sila bo na Timoteho bu baba tubuka kuri ba mwaanangukina ku Makedonya, lo Pawulo wuri mu kwelutusa ntaangu, mu maampu ma Nzaambi, mu kweta kimbaangi ha busu bwa Bayudayo ti Yesu ngo Kiristo.

Mukwongo, Bayudayo bu baba kwemunyaafuna na kwemutuka, nde wakubula binkuta byaandi na wabaleele ti: "Makila ma beenu mabwa ha yulu mitu myeenu, me nyahele na kibila mu mo; mu lumalu, me ntalisiri kuri bangooyi."
Nde wayisika haho, na wayende kukoto mu nzo muutu mosi, nkuumbu yaandi Tityo Yusto munsaambiri Nzaambi, wuri nzo yaba ha teke nzo-nkutukunu.
Kirispo mfumu nzo-nkutukunu, wasii kanyi mu Mfumu, nde na nzo yaandi, na baatu balaka ba ku Korinto bayukiri, basii kanyi na bababotukiri.
Butsuku bu mosi, Mfumu waleele mu mamono-miisu kuri Pawulo ti: "Yaa ba na boomo ko, kasi dzoonso, na yaa wura ko,
bukuri me nyiri na ye, na kuri muutu ti mosi ko, wukwiisa mu kusa ye bubi, bukuri me nyiri na baatu balaka mu bvula dimadi.
Nde wadzakala na bo mu mubvu mosi na mangoondo masaamunu mu kweyikisa maampu ma Nzaambi.
Ngalyono waba kimonikisi kya nsi ya Loma ku Akaya; Bayudayo bayukusina batelemise kitaatu mu Pawulo, na bamunata ku nzo ya miyalu,
mu kuleele ti: "Muutu wumawu wuri mu kwesinda baatu mu kusaambila Nzaambi, mu kiteese kya kuhele kubvumina mangisi.
Pawulo bu kabaandika kudzibula munwa, Ngalyono leeriri kuri Bayudayo ti: "Mbuti habeeri lumvuki bunu pe musamu wamubi, nkani me ntaamburi nyayulu yeenu;
mbuti nkalikisi mu ntoono maampu, mankuumbu na mu mangisi meenu, lo monee beenu-meene; me ntiiri kuba mularimi mimyo ko.
Na nde wabapalisa mu nzo miyalu.
Bobanso bakwaata Sosetene, mfumu nzo-nkutukunu, bamulata ha mbasi nzo miyalu; kasi myominso mimyo myaba myahele kutala Ngalyono.
Pawulo wabweese kulutisa biluumbu byalaka. Tumi wasiisa bampaangi na wakoto mu bwaatu, mu kweende ku Sirya, ha kimosi na Piriska na Akila. Nde watebe mfu ku Nkengerya, mu lusiilulu lukasiiri.
Bo batubukaa ku Efeso, wubasiisiri kukwo. Bu kakota mu nzo-nkutukunu, nde wadzoonso na Bayudayo.
Bo bamuloombo mu kulutisa mwaa-ntaangu yalaka na bo, kasi nde wabisa.
Ngo nde wabasisa, waleele ti: "Me sa bweese kwiisa kuri beenu, mbuti Nzaambi tiri. Na wakoto bwaatu ku Efeso.
Nde wakulumuka ku Kayisareya, bu kanaaka ku Yerusalemi mu kuha dibuundu mboto, tumi ha kakulumuka ku Antyoke.
Nde bu kalutisa mwaa-mantaangu, ha kataba mankoonsi malandisina Ngalatya, Firingya, mu kwesyaamisa bayiki bobanso.
Muyudayo mosi, nkuumbu yaandi Apolo, wabutuka ku Alekanderi muutu wuri na bunzoonsi, wayisa ku Efeso, waba na nyaabulu mu matinu.
Nde waba na nyaabulu mu nzila Mfumu, na ntiiti mu kisalu, waba kwedzoonso na kweyikisa mu bunkete misamu mitariri Yesu, ngo yini mbotokulu ya Yowane kaba kayaari;
Nde wabaandika kuyikisa mu kibakala mu nzo-nkutukunu; Piriska na Akila bu bamuywiila, bamuholo mu kuba na bo, na bamuyikisa nzila [Nzaambi].
Nde bu kaba katya kweende ku Akaya, bampaangi bamusyaamisa na batinina kuri bantumu mu kuri ti bamutaambula, nde bu katubuka wamonoko mufunu walaka kuri babo basii kanyi mu bweese.
Mukwongo, nde waba tungukilaa Bayudayo mu makwa, ha busu bwa baatu, na waba soongaa mu matinu ti Yesu ngo Kiristo.
Ntaangu yaba Apolo ku Korinto, Pawulo wataba mankoonsi ma ku yulu milaandu, mu kweende ku Efeso. Bu kabwaana bayiki bamosi,
wabaleele ti: "Buri beenu lwataambiri Mpeeve Yangisi ha lwasii kanyi?" Bo babvutula ti: "Beetu twahele kuyuka ti, kuri badzoonsolo ti, Mpeeve Yangisi yiri."
Pawulo wabafuula ti: "Nkya mbotokulu beenu luri lwataambula?" Bo babvutula ti: "Mbotokulu ya Yowane."
Pawulo waleele ti: "Yowane wasalila mbotokulu ya nyiingula madyeele, waleele kuri baatu, mpisi heki baatu basa kanyi, mu wunde wukwiisa ha mambisa ma nde, mbangukulu Yesu."
Bamanaa kuyuka mamo, bataambula mbotokulu mu nkuumbu Mfumu Yesu.
Pawulo bu kabatetekele myooko, Mpeeve Yangisi yayisa ha yulu bo, bo badzoonso mandiinga na babikula.
Baatu baba kampe kuumi na boolo.
Bu kakoto mu nzo-nkutukunu, nde wayikisa mu bunsaalisi, mu mangoondo matatu, nde waba dzoonsaana na waba yukusaana mu mitariri Kimfumu kya Nzaambi.

Bukuri bamosi baba kubisaa mitima na baba bisaa kusa kanyi, bo badzoonsolo bwabubi mu nzila, ha busu bwa mpuumbu, nde wabasiisa, Ngo mpisi kiluumbu nde waba holaana bayiki kintwaari na nde, wabayoloso mu nzo nyikulu ya muutu mosi wuri nkuumbu Tirano.
Mimyo myayirima, mu mibvu myoolo, kuri bobanso badzakalaana ku Asya, Bayudayo na Bahelene, bayuka maampu ma Mfumu.
Nzaambi waba yirika bimaangu bya nkimukunu mu myooko mya Pawulo,
kuri lo babumusa mu babeeru, mansaanda bunu pe biteendi bi babumusinyee mu nyutu nde, mabeeru matsiinika na mampeeve mamabi mapala.

Bayudayo babamosi bakookwepalisaa mampeeve baba kweyendaa mu mabula, bo se batsiitsa mu kusalila nkuumbu Yesu ha yulu baatu baba na mampeeve mamabi, baleele ti: "Me nyiloombo kuri beenu, mu nkuumbu ya Yesu wuri Pawulo wuri mu kweyikisa!"
Bo baba baala nsaamu ba Keva, mukuutu bangaanga-nzaambi, Muyudayo, baba kwesalila bubwo.
Mpeeve yayibi yaha mvutu, yabaleele ti: "Me nyaari Yesu, na me nyaari se Pawulo, heki beenu ba na luri?"
Bu kabasungumina, muutu waba na mpeeve yayibi wababwiisikila kikiindu, wabvula kwa na bo, mu kiteesu kiri, bu baba pala mu nzo yiyo, mu ntiinu, mpene na balemene.
Mimyo mya yabakana kuri Bayudayo bobanso na Bahelene, badzakalaana ku Efeso na boomo bwabwiila ha yulu bobanso, na badzaangisa nkuumbu Mfumu Yesu.
Balaka mu babo basii kanyi, batambukila na bayaabisa nsalulu yaaku.
Balaka mu baba salilaa mu mpiitunu, bakutukisa mikaanda, bayoko myo ha busu bwa baatu, bu batangumisa ntalu, kampe mafuunda mataanu ma mboongo.
Bunubwo, bunu buri makwa ma Mfumu, maampu maba kweyalamika na mamonoko na makwa.
Mamo bu mayirima, Pawulo wabaka kitsimi mu kutaba Makedonya na Akaya mu kweende ku Yerusalemi. Nde waleele: "Bu nyiyisika kukwo, bwayelemene ti me mono Loma."
Nde waheeke ku Makedonya boolo mu bisari byaandi, Timoteho na Erasto, mu ntaangu yi kabakiingila ku Asya.
Mu ntaangu yiniyo, kwayirimini kisaangila kya makwa mu ntoono nzila.
Muyiriki miluungu mosi, nkuumbu yaandi Demeteryo, waba yirikaana biteki bya woolo mu kifwaani kya manzo-nzaambi ma Artemi, na wabahaanaa ndaandu yalaka kuri baba salila byo.
Nde wakutukisa ba bari kisalu kimosi kintwaari na nde, waleele ti: "Banduku baami, beenu luyaari ti kisalu ki ngo busina bwa beetuneenu,

lutala na luyuka ti ka kunu ku Efeso ko, ngo kampe mu Asya dyodinso, Pawulo, wayukusa baatu, na mpuumbu yalaka yahoomboko kuri nde, wukweleele ti, banzaambi bayiriku mu myooko mya baatu, bari banzaambi ko.
Kari kini kisalu kya beetu kinyaafuka ko, ngo se nzo-nzaambi ya Aretemi, nzaambi yayinene, yiba yabwoongolo, nzaambi yi bari mu kwesaambila mu nkoonsi yoyinso ya Asya na mu nsi yansiina!"
Bu bayuka bubwo, bo baluula mu nkesi, bafula misaakulu, baleele ti: "Wadzaangama, Aretemi wa bari Efeso!"
Bvula dyodinso dyaluula mu kisaangila, bakwaata Ngayo na Aristarako wa ku Makedonya, bambaasi ba Pawulo, babanata mu kitsimi kimosi ku nzo bimpa.
Pawulo waba tiiri kukoto kunsa mpuumbu yiyo, kasi bayiki bamudika.
Bamosi mu bambaasi baandi ba ku Asya se, bamuyingukila mu kuhele kweende nde-meene ku nzo bimpa.
Kisaangila kyakinene kyakoto kunsa buundu, babamosi babikisa mi, bakaka kubikisa mikimi; na balaka mu bo baba bahele kuyaaba mu nki ntoono baba bari bakutukina.
Munsa mpuumbu baatu bayaabisa kuri Alekandere, wuri Bayudayo basuusa ha mankula. Alekandere bu kanaanguna koko watya kukalila nyutu ha busu bwa baatu.
Bu bayaaba ti nde Muyudayo, bobanso bafula mu mbeembu mosi kampe mu bilookolo byoolo: "Wadzaangama, Aretemi wa bari Efeso!"
Mutini wa bvula wadzuunisa mpuumbu waleele ti: "Baatu ba ku Efeso, nani mu baatu dziimbiri ti bvula dya Efeso ngo mukebi nzo nzaambi ya wadzaangama Aretemi na kiteki kwafumini ku yulu?
Mimyo myahele na bwa kutununa, beenu luyelemini kuba badzuuna, yaa lubingukila kusa kitotolo ti kimosi ko.
Beenu lutweesi baatu bamaba hamaha. Bo bari bangaa-kwiibi ko, bunu pe basaani ba Nzaambi yeetu ko.
Hango, mbuti Demeteryo na bisari bya miluungu biri kintwaari na nde, bari na kooti mu muutu, lo kuri biluumbu bya miyalu na banzoonsi se na bo, lo be bafundusuna bo na bo.
Na mbuti luri na kitotolo kikimi ha yulu, lo buundu dikootala misamu sa dyaha mvutu.
Bukuri bee batuhoriri bunu bangaa-ntungu mu mya lolo. Bukuri kwahele ntoono ti yimosi yisoongo bunu buyirimini buundu dya bangaa-tungu dimadi. Kaleelaa mimyo nde tsyaamini buundu.
Misamu mya tungu mimyo milutaana, Pawulo watumisa bayiki, bu kabasyaamisa, nde wabaha mboto na wayende ku Makedonya.
Bu kaba kwetaba mankoonsi mamo, nde wabasyaamisa mu maampu malaka, watubuka ku nsi ya Bahelene,
nde walutisa mangoondo matatu kukwo. Nde bu kasaka kuholo bwaatu mu kweende ku Sirya, nde wayuka kele dya Bayudayo mu nde, na wataambula kubvutukila mu nzila ya Makedonya.
Bayende na nde mu nzila ngo: Sopatero mwaana Piro wa ku Bere, Aristarako na Sekundo ba ku Tesalonika, Ngayo wa ku Derbe, Timoteho, Tikiko na Torofimo ba ku ha Asya.
Bamaba bateekilaana, batukiingila ku Torowasi.
Beetu twakoto bwaatu ku Filipo, ha mambisa ma biluumbu bya mampa mahele lufunusu. Beetu tababakala ku Torowasi ha mambisa ma biluumbu bitaanu, na twalutisa lumiingu kukwo.
Kiluumbu kyatete kya lumiingu, bu twabvuutuna mu kubukunu mpa, Pawulo waba dzoonsaana na babo, bukuri waba kweende mu kiluumbu kyaba nama, nde wanonono luyolo natee mu kakati dya butsuku.
Miinda myaba myalaka, mu kihekiri kya ku yulu mu twaba twakutukina.

Mwaa munkuula mosi, nkuumbu yaandi Etiko, waba wadzakala ha mweelu nzo wantele, wuri tolo twa mpoondo. Pawulo wanamitina mu kudzoonso mu ntaangu yalaka. Ngo munkuula wunde, tolo bu twabvulila, wasonoko kuholosono mu mve yamatatu ya nzo natee ha nsi, na wafwa.
Pawulo bu kasunduka, wabwa ha yulu nde, wamuholo mu munsa myooko myaandi waleele ti: "Yaa lunyoongo ko, kiluunsi kyaandi kyakiri mu nde.
Bu katoomboko, wabukuna mpa na wadya, walutisa ntaangu yalaka na wadzoonso natee ku nkyeelele bwiisi, na wayende.
Bo banata mwaana wamwooyo na bataambula mboondulu yalaka.
Beetu bu twatekele mu bwaatu, twatalisa ku Asoso, ku twaketi kuholo Pawulo. Bukuri nde watiiri kuholo nzila ya mu nsi.
Bu katubakala ku Asoso, beetu twabweese kumuholo, na twayende ku Mitilene.
Tuyisikaa haho, beetu twaholo nzila ya mu mubu. Mu kiluumbu kyanama, twatubuka ha simi dya Kyo, mu kiluumbu kyabweese kunama beetu twataba Samo, na mu kiluumbu kyakaka twatubuka ku Mileto.
Mukwongo, Pawulo waba tiiri kulutila la na Efeso, mu kuhele kulutisa ntaangu ku Asya, nde waba kwebingukila, bukuri waba tiiri ti, mbuti bwakuka lo nde kaba ku Yerusalemi, mu kiluumbu kya Pantekote.
Kuholosono ku Mileto, Pawulo waheeke mukeensu ku Efeso mu kutumisa bakuutu ba dibuundu.
Bu bayisa kutubuka hari nde, nde wabaleele ti: "beenu luyaari ti kuholosono kiluumbu kyatete kinyasuusiri me kitaambi kunsa Asya, bunu bu nyabee na beenu mantaangu momanso,
nyasalila Mfumu mu nkulukulu yoyinso; kunsa bidilu na kunsa nsindukulu dzantumbukila mu makele ma Bayudayo.
Me nyahele kusweeke kitotolo ti kimosi, mu byaba mufunu kuri beenu, mu ntaangu ya kuyaabisa na kuyikisa, ha busu bwa baatu na mu manzo.
Me nyaloombo kuri Bayudayo na kuri Bahelene mu nyiingulu madyeele mu Nzaambi na kusiila kanyi mu Mfumu yeetu Yesu.
Mu lumalu me Mpeeve wankaanga, na me nyeensi ku Yerusalemi kwahele kuyaaba misamu mi nyibwaanikina na myo ku mankula.
Mpeeve Yangisi yiri mu kunswiikisila ti, mu bvula ngo bvula bikonyi na mpasi biri mu kunkiingila.

Kasi ha miisu mya me, kidziingu kyaami kyahele mufunu, kasi miri mufunu kuri meenu kusukisa nzila yaami na kisalu ki nyataamburi kuri Mfumu Yesu, kya kweta kimbaangi mu Musamu Wamubwete mu bweese bwa Nzaambi.
Mu lumalu me nyaari ti beenu lubweese kumono busu bwa me ko, beenu-banso kunsa baatu ba nyabee kweluta mu kuyikisa maampu ma Kimfumu kya mayulu.
Mu ntoono bubwo me nyilutswiikisa mu kiluumbu kya lolo ti, mu makila ma beenu-banso me nyiri na kibila ko.
Mu ngwanwa, me nyahele kulusweekele kitotolo ti kimosi, mu kuluyikisa kutya kwa Nzaambi.
Seenee madyeele mu beenu-meene, na mu mpuumbu bimeeme yoyinso yiri Mpeeve Yangisi wulutelemisi mu kuba bakebi. Buunguleenu dibuundu dya Nzaambi di kari kabaka mu makila ma nde-meene.
Me nyaari ti ha mambisa ma nyendukulu me, kunsa beenu bambulu bari na kibakala sa bakoto, na babvuukisa mpuumbu bimeeme ko,
na munsa beenu se sa kwateleme baatu ba kwesa biwobiri, mu kunata bayiki ha mambisa ma bo.
Mu ntoono bubwo, beene naana na baambukeenu mwooyo ti, mu lutaangu lwa mibvu mitatu, butsuku na mwiini, me nyahele kudzimbikina kulubula mpisi nde mu beenu, mu mansangasi.
Mu lumalu, me nyiluyekele beenu-banso kuri Nzaambi na kuri maampu ma bweese bwaandi, nde wuri na mpinu dza kutuunga nzo na dza kuha saala kuri bobanso basakumunu.
Me nya sii saka mboongo, bunu pe woolo, bunu pe binkuta bya muutu ko.
Beenu-meene luyaari ti myooko mimami, myabakisiryee me-meene na banduku baami mu manzala.

Mu myominso, me nyasoongiri kuri beenu ti, mu kusala, beenu luyelemini kubakisa bari na buyonsi, na kubaambuka mwooyo mu maampu ma Mfumu Yesu, bukuri nde-meene waleeriri ti: "Kiminu kibvuriri mu kuha ti na mu kutaambula."
Bu kamana kuleele mimyo, nde watsuka maboongo ha nsi, na wasaambila na bobanso.
Bobanso bakoto kunsa bidilu byalaka, babeke kwemudumukuna mu nkiingu na kwemunyumutina.
Bo bamono ngebe mu ntoono yi kaleeriri ti, bo babweese kumono busu bwaandi ko. Bo bayende kumufila natee ku bwaatu.
Tumanaa kuhaambuka na bo, beetu twayende mu bwaatu, na twasuunguma mu mawasu, na twatubuka ku bula buri nkuumbu Kosi. Tumi mu kiluumbu kyanama twatubuka ku Lodo, na tuyisikaa haho tweensi ku Patara.
Bu twabaka bwaatu haho, dyaba kweende ku Foyiniki, tukotiri na twayende mu mubu.
Bu twatubuka bebele na Kiporo, tusisiri bula bubwo ku mpele yalumoso, na twayende mu bwaatu ku Sirya na twasunduka ha Tiro, bukuri bwaatu bwaba na bitotolo bya kusundula haho.
Bu twabaka bayiki haho, twalutisa biluumbu nsaamu kintwaari na bo. Mpeeve ya batwaalisa mu kuleele kuri Pawulo, ti yaa keende ku Yerusalemi ko.
Biluumbu bya kulitisa haho bu byawa, beetu twayende. Bo batufila mu kintwaari na bakasi na baala, natee ku mbisa bvula, na bu twatsukuma ha simu dya mubu ha twasaambila.
Tumi bu twahelesene mamboto ma kuhambusina, ha twanwaata mu bwaatu, na bo babvutuka kunsa bvula.
Beetu twasukisa nyeendulu ya mu bwaatu mu kuyisika ku tiro na kwesunduka ku Petolemayi. Bu twahelesene mamboto na bampaangi, ha twalutisa kiluumbu kyakitsiina na bo.
Kiluumbu kyanama beetu twayende na twatubuka ku Kayisareya, na twakoto mu nzo dinginsi diri kuumbu Filipo, nde waba mosi mu bo nsaamu; tumi ha twadzakala ha nzo nde.
Nde waba na baala babakyeetu banswaasa bana baba bikulaana.
Bu twaba tweki haho mwaa-biluumbu byalaka, mubikiri mosi nkuumbu Angabo, wanangukini ku Yudaya, wakulumuka,

na wayisa kuri beetu. Bu kaholo musweele Pawulo, wakaanga miilu na myooko mya nde-meene, na waleele ti: Mpeeve wuleele bumabu ti: muutu ngaa-musweele wu, Bayudayo sa bamukaanga bikonyi bumabu ku Yerusalemi, na kumuyekele mu myooko mya bangooyi.
Tumanaa kuyuka bubwo, beetu na baatu baba ha kibeendu kikyo, twayingukila Pawulo, ti yaa katoomboko ku Yerusalemi ko.
Haho, Pawulo wabvutula ti: "Nki luri mu kusa mu kudiila na mu kutabula me mutima? Me nyayirima, kari mu kunu kuri ti bankaanga bikonyi ko, ngo na mu kufwa ku Yerusalemi mu nkuumbu ya Mfumu Yesu."
Ngo bukuri nde waba wahele kutaambula mamo, beetu twawuriri kweetu, na twaleele ti: "Hemese kutya kwa Mfumu kuyirima!"
Tumanaa kulutisa biluumbu bibyo haho, ha twatoomboko ku Yerusalemi.
Bayiki ba ku Kayisareya bayende se kintwaari na beetu, na batunata ku nzo muutu waba tutaambula, muutu wunde nkuumbu Naasoni, wa ku Kiporo, waba wayeki muyiki na kidzika.
Tumanaa kutubuka ku Yerusalemi, bampaangi batutaambula mu kiminu.
Mu kiluumbu kyanama, Pawulo na beetu, twakoto mu nzo Yakobo, kwaba se bakulu ba babakala bobanso.
Bu kabaha mamboto, wabeke kubayaabisa musamu mosi-mosi, mu myayirikiri Nzaambi, mu kisalu kya nde, ha kakati dya bangooyi.
Bo bamana kuyuka mamo, bakeembese Nzaambi, na bamuleele ti: "Mpaangi, moneeti, mburi mafuunda ma ba mwaasa kanyi ha kakati dya Bayudayo, na bakaangama kunsa mangisi.
Ngo bo bari mu kweyuka mu ntoono ya ye ti: ye wukweyikisa kuri Bayudayo bari ha kakati dya makaanda ti yaa bateende baala bubakala ko, na yaa benama bifu bya Bayudayo ko.
Ngo kusiila buri? Bo bee bayukiri ti ye mwaakwiisa.
Yirika ma tukuleele beetu. Beetu turi na baatu bana hamaha ba mwaasa nsiilulu mu bo-meene.

Baholo na sa nsyemusunu kintwaari na bo, na baha mboongo mpisi batebe makungulu mu mitu, na baatu bobanso sa bayaaba ti myominso mi bayukiri mu ntoono ye myabuunu, ngo kasi ye-meene wukwedyaatila kunsa mangisi.

Ngo kuri bangooyi babo bamwaasa kanyi, beetu twatinini kuri bo ma twakaangiri ti: bo yaa beedya toongo twa bibulu byadzusu mu kikabu kuri biteki ko, makila se kudya pe, toongo twa bibulu byadzusa mu nsukusulu muwuumunu se kudya pe, kimpala se kuta pe.

Haho, mu kiluumbu kyanama, Pawulo waholo babakala babo, wabaandika kusa nsyemusunu kintwaari na bo, tumi wakoto mu Nzo-nzaambi mu kuyaabisa nsukulu biluumbu bya nsyemusunu, natee kiluumbu ki baha kikabu mu mosi-mosi mu bo.
Biluumbu byo nsaamu bibaanaa byeki suka, Bayudayo ba ku Asya, bamono Pawulo mu Nzo-nzaambi, na bakotoso kisaangila mu mpuumbu yoyinso, na bamukaanga.

Bo babeke kubikisa ti: "Babakala ba Isaheli, wasee lutubakisa! Muutu wumawu wukweha nyikusulu kuri bobanso na mwomunso, dzahele bubwe mu kaanda, mu mangisi na mu kibeendu ki; ha yulu haho se nde mwaakotoso Bahelene mu Nzo-nzaambi, na mwaasumuna kibeendu kyangisi ki.
Bo baba bamwaatekesele kumono Torofimo wa ku Efeso, kunsa bvula, kintwaari na nde, na bo baba kutsima ti Pawulo mwaamukotoso mu Nzo-nzaambi.
Kisaangila kyabwa mu bvula dyodinso, na baatu bobanso bakutukuna. Bu bakaanga Pawulo, bamukooko ku mbasi Nzo-nzaambi, na hanaho, bo bakaanga myeelu.
Bu baba beki saka kumudzusa, musamu watubuka kuri mukuutu fuunda dya bayongolo, ti kisaangila kimwaakoto mu Yerusalemi dyodinso.
Mu mawasu-mawasu, nde waholo bayongolo, na bakuutu ba mikaangu mya nkama bayongolo, na badzumuna kwaba baatu babo. Bo bu bamono mukuutu mukaangu wa fuunda, na bayongolo, ha bahoto kulata Pawulo.
