COL.3.15	Hemese kiyeengi kya Kiristo, ki bari baluteelele mbila mu nyutu mosi, kituma mitima mya beenu. Beeneenu bayaari kubvutula matoondo. 
COL.3.16	Hemese maampu ma Kiristo madzakala mu beenu mu busina. Mu madyeele momanso, yikisineenu na lubusineenu beenu na beenu, mu mikuunga mya ndoombulu, mya ndumusu na mya kimpeeve. Yimbikilee Nzaambi mikuunga mya matoondo mu mitima myeenu. 
COL.3.17	Na momanso ma lutsiitsa kuyirika mu nzoonsulu, bunu pe mu biyiriki, yirikilee momanso mu nkuumbu ya Mfumu Yesu, mu mvutukulu matoondo mu nde, kuri Taata Nzaambi.
COL.3.18	Bakasi, beenee batumuma kuri balumi beenu, bunu bwayelemene mu Mfumu.
COL.3.19	Balumi, tyeenee bakasi beenu, na yaa lwebanyokono ko.
COL.3.20	Baala, tambukilee mu momanso kuri bataayi na banguri beenu, bukuri buri bwabubwete mu Mfumu.
COL.3.21	Bataayi, yaa lwebakisa baala beenu nkesi ko, mpisi bahele kuholo-bito.
COL.3.22	Bankutu, tambukilee mu momanso, kuri bamfumu beenu ba muswinyi, kari hani ha busu bwa bo ko, mu nzala kubweeye kuri baatu, ngo mu nkulukulu na mu kibvumi kya Mfumu. 
COL.3.23	Mamo ma lutsiitsa kuyirika, yirikilee mo mu mutima wamutsiina, bunu ti kuri Mfumu, nkani ka kuri baatu ko, 
COL.3.24	bu luyaari ti, sa lwataambula kuri Mfumu museendu ngo saala. Beenee bakwesalila Mfumu Kiristo. 
COL.3.25	Mukwongo, wunde wusalila bubayi sa kataambula mamo ma kari kayirika ma bubayi; ka kuba munsoori mu baatu ko.
COL.4.1	Bamfumu, yirikeenu kuri bankutu beenu ma suunguma na mayelemene, bu luyaari ti beenu se luri na Mfumu ku mayulu.
COL.4.2	Syaamee mu lusaambulu, beenee naana mu lwo, mu mvutukulu matoondo. 
COL.4.3	Mu ntaangu yo yimosi, saambilee se na mu beetu, mpisi heki Nzaambi katuha mpwaani ya kuyikisa maampu, na kuyaabisa mpaanu dza Kiristo, bukuri mu ntoono mpaanu dzidzo me nyiri mu boroko. 
COL.4.4	Saambilee mpisi heki me mbaangula mpaanu dzidzo, bunu bunyelemini kuyikisa.
COL.4.5	Dyaatilee mu madyeele ha busu bwa baatu ba ku mbasi; salilee ntaangu. 
COL.4.6	Ma lukwedzoonso beenu maba ma bweese mu mantaangu momanso, matwa mungwa, mu kuyaaba bunu bwayelemene kuha mvutu kuri mpisi muutu.
COL.4.7	Mu misamu mitariri me, Tikiko sa kaluyaabisa, nde wuri mpaangi ya mutima, kisari kyakwiikama na mbaasi ya kisalu mu Mfumu. 
COL.4.8	Me nyamuheekiri kuri beenu mu ntoono yiyo, mpisi heki beenu luyaaba misamu mitariri beetu, na kasyaamisa mitima myeenu. 
COL.4.9	Nde bo na Onesimo, mpaangi yakwiikama na ya mutima, wuri mosi mu beenu, sa baluyaabisa misamu myominso miri kumaku.
COL.4.10	Aristarako, mbaasi yaami yi turi mu boroko, wuluheekiri mboto. Malako, mpaangi Barnaba, nde se wuluheekiri mboto. Mu ntoono ya nde, beenu lwataamburi ntumunu; mbuti wiisiri kuri beenu, lo mutaambuleenu. 
COL.4.11	Yesu, wubateelaa ti Yusto, nde se wuluheekiri mboto. Mu bateende bubakala, banabo kitsu bakwesala kintwaari na me mu ntoono Kimfumu kya Nzaambi; bo ngo babeeri mboondulu ku nyiri me.
COL.4.12	Epafara, wa beenu-meene wuluheekiri mboto. Nde nkutu Kiristo Yesu, wukwelunwanikina mpisi ntaangu mu nsaambulu, mpisi heki beenu luteleme nangwii, luba bakuka mu kuyirika momanso matiiri Nzaambi. 
COL.4.13	Mukwongo, me nyimuteele kimbaangi ti, nde wuri mu kwebama kwalaka mu ntoono beenu, na mu bari ku Lahodikya, na mu bari ku Yerapoli. 
COL.4.14	Luka, mubuki-babeeru, nduku yeetu ya mutima, bo na Dema baluheekiri mboto.
COL.4.15	Henee mamboto, kuri bampaangi ba ku Lahodikya, kuri Nimfa na kuri dibuundu dikutukunaa mu nzo nde. 
COL.4.16	Bu lumeeni kutaanga mukaanda wumawu, lo seenee kuri ti kaba wataangu se kuri dibuundu dya bari ku Lahodikya; na mukaanda wa bari ku Lahodikya beenu se lumutaanga. 
COL.4.17	Leeleenu kuri Arkipo ti: Sa madyeele mu kisalu ki wuri wataambula mu Mfumu, mpisi sala kyo kwakubwete.
COL.4.18	Taambuleenu mboto ya mu kooko kwa me-meene Pawulo. Baambukeenu mwooyo ti me nyiri mu boroko. Bweese buba na beenu!
1TH.1.1	Pawulo, Silvano na Timoteho, kuri dibuundu dya Tesalonika, mu Taata Nzaambi na mu Mfumu Yesu Kiristo: bweese na kiyeengi biba na beenu. 
1TH.1.2	Beetu tubvutulaana matoondo mantaangu momanso kuri Nzaambi, mu beenu-banso, na twahele kuhoto kuluyekelaana mu nsaambulu dzeetu. 
1TH.1.3	Beetu tubaambukaana mwooyo mu biyiriki bya kanyi dyeenu, mu kisalu kya ntiilu yeenu, na mu kifiki kya nsiitu dzeenu mu Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo, ha busu bwa Taayi dyeetu Nzaambi. 
1TH.1.4	Bampaangi batya kuri Nzaambi, beetu tuyaari nsoolulu yeenu. 
1TH.1.5	Mukwongo, Musamu beetu Wamubwete wahele kutubuka kuri beenu, munu mu nzoonsulu kitsu, ngo se mu mpinu, mu Mpeeve Yangisi na mu nyukusulu ya musundu, bunu bu luyaari bu twaba beetu ha kakati dya beenu, mu ntoono beenu. 
1TH.1.6	Na beenu lwayeki minsombisiri mya beetu na mya Mfumu, bu lwataamburi Maampu kunsa mpasi dzalaka, mu kiminu kya Mpeeve Yangisi. 
1TH.1.7	Mu didyo, beenu lwayeki kifwaani kuri bobanso basiila kanyi, bari ku Makedonya na bari ku Akaya. 
1TH.1.8	Bukuri, kuholosono kuri beenu, kari mani Maampu ma Mfumu mayukukuna, mu Makedonya na mu Akaya ko, ngo kanyi dyeenu mu Nzaambi se dyayabakana mwomunso, kuri lo beetu twahele kubweese kwaandi ti kudidzonsolo. 
1TH.1.9	Bukuri bobanso bakwedzoonsolo mu beetu, mu ntambukulu yi lwatutaamburi ha twayisiri kuri beenu, na bunu bu luri lwasiisila beenu biteki na kusyeeteke kuri Nzaambi, mu kusalila nde, Nzaambi ya mwooyo na ya ngwanwa, 
1TH.1.10	na mu kwekiingila Mwaana waandi wufumuna ku mayulu, wu kafulukisi mu bafwa, Yesu, nde wutukuula mu nkesi dzikwiisa.
1TH.2.1	Bampaangi, beenu-meene luyaari dyo ti nyisulu beetu kuri beenu yasiiri kuba yabuunu ko. 
1TH.2.2	Bunu bu luyaari, beetu twamono mpasi na batubamisa ku Filipo, ngo Nzaambi yeetu watusyaamisa mu kuyikisa Musamu waandi Wamubwete kunsa nwaanusunu dzamakwa. 
1TH.2.3	Mukwongo, nyikusulu dza beetu ka dziri dza nzimbusulu ko, dza nsumukunu bunu pe dza mawunu ko. 
1TH.2.4	Ngo bukuri Nzaambi watufyongokini mu kutuyakisa Musamu Wamubwete, beetu tukweyikisa kari mu kubweeye ha busu bwa baatu ko, ngo ha busu bwa Nzaambi, nde wufyongokinaa mitima myeetu. 
1TH.2.5	Bunu bu luyaari, beetu twasii salila mu nzoonsulu dza lupyelu ko, bunu pe mu buungu dya ntiki-mboongo ko, Nzaambi mbaangi. 
1TH.2.6	Beetu twasiiri saka masiiku mafumuna kuri baatu ko, mafumuna kuri beenu, bunu pe kuri bakimi ko. 
1TH.2.7	Twaba kwaandi lo twakuka mu kuri ti beenu lutubuungula, bu turi bantumu ba Kiristo, ngo kasi beetu twaba twaluula mu bundeembu ha kakati dya beenu, bunu musoombi wubuungulaana baala ba nde-meene. 
1TH.2.8	Mu musoongo wu turi na nde mu beenu, beetu turi na kiminu mu kuluha, kari wunu Musamu Wamubwete wa Nzaambi ko, ngo na kidziingu kya beetu-meene se, bukuri beenu luri bampaangi ba mutima. 
1TH.2.9	Mukwongo, baambukeenu mwooyo, bampaangi, mu kisalu kya makwa na mpasi dza beetu: beetu twaluyikisa Musamu Wamubwete wa Nzaambi, mu kwesala butsuku na mwiini, mpisi heki ti mosi mu beenu kahele kutubuungula. 
1TH.2.10	Beenu luri bambaangi, Nzaambi se mbaangi: ndyaatulu beetu yaba yangisi, yasuunguma, na yahele maseembu ha busu bwa beenu basiila kanyi. 
1TH.2.11	Beenu luyaari se ti, beetu twaba kuhololo mosi mosi mu beenu bunu bu hololaana taayi baala baandi. 
1TH.2.12	Beetu twaba kweluboondaana, kwelusyaamisaana, na kweluyingukilaana mu kuba na ndyaatulu yitiiri Nzaambi, nde wuri mu kuluteele mu kimfumu na mu nkeembu yaandi.
1TH.2.13	Hango-nkuumbu, beetu tubvutulaana matoondo kuri Nzaambi mpisi ntaangu, bukuri maampu ma Nzaambi ma luri lwayuka kuri beetu, beenu lwamataamburi, kari bunu maampu ma baatu ko, ngo bunu bu mari maampu ma Nzaambi ma ngwanwa, ma kwesala mu beenu basiilaana kanyi. 
1TH.2.14	Mukwongo, bampaangi, beenu lweki minsombisiri mya mabuundu ma Nzaambi, mari mu nkoonsi ya Yudaya, masiila kanyi mu Kiristo Yesu, bukuri beenu se lwabamini kuri ba beenu-meene ba luri nsi mosi, mu misamu myomimosi mya bamini mabuundu mamo kuri Bayudayo. 
1TH.2.15	Bo ngo baba dzusa Mfumu Yesu na babikiri, na bakwaamisini beetu. Bahele kubweeye ha busu bwa Nzaambi, na bo ngo bataatu ba baatu bobanso. 
1TH.2.16	Bakwetukabukisa kuyikisa bangooyi mpisi bahele kubvuuka. Mu didyo bo bari mu kukukisilaana kiteesu kya masumu maaku, mpisi ntaangu. Ngo ku manunu nkesi dza Nzaambi dzi mwaa kubatubukila.
1TH.2.17	Bampaangi, beetu ngo bari, bu twaba la na beenu mu mwaa ntaangu, mu manyutu nkani ka mu mitima ko, mu musoongo walaka wu twaba na nde, twabaka kitsimi kya makwa mu kuri ti tumoneenu mu miisu na miisu. 
1TH.2.18	Mu didyo, beetu twaba na nzala kwiisa kuri beenu, mbiki ti me Pawulo, mbala mosi bunu pe dzoolo, ngo Satana watukabukisi. 
1TH.2.19	Mukwongo, beenu luri nsiitu yeetu, kiminu kyeetu, bunu pe lukoongolo lweetu lwa ndulukulu, ha busu bwa Mfumu yeetu Yesu mu ntaangu ya nyisulu yaandi. 
1TH.2.20	Mukwongo, beenu luri nkeembu yeetu na kiminu kyeetu.
1TH.3.1	Hango, bu twakonini kukiingila, beetu twamono dyo ti bwabubwete mu kusaala beetu bakaka ku Atena, 
1TH.3.2	na kuheeke mpaangi yeetu Timoteho, nde wukwesala kintwaari na Nzaambi mu Musamu Wamubwete wa Kiristo, mu kulukumisa na kulusyaamisa mu kanyi dyeenu, 
1TH.3.3	mpisi heki muutu kahele kubwa mu ntoono manyoongi ma ntaangu yimayi. Mukwongo, beenu-meene luyaari ti mu bubwo turi mwooyo. 
1TH.3.4	Mu ntaangu yi twaba twakiri kuri beenu, beetu twaba kwelulubulaana ti, bee batumonisini manyoongi; ngo bunubwo se mimyo mi mwaakututubukila, na beenu luyaari. 
1TH.3.5	Hango-nkuumbu, me nkoonaa kukiinga, ha nyaheekiri Timoteho mu kwiisa kuyaaba bunu buri kanyi dya beenu, mu kubata kuri ti Musindukiri kakwiisa kulusindukila na kisalu kya beetu kihele kuba kya buunu.
1TH.3.6	Ngo mu lumalu, Timoteho bu kabeeri kuri beenu mwaakwiisa bvutuka kuri beetu, na watuyaabisiri musamu wamubwete mu ntoono kanyi na ntiilu yeenu, na ti, beenu bunu luri lwakebe bitsimi byabibwete mu beetu, na luri na nzala beetu kumono, bunu bu turi na beetu se nzala kulumono. 
1TH.3.7	Mu didyo, bampaangi, kunsa mpasi dzeetu na manyoongi meetu, beetu twabakiri mboondulu mu beenu mu ntoono kanyi dyeenu. 
1TH.3.8	Ngo mu lumalu, beetu turi mwooyo bukuri beenu lwakwiikama mu Mfumu. 
1TH.3.9	Nkya matoondo beetu tutsiitsa kubvutula kuri Nzaambi, mu ntoono beenu, mu kiminu kyokinso ki turi mu kumono mu dyaambu dya beenu, ha busu bwa Nzaambi yeetu? 
1TH.3.10	Butsuku na mwiini, beetu turi mu kwesaambilaana kwalaka mpisi tubweese kulumono na kukukisila mari mu kuhele mu kanyi dyeenu. 
1TH.3.11	Hemese Taayi dyeetu Nzaambi nde-meene na Mfumu yeetu Yesu batudzibukila nzila mu kwiisa kuri beenu. 
1TH.3.12	Hemese Mfumu kabuukisa na kabweese ntiilu yi luri na yo beenu na beenu, na mu baatu bobanso, bunu bu tulutiiriri beetu seenee. 
1TH.3.13	Hemese nde kakumisa mitima myeenu, mpisi heki beenu luba bangisi na bahele maseembu ha busu bwa Taayi dyeetu Nzaambi, mu ntaangu ya nyisulu Mfumu yeetu Yesu kintwaari na bangisi baandi bobanso. [Amene].
1TH.4.1	Mu misiiri bampaangi, beetu tululoombo na tulusyaamisa mu Mfumu. Bu lwayeki lwayika kuri beetu ndyaatulu yayelemene mu kubweeye kuri Nzaambi, bunubwo se luri mu kwedyaatila, ngo bweeseenu kutoombolo kiteesu. 
1TH.4.2	Mukwongo, beenu luyaari nkya nyikusulu beetu turi twaluha mu nkuumbu ya Mfumu yeetu Yesu. 
1TH.4.3	Kutya kwa Nzaambi kuri ti, beenu luba bangisi na luhele kwesalila buyala. 
1TH.4.4	Mpisi muutu mu beenu kayaaba kuhololo mukasi waandi, kunsa bungisi na lukiinsu, 
1TH.4.5	kwahele kuba mu lutumu lwa mantiilu mamabi, bunu bangooyi bari bahele kuyaaba Nzaambi. 
1TH.4.6	Mu dyaambu di, yaa kuba wuyirika ma lumvuki kuri mpaangi yaandi, bunu pe kumuwuna ko, bukuri beetu twatekesele ku luyaabisa na kusiingisa dyo ti: Mfumu wubvutulaana mamabi kuri bayirikaana ma bubwo. 
1TH.4.7	Mukwongo, Nzaambi ka siiri kututeele mbila mu kuba kunsa nsumukunu ko, ngo mu kuba kunsa bungisi. 
1TH.4.8	Hango-nkuumbu, mpisi wunde wubisa nyikusulu dzimadzi, lo kari muutu kabisiri ko, ngo Nzaambi wuhaanaa Mpeeve yaandi Yangisi kuri beenu.
1TH.4.9	Mu dyaambu dya ntiilu ya kimpaangi, beenu luri na nzala kuri ti ba lutinina ko, bukuri beenu-meene lwayeki lwayika kuri Nzaambi bwa kutilisina beenu na beenu. 
1TH.4.10	Bubwo se beenu luri mu kuyirikaana kuri bampaangi bobanso bari ku Makedonya, ngo beetu tulusyaamisa bampaangi, mu kubweese kutoombolo kiteesu, 
1TH.4.11	mu kweba na nzala kunata kidziingu kunsa kidzuunu, na kwenama misamu mini mya beenu-meene, na kwesala mu myooko mya beenu-meene bunu bu turi twalutuma dyo. 
1TH.4.12	Mpisi heki luba na ndyaatulu yayelemene ha busu bwa baatu bari ku mbasi, na muutu kahele kulubuungula.
1TH.4.13	Bampaangi, beetu tutii ko ti beenu luba kunsa lubu, mu mitariri babo ba mwaafwa, mpisi luhele kwenyoongo bunu bakaka bahele na nsiitu. 
1TH.4.14	Mbuti tusiila kanyi ti Yesu wafwiiri na wafulukiri, lo tusiileenu se kanyi ti Nzaambi sa kafulukisa mu Yesu, babo bafwiiri kuri bari na kanyi mu nde. 
1TH.4.15	Mukwongo, mi turi mu kuleele beetu, bunu buri maampu ma Mfumu, mimami: beetuneenu tuba twakiri mwooyo natee mu nyisulu Mfumu, ka tuba ku mankula ma babo bafwa ko. 
1TH.4.16	Bukuri Mfumu nde-meene, mu kidiimbu kya nyaabusulu, mu mbeembu ya mukuutu bambasi, mu munyiingu mvumvuri ya Nzaambi, sa kasunduka mu mayulu, na babo bafwiila mu Kiristo sa batekesele kufuluka; 
1TH.4.17	tumi beetuneenu tuba twakiri mwooyo, batunaanguna ha kimosi na bo mu matuti, mu kubwaana Mfumu mu kingye-kingye, na kuba kintwaari na Mfumu mantaangu momanso. 
1TH.4.18	Hango-nkuumbu, yendeenu lwebondosono beenu na beenu mu maampu mamo.
1TH.5.1	Mu ntoono ya mantaangu na bilookolo, bampaangi, beenu ka luri na nzala kuri ti balutinina ko. 
1TH.5.2	Mukwongo, beenu-meene luyirikiri kuyaaba ti, kiluumbu kya Mfumu sa kiisa bunu ngaa-kwiibi mu butsuku. 
1TH.5.3	Mbasi-tsuku haleele baatu ti: turi na kiyeengi, turi na kidzuunu, hanaho se mfukusulu yibabwilikila na sisuu, bunu bu kwiisikila misoongo mya mbutulu kuri mukyeetu wuri na yimi, ngo bo ka batsiitsa kubvuuka ko. 
1TH.5.4	Ngo kasi, bampaangi, beenu lwahele kunsa mampimbisi kuri heki kiluumbu kikyo kiisa kuri beenu na sisuu buni ngaa-kwiibi. 
1TH.5.5	Mukwongo, beenu-banso luri baala ba buungi na baala ba mwiini. Beetuneenu ka turi baatu ba butsuku bunu pe ba mampimbisi ko. 
1TH.5.6	Hango-nkuumbu, yaa tubweeneenu tolo bunu bakaka ko, ngo tubeenee naana na kuba na ndiilu na nwiinu byayelemene. 
1TH.5.7	Bukuri bangaa-tolo, butsuku bakoobwaana tolo, na binwi bya malu, butsuku bakookolaa malu. 
1TH.5.8	Ngo beetuneenu turi baatu ba mwiini, tubeeneenu na ndiilu na nwiinu byayelemene twahele kukolo malu, twalwaata kanyi na ntiilu bunu kinkuta kya mu ntulu kya mukaanda kibulu, na twalwaata nsiitu ya mvuukulu bunu mpu ya kitari. 
1TH.5.9	Bukuri Nzaambi kasiiri kututaasila mu kubwilikila nkesi ko, ngo kutaambula mvuukulu mu Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo. 
1TH.5.10	Nde wafwa mu ntoono beetu, mpisi heki, ti hayuku turi naana ti hayuku twabwa tolo, lo tubeeneenu mwooyo kintwaari na nde. 
1TH.5.11	Hango-nkuumbu, syamisineenu beenu na beenu, na tuungusineenu beenu na beenu bunu bu luri mu kwesalila.
1TH.5.12	Bampaangi, beetu tululoombo mu kwebvumina babo bari mu kwesala ha kakati dya beenu, bakwelutwaalisa mu Mfumu na bakwelulubula. 
1TH.5.13	Namitineenu kubvula kwebasiila mutima na kwebatya, mu ntoono kisalu ki bari na kyo. Beeneenu na kiyeengi beenu na beenu.
1TH.5.14	Beetu tulusyaamisa, bampaangi: seembeenu babo bari kunsa kisaangila, syaamiseenu bari na boomo, kumiseenu bari na bubolo, beeneenu na nkindusulu-mutima mu bobanso. 
1TH.5.15	Taleenu yaa kuba muutu wubvutula bubi mu bubi ko, ngo namitineenu kweyirika mamabwete, ha kakati dya beenu na beenu na kuri bobanso.
1TH.5.16	Beeneenu na kiminu mpisi ntaangu. 
1TH.5.17	Saambileenu kwahele manunu. 
1TH.5.18	Bvutuleenu matoondo mu myominso, bukuri bubwo buri kutya kwa Nzaambi kuri beenu mu Yesu Kiristo.
1TH.5.19	Yaa ludzimisa Mpeeve ko. 
1TH.5.20	Yaa lusaana mbikululu ko, 
1TH.5.21	ngo fyongokineenu myominso, lukebe myamibwete. 
1TH.5.22	Yaa luyirika ti dimosi dyadibi ko.
1TH.5.23	Hemese Nzaambi ya kiyeengi nde-meene, kalusa bangisi mu kiteesu kyakuka, na bumuutu bwa beenu bwobunso, kiluunsi, muheebulu na nyutu, biba byakebu kwahele maseembu, mu nyisulu Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo. 
1TH.5.24	Wunde wuri mu kuluteele mbila wakwiikama, sa kakukisa momanso.
1TH.5.25	Bampaangi, saambileenu se mu beetu.
1TH.5.26	Heeneenu mamboto kuri bampaangi bobanso mu nyumutunu yangisi.
1TH.5.27	Me nyiluyingukiri mu nkuumbu Mfumu: taangiseenu mukaanda wumawu kuri bampaangi bobanso.
1TH.5.28	Hemese bweese bwa Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo buba na beenu.
2TH.1.1	Pawulo, Silvano na Timoteho kuri dibuundu dya bari Tesalonika, mu Nzaambi Taayi dyeetu, na mu Mfumu Yesu Kiristo. 
2TH.1.2	Bweese na kiyeengi bifumini kuri Nzaambi Taayi [dyeetu], na kuri Mfumu Yesu Kiristo, biba na beenu.
2TH.1.3	Bampaangi, Beetu tuyelemini kubvutula matoondo mpisi ntaangu kuri Nzaambi, mu ntoono beenu. Buri bwabubwete, bukuri kanyi dya beenu diri mu kwebuuka kwalaka, na ntiilu yi luri na yo mu bambaasi yiri mu kwehamisa mu muutu-muutu. 
2TH.1.4	Hango-nkuumbu, beetu turi na kimweese mu beenu ha kakati dya mabuundu ma Nzaambi, mu ntoono kifiki kyeenu na kanyi dyeenu, kunsa nkwamusunu dzeenu dzodzinso, na manyoongi ma luri mu kwekuunda. 
2TH.1.5	Kikyo kidiimbu kya mutsuundu Nzaambi wasuunguma, mpisi luba lwamonoko ti lwayelemene mu kimfumu kya Nzaambi, ki luri mu kwemwiina mpasi. 
2TH.1.6	Mukwongo, diri dyasuunguma ti Nzaambi kabvutula manyoongi kuri babo bakwelusoongo manyoongi; 
2TH.1.7	na kaha mpuumunu, kuri beenu luri mu kwemono manyoongi, na kuri beetu. Mimyo mbasi-tsuku sa myaba ha monokono Mfumu Yesu mu mayulu na bambasi ba mpinu dzaandi, 
2TH.1.8	kunsa mbaawu ya mile, mu kubvutula bubi kuri babo bahele kuyaaba Nzaambi, na bahele kutumuma mu Musamu Wamubwete wa Mfumu yeetu Yesu. 
2TH.1.9	Bo sa bataambula maseembu ma mfukusulu yahele manunu, la na busu bwa Mfumu, na la na nkeembu ya makwa maandi, 
2TH.1.10	mbasi-tsuku ha kakwiisa, mu kiluumbu kikyo, mu kuba wakeembusu mu bangisi baandi, na mu kuba wasiika mu bobanso basiilaana kanyi, bukuri beenu lwasiiriri kanyi mu kimbaangi kyeetu.
2TH.1.11	Hango-nkuumbu, beetu tunamitina kusaambila mu beenu, mpisi heki Nzaambi yeetu kamono ti, beenu lwayelemene na mbila yi kari kaluteele, na mu mpinu dzaandi kakukisa nzala yoyinso yakuyirika mamabwe yiri mu beenu, na kisalu kya kanyi. 
2TH.1.12	Bubwo, nkuumbu Mfumu yeetu Yesu, yiba yakeembese mu beenu, na beetu se tuba twakeembese mu nde, bunu buri bweese bwa Nzaambi yeetu, na bwa Mfumu Yesu Kiristo.
2TH.2.1	Ngo mu mitariri nyisulu Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo, na kukutukuna kuri nde, bampaangi, beetu tululoombo ti: 
2TH.2.2	yaa luwasula kumono mutima mambaawu ko, na yaa luba na boomo ko mu mbikululu, mu nyikusulu, bunu pe mu mukaanda wu baleele ti wafumuna kuri beetu; bunu ti kiluumbu kya Mfumu ki mwaakwiisa. 
2TH.2.3	Muutu yaa kaluwuna mu ntoono ti mosi ko. Kiteesu kya nyekululu kanyi mu Nzaambi kyakiri kutekesele kwiisa, na muutu wahele na mangisi wakiri kumonokono, mwaana wa mfukusulu. 
2TH.2.4	Wunde wutelemese kitaatu, na wudzaangama ha busu bwa mpisi ki baleeriri ti Nzaambi bunu pe ki basaambilaana, natee mu kiteesu kya kudzakala mu nzo Nzaambi, na kuleele nde-meene ti nde ngo Nzaambi. 
2TH.2.5	Beenu lwahele kubaambuka mwooyo ti me nyaluyaabisiri dyo, ha nyaba nyakiri kuri beenu? 
2TH.2.6	Ngo mu lumalu beenu luyaari kikyo kyamukangikila, mpisi nde kaba kumonokono munu mu kilookolo kya nde-meene. 
2TH.2.7	Mukwongo, mpaanu ya mamabi yeki mu kwesala; ngo kasi wunde wamukangikila yelemini kuba wayisila. 
2TH.2.8	Tumi, wahele na mangisi kaba wamonokono, na hanaho Mfumu [Yesu] kamudzusula mu muheebulu wupala mu munwa waandi, na kamudziimbisila mu kumonokono kwa nyisulu yaandi. 
2TH.2.9	Nyisulu wahele na mangisi sa yayirimina mu makwa ma Saatana, mu biyiriki bya mpinu, na bidiimbu, na bimaangu byampya, 
2TH.2.10	na kunsa mawunu momanso, ma bubayi kuri babo bari mu kudziimbila, bukuri bahele kutaambula ntiilu ya ngwanwa mu kuba babvuuka. 
2TH.2.11	Hango-nkuumbu, Nzaambi wuri mu kubaheekele makwa ma kuwumuka, mpisi basiila kanyi mu mpya. 
2TH.2.12	Mpisi heki, bobanso bahele kusa kanyi mu ngwanwa, ngo bamono kiminu mu bubayi, baba batsuundisa.
2TH.2.13	Beetu ngo bari, tuyelemini kubvutula matoondo kuri Nzaambi mpisi ntaangu, mu ntoono beenu bampaangi batya kuri Mfumu, bukuri Nzaambi walusoolo bunu mintekesele, mu kuba babvuuka kunsa bungisi buluha Mpeeve, na kanyi mu ngwanwa. 
2TH.2.14	Mu didyo, Nzaambi kari kaluteele mbila mu Musamu Wamubwete wu turi twaluyikisa, mu kubaka nkeembu ya Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo. 
2TH.2.15	Hango-nkuumbu, bampaangi, beenee bakwiikama na kebeenu kikulu ki lwataamburi kuri beetu, mu ndzonsulu bunu pe mu mukaanda.
2TH.2.16	Hemese Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo nde-meene, na Taayi dyeetu Nzaambi, watutya na watuha mu bweese bwaandi, mboondulu ya bibvu ngo bibvu na nsiitu yayibwete, 
2TH.2.17	kaboondo mitima myeenu, na kalukumisa mu biyiriki byobinso, na mu nzoonsulu dzadzibwete.
2TH.3.1	Mu misiiri, bampaangi, saambileenu mu beetu, mpisi heki maampu ma Mfumu maba mayabakana na maba makeembele bunu bu mari kuri beenu. 
2TH.3.2	Saambileenu se mpisi heki beetu tukuuluka mu myooko mya baatu bangaa-kibakala na bari na mutima-bubi; bukuri bobanso bahele na kanyi. 
2TH.3.3	Ngo Mfumu wakwiikama, nde sa kalukumisa na kulukala mu Ngaa-bubi. 
2TH.3.4	Beetu turi na kanyi mu Mfumu mu ntoono beenu, bukuri mamo ma turi mu kulutumaa, beenu luri mu kumayirakaa, na sa lwanamitina kumayirika.
2TH.3.5	Hemese Mfumu kutwaalisa mitima myeenu mu ntiilu ya Nzaambi, na mu kifiki kya Kiristo.
2TH.3.6	Bampaangi, beetu tululoombiri mu nkuumbu ya Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo, mu kutatuku la na mpisi mpaangi yi kwedyaatila kunsa kisaangila, kwahele kuyelemene na kikulu ki lwataambula kuri beetu. 
2TH.3.7	Beenu-meene luyaari bunu bwa kusombosolo beetu. Bukuri beetu twasii kunatina kidziingu kunsa kisaangila ha kakati dya beenu ko. 
2TH.3.8	Beetu twasii kudya byandya bya muutu kwa buunu ko; ngo kunsa kisalu kya makwa na kunsa mpasi, butsuku na mwiini, beetu twasala mpisi heki mu beenu, muutu kahele kutubuungula. 
2TH.3.9	Kari bukuri ti beetu twaba twahele na miswa ko, ngo beetu twaba tutiiri kulusoongo mu beetu-meene kifwaani kyayelemene kunama. 
2TH.3.10	Mukwongo, mu ntaangu yi twaba kuri beenu, beetu twaba luleelaana ti: mbuti muutu katiiri kusala ko, lo yaa kadya se ko.
2TH.3.11	Ngo beetu turi mu kweyuka ti bakaka mu beenu, bari mu kwedyaatila kunsa kisaangila, bahele kwesala, kasi bakwenama misamu myominso. 
2TH.3.12	Beetu tuloombo na tusyaamisa baatu ba bubwo, mu nkuumbu ya Mfumu Yesu Kiristo ti: basala mu kidzuunu mu kubaka bya kudya bya bo-meene.
2TH.3.13	Beenu ngo bari, bampaangi, yaa luholo-bito ko mu kuyirika mamabwe. 
2TH.3.14	Mbuti kuri muutu wahele kutambikila ma turi mu kuleele beetu mu mukaanda wu, lo kebee dyo mu kuhele kubweese kuba kintwaari na wa bubwo, mpisi kamono nsoni. 
2TH.3.15	Ya lumuhololo bunu mutaatu ko, ngo museembeenu bunu mpaangi.
2TH.3.16	Hemese Mfumu ya kiyeengi, nde-meene kaluha kiyeengi, mu mantaangu momanso na mu myominso. Mfumu kaba na beenu-banso.
2TH.3.17	Mboto yi ya mu kooko kwa meme Pawulo, kidiimbu mu mpisi mukaanda, wunkootinaa kiri bumabu.
2TH.3.18	Hemese bweese bwa Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo buba na beenu-banso.
1TI.1.1	Pawulo, ntumu Yesu Kiristo, bunu buri lutumu lwa Nzaambi mubvuukisi weetu, na lwa Yesu Kiristo, nsiitu yeetu.
1TI.1.2	Kuri Timoteho mwaana wangwanwa mu kanyi: bweese, ngebe na kiyeengi bifumunaa kuri Nzaambi Taata, na kuri Kiristo Yesu, Mfumu yeetu, biba na ye.
1TI.1.3	Bunu bu nyabee kuleele, ha nyabee kweende me ku Makedonya, dzakala ku Efeso, mpisi heki wedika babamosi, yaa beyikisa nyikusulu dzikimi ko, 
1TI.1.4	yaa bakaangama mu bimpa, na mu miloongo mya kinkaaka myahele kusuka; myominso mimyo mitwaalaana nkalikisi, ha kibeendu kya kukukisa kitsimi kya Nzaambi kiri mu kanyi. 
1TI.1.5	Mufunu ntumunu yimayi, wuri mu kuri ti luba na ntiilu yifumunaa mu mutima watsyeemeke, nsimunu yayibwete, na kanyi dyahele bumpitu-bumpyoongo. 
1TI.1.6	Babamosi bayeki batatuka la na mamo, na badziimbila kunsa nzoonsulu dzahele mufunu. 
1TI.1.7	Bo batiiri kuba bayikisi ba mangisi, kasi bahele kubakula mi bari mu kuleele, na mi bari mu kuyirika kutswiikisa.
1TI.1.8	Beetu tuyaari kuri ti mangisi mari mamabwete, mbuti muutu wumasalila kwakubwete. 
1TI.1.9	Tuyaabeenu ti mangisi bahele kumaha mu ntoono basuunguma, ngo mu ntoono bahele na mangisi, na bahele kutumuma, bahele na kinzaambi, bangaa-masumu, bahele na kanyi, bangaa-saana, bakwedzusa bataayi na banguri, badzusi ba baatu, 
1TI.1.10	bangaa-buyala, babakala bakweta kimpala na bambaasi babakala, baatu bakweyarika bankutu, bangaa-mpya, bakwelaba-maalu ma mpya, na bakweyirika mari kitaatu na nyikusulu dzadzibwete, 
1TI.1.11	dzayelemene na Musamu Wamubwete wu bari bayakisa me, wa nkeembu ya Nzaambi ya kiminu.
1TI.1.12	Me nyibvutula matoondo kuri wunde wampa makwa, Yesu Kiristo, Mfumu yeetu, bukuri nde wamwiini ti me nyayelemene mu kunsuusa mu kisalu. 
1TI.1.13	Mu ntaangu yaluta me nyaba ngaa-bitari, ngaa-nkwaamusu, na ngaa-kinwa, kasi nde wambakila ngebe, bukuri me nyaba nyahele na nyaabulu, na nyaba kweyirika mamo kwahele kanyi. 
1TI.1.14	Ngo bweese bwa Mfumu yeetu bwabuukila, ha kimosi na kanyi na ntiilu yiri mu Kiristo Yesu. 
1TI.1.15	Maampu mamama mayelemene mu kusiila kanyi, na kumataambula mu mutima ndemunso ti: Kiristo Yesu wayisa ha nsi mu kubvuukisa bangaa-masumu, mu bo me watete. 
1TI.1.16	Hango-nkuumbu, me bambakila ngebe, mpisi heki mu me watete, Kiristo Yesu kasoongo kifwaani kya nkindusulu-mutima yoyinso, kuri basiila kanyi mu nde, mu kutaambula kidziingu kyahele manunu. 
1TI.1.17	Kuri Mbyaasi ya mantaangu momanso, yiri kafwaana ko, bamumonaa ko, Nzaambi yomosi kitsu, kuba lukiinsu na nkeembu mu bibvu ngo bibvu, Amene.
1TI.1.18	Ntumunu yi nyiri mu kuha kuri ye mwaana waami Timoteho, bunu buri mbikululu dzi bari batekesele kuleele mu ntoono ye, kuri ti, mu dzo, ye nwaana nwaanunu yayibwete, 
1TI.1.19	bu wuri na kanyi na nsimunu yayibwete. Nsimunu yiyo babamosi bayeki bayilooso, na mu mitariri kanyi bo bayeki bapatuka mu maampa. 
1TI.1.20	Mu bo, kuri Imenayo na Alekandere, ba nyiri nyayekele kuri Satana, mpisi baba baseembu na bahele kubweese kwesaana Nzaambi.
1TI.2.1	Me nyilusyaamisa tekesele myominso, mu kusa ndoombulu, nsaambulu, nyingukulu, na mvutukulu matoondo mu baatu bobanso, 
1TI.2.2	mu bambyaasi, na mu bobanso bari na lutumu, mpisi tubeeneenu na kidziingu kya mpolo na kidzuunu, kunsa kinzaambi kyokinso na lukiinsu lwolunso. 
1TI.2.3	Mamo mari mamabwete na ma kiminu ha busu bwa Nzaambi mubvuukisi weetu, 
1TI.2.4	nde tiiri ti baatu bobanso babvuuka na biisa kunyaabulu ya ngwanwa. 
1TI.2.5	Mukwongo, Nzaambi mosi kitsu yiri, na munkabu-kati se mosi kitsu wuri, ha kakati dya Nzaambi na baatu, munkabu-kati wunde muutu kari, ngo Kiristo Yesu. 
1TI.2.6	Nde waheeri kikori ngo nyutu yaandi, mu kukuula baatu bobanso, kikyo ngo kimbaangi mu ntaangu yayelemene. 
1TI.2.7	Mu kimbaangi kikyo me bari bansuusa mu kuba dingisi na ntumu, mu kweyikisa makaanda mu nzila ya kanyi na ya ngwanwa; me ngwanwa nyiri mu kuleele, nyahele kufuta mpya. 
1TI.2.8	Ngo me ntiiri ti babakala besaambila mu mpisi kibeendu, kuri banaanguna myooko myatsyeemeke, kwahele nkesi na nkalikisi.
1TI.2.9	Me ntiiri se ti bakyeetu baba na ndwaatulu yayelemene, ya kibvumi na ya soongolo. Yaa babweeye mu mimpandi, mu bitotolo bya woolo bunu pe misaanga, na binkuta bya ntalu yalaka ko, 
1TI.2.10	kasi byayelemene kuri bakyeetu basalilaa kibvumi kya Nzaambi, ngo mu kubweeye mu biyiriki byabibwete. 
1TI.2.11	Wa mukyeetu kanama nyikusulu kuri wawura, mu kutumuma kwokunso. 
1TI.2.12	Me nyahele kuha miswa kuri wa mukyeetu mu kuyikisa, ti mu kutuma wa mubakala, ngo kaba wawura. 
1TI.2.13	Mukwongo, watete wu bayirikiri Adami, tumi Eva. 
1TI.2.14	Kari Adami watambukiri mawunu ko, ngo kasi wa mukyeetu watambukiri mawunu na kusinina mangisi. 
1TI.2.15	Ngo nde sa kaba wabvuuka mu ntoono mbutulu, mbuti namitini kuba mu kanyi, mu ntiilu, na mu bungisi, kunsa nkulukulu.
1TI.3.1	Maampu mamama mayelemene mu kusiila kanyi. Mbuti muutu wuri na nzala kusala kisalu kya bukuutu bwa dibuundu, lo kisalu kyakibwete katiiri. 
1TI.3.2	Mukuutu dibuundu yelemini kuba wahele na di bamuseembele, mulumi wuri na mukasi mosi, wuri na ndiilu na nwiinu byayelemene, wasoongolo, wakiinsuma, mutaamburi-banzeense, wakuka mu kuyikisa; 
1TI.3.3	yaa kaba yaa-kinwi ko, yaa kaba se ngaa-bikiindu ko, ngo kasi kaba wadzuuna, wahele kweyumusa baatu, na wahele na ntiki-mboongo. 
1TI.3.4	Nde yelemini se kutwaalisaa nzo ya nde-meene kwa kubwete, wusuusaa baala kunsa lutumu na kunsa kibvumi kyokinso. 
1TI.3.5	Mukwongo, mbuti muutu wahele kuyaaba kutwaalisa nzo ya nde-meene, lo buri katsiitsa kutwaalisila dibuundu dya Nzaambi? 
1TI.3.6	Yaa kaba se wamoono mu dibuundu ko; mpisi heki masiiku mahele kumudzusa miisu, na kahele kubwa mu mutsuundu wu batsuundisila dyabulu. 
1TI.3.7	Yelemini kuba se na kimbaangi kyakibwete kimuteelile bari ku mbasi, mpisi kahele kufwa nsoni na kubwa mu siinga dya dyabulu.
1TI.3.8	Bisari se bwobumosi, bayelemini kuba bakiinsuma, bahele na ndima dzoolo, bahele na nwiinunu malu ya makwa, na bahele kwebakila mboongo mu bumbabu. 
1TI.3.9	Bayelemini kukebe mpaanu dza kanyi mu mutima wa mutsiina. 
1TI.3.10	Bayelemini kutekesele kubafyoongokono; tumi basala kisalu kya dibuundu, mbuti bahele na mi babaseembele. 
1TI.3.11	Bakyeetu se bwobumosi, bayelemene kuba bakiinsuma, bahele na makele, bari na ndiilu na nwiinu byayelemene, bakwiikama mu myominso. 
1TI.3.12	Bisari biyelemini kuba, balumi bari mukasi mosi, batwaalisa baala na manzo ma bo-meene kwa kubwete. 
1TI.3.13	Mukwongo, babo basala kisalu kya dibuundu kwa kubwete, bataambulaana lukiinsu lwalubwete bo-meene, na nsiitu dzadzinene kunsa kanyi mu Kiristo Yesu.
1TI.3.14	Me nyikutinina misamu mimami, bu nyiri na nsiitu mu kwiisa kuri ye mu mawasu; 
1TI.3.15	mpisi heki, ti hayuku me nziingiri mu kwiisa, lo ye yaaba bunu bwa kudyaatila mu nzo ya Nzaambi, yiri dibuundu dya Nzaambi yamwooyo, kuunsi na kitsuku kya ngwanwa. 
1TI.3.16	Diri dyayabakana ti, mpaanu dza kinzaambi dziri dzadzinene:
1TI.3.16	Kiristo,
1TI.3.16	wamonikini mu muswinyi,
1TI.3.16	Mpeeve wasoongiri kuri ti nde wasuunguma,
1TI.3.16	bambasi bamumono,
1TI.3.16	bamuyabikisa kuri makaanda,
1TI.3.16	bamusiila kanyi mu nsi,
1TI.3.16	bamunata ku yulu mu nkeembu.
1TI.4.1	Mpeeve wuyirika luleele ti: mu mantaangu ma nsukulu, babamosi sa bayekele kanyi, mu kukaangama mu mampeeve ma mawunu, na mu nyikusulu dza mampeeve mamabi, 
1TI.4.2	mu bumpitu-bumpyoongo bwa bangaa-mpya, bayeki na bidiimbu byasa mu kiseengu kya mbaawu, mu mitima mya bo-meene, 
1TI.4.3	bakwekabikisa nkweelulu, na bakweha mangisi mu byandya biri Nzaambi wayirika, mu kuri ti baatu bakwiikama na bamwayaaba ngwanwa, badya mu mvutukulu matoondo. 
1TI.4.4	Mukwongo, mpisi kiyiriki kya Nzaambi kyakibwete, kuri kya kulooso ko mbuti bakihoriri mu mvutukulu matoondo; 
1TI.4.5	bukuri byobinso bibakaa bungisi mu maampu ma Nzaambi na mu lusaambulu.
1TI.4.6	Wubaangulaana misamu mimyo kuri bampaangi, lo ye sa ba kisari kyakibwete kya Kiristo Yesu, kyadiisulu mu maampu ma kanyi, na mu nyikusulu dzadzibwete, dzi wuri mu kunama kwa kubwete. 
1TI.4.7	Ngo looso mankuma ma bungooyi na ma bakyeetu ba binuni. Yende wetsitsikila bwa kubeele na kinzaambi ye-meene. 
1TI.4.8	Mukwongo, kutsitsikila kwa nyutu, kuri mufunu mu myantele; ngo kasi kuba na kinzaambi kuri mufunu mu myominso, kuri na lusiilulu lwa kidziingu kya lumalu, na kya ku mankula. 
1TI.4.9	Maampu mamama mayelemene mu kusiila kanyi, na kumataambula mu mutima ndemunso. 
1TI.4.10	Mukwongo, mbuti turi mu kwebama na kwenwaana, lo bukuri twasa nsiitu mu Nzaambi yamwooyo, yiri mubvuukisi baatu bobanso, mbiki ti bari na kanyi.
1TI.4.11	Ye yelemini kutuma na yikisa misamu mimyo. 
1TI.4.12	Muutu yaa kasaana butuuti bwa ye ko, ngo soongo kifwaani kuri bangaa-kanyi, mu nzoonsulu, mu ndyaatulu, mu ntiilu, mu kanyi, na mu bungisi. 
1TI.4.13	Natee ku nyikwiisa me, sa mutima mu ntaangulu, mu nsyamusunu, na mu nyikusulu. 
1TI.4.14	Yaa nyaafuna kikabu kya bweese kiri mu ye ko, ki bari bakuha mu mbikululu, mu ntetukulu myooko mya kintwaari kya bakulu ba babakala. 
1TI.4.15	Salila mamo, heele mutima mpisi bobanso bamono ti kisalu kya ye kiri mu kubuuka. 
1TI.4.16	Sa madyeele ye-meene, na mu nyikusulu. Namitina kusalila bubwo; bukuri wusalilaana bubwo, lo ye sa wabvuuka ye-meene, na sa wabvuukisa babo bakuywiila.
1TI.5.1	Yaa seembe wa kinuni mu kibakala ko, ngo musyaamisa bunu ti taayi, hololo minkuula bunu bampaangi, 
1TI.5.2	bakyeetu babuuka, bahololo bunu banguri, bantuumba bunu bibusi, kunsa bungisi bwobunso.
1TI.5.3	Kiinsa bafwiilila balumi, bari bafwiiri bangwanwa. 
1TI.5.4	Mbuti mufwiiri wuri na baala bunu pe bateekulu, lo batekesele kuyika bwa kusalila kinzaambi mu nzo ya bo-meene, na mamo ma bayelemini kuyirika kuri bataayi na banguri, bukuri mimyo myabweeye ha busu bwa Nzaambi. 
1TI.5.5	Wunde wuri mufwiiri wangwanwa, lo wunde wayeki wasaala nde mukaka, wasa nsiitu mu Nzaambi, na wunamitinaana mu ndoombulu na mu nsaambulu, butsuku na mwiini. 
1TI.5.6	Ngo kasi, mufwiiri wuri na kidziingu kya minkeembu, lo wafwa ti hayuku wuri mwooyo. 
1TI.5.7	Mimyo ye yelemini kubatuma, mpisi bahele kuba na mi babaseembele. 
1TI.5.8	Mbuti muutu wahele kwebuungula ba nde-meene, mbiki ti ba mu nzo yaandi, lo nde tunini kanyi dyaandi na bvuriri mutima-bubi ti na mungooyi.
1TI.5.9	Mufwiiri mu kuba watinu nkuumbu mu mukaanda, yelemini kuba na mibvu myaluta makuumi masaamunu, na waba mukasi wa bakala dimosi, 
1TI.5.10	wayabakana mu biyiriki byabibwete, wayeki wabuukisa baala, wataambula banzeense, waswaaka miilu mya bangisi, wabakisa bari mu ngebe, na wasa mutima mu mpisi kiyiriki kyakibwete.
1TI.5.11	Ngo kasi, bwafwiiri bakiri mu buntuumba, lo ye kusa kubawuungula, bukuri mbuti bo batelimisi kitaatu na Kiristo mu ntoono manzala maaku, lo beki na nzala kukweele, 
1TI.5.12	na bari kunsa mutsuundu, bukuri bamwaayekele kanyi dyatete. 
1TI.5.13	Ha yulu haho se, bilyeebe bari, bo misamu kweyaabila mu kweyende kyaatu-kyaatu mu manzo ma baatu; ngo kari bini bilyeebe bari ko, kasi bangaa-lusuku na bangaa-kintori se, bakweleele myahele kuyelemene. 
1TI.5.14	Ngo me ntiiri ti bafwiiri bakiri mu buntuumba bakweele, babuta baala, batwaalisa manzo maaku, na yaa baha mpwaani ti mosi ko kuri mutaatu mu kudzoonso mamabi. 
1TI.5.15	Mukwongo, bafwiiri babamosi beki bawumuka mu kwenama Satana. 
1TI.5.16	Mbuti kuri mukyeetu ngaa-kanyi wuri na bafwiiri mu kaanda, lo kababakisa, na yaa kayekele kisalu kuri dibuundu ko, mpisi heki dibuundu kabakisa babo bari bafwiiri bangwanwa.
1TI.5.17	Bakulu ba babakala bari mu kwetwaalisa kwa kubwete, bayelemini kutaambula lukiinsu lwa biteesu byoolo, mbiki ti bakwemono mpasi mu maampu na mu nyikusulu. 
1TI.5.18	Mukwongo, Matinu maleele ti: «Ngoombo mbuti yiri mu kudzabata mankono, lo kumukaanga pe munwa.» Na ti: «Kisari kiyelemini kubaka mufutu waandi.» 
1TI.5.19	Yaa taambula ko ti bafuunda mukulu-bakala kuri ye, mbuti ka ha busu bwa bambaangi boolo bunu pe batatu ko. 
1TI.5.20	Babwiiri mu masumu, lo baseembe ha busu bwa baatu bobanso, mpisi baatu bakaka se baba na boomo.
1TI.5.21	Me nyi kuyingukila ha busu bwa Nzaambi, ha busu bwa Kiristo Yesu, na ha busu bwa bambasi ba Nzaambi ba bari basoolo ti, salila momanso mamo kwahele munsoori na kwahele bubayi. 
1TI.5.22	Yaa tetekele muutu myooko mu mawasu-mawasu ko, na yaa ba kintwaari mu masumu ma ŋani ko; kebe nyutu yaaku kunsa bungisi.
1TI.5.23	Yaa bweese kunwa mani maampa kitsu ko, ngo yende wenwa se mwaa-malu, mu ntoono bubeeru bwa kifunda, na mpololo-bito ya kinsosi-kinsosi.
1TI.5.24	Masumu ma baatu babamosi, mari mayabakana tekesele bateleme ku mutsuundu; ngo kasi kuri bakaka, mo kuyabakana ha mambisa. 
1TI.5.25	Bwobumosi se, biyiriki byabibwete biri byayabakana; ngo byakaka byahele kuyabakana se, ka bitsiitsa kuba byasweeme ko.
1TI.6.1	Bobanso bari mu kihaangu kya bunkutu, bahololo bamfumu baaku mu lukiinsu lwolunso, mpisi heki nkuumbu Nzaambi na nyikusulu bihele kuba byasaanu. 
1TI.6.2	Babo bari bamfumu baaku basiilaa kanyi, yaa babanyaafuna ko bukuri ti bampaangi, ngo kasi babasalila kubvuriri bubwete, bukuri mamabwe mabayirika mamo, kuri bampaangi ba mutima, bangaa-kanyi bari mu kuyirika.
1TI.6.2	Mamo ye yelemini kuyikisa na kutuma. 
1TI.6.3	Mbuti muutu wuri na nyikusulu dzikimi, na wahele kukaangama mu maampu mamabwete ma Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo, na mu nyikusulu dzayelemene na kinzaambi, 
1TI.6.4	lo nde masiiku ma mudzusa miisu, na kayaa kitotolo ko. Nde wuri na bubeeru bwa nkalikisi na mayumu mu misamu. Kukwo kukoofuminaa musoki, nkalikisi, bitari, nsimunu mamabi, 
1TI.6.5	mayumu mahele kuwa ma baatu ba biwulu, bari madyeele mamabi, na bahele na ngwanwa, bakwetsima ti kinzaambi nzila ya kubakila ndaandu.
1TI.6.6	Mukwongo, kinzaambi nzila ya kubakila ndaandu, mbuti ye kiminu kwemono munu mu biwuri na byo. 
1TI.6.7	Bukuri twasii twaala kitotolo mu nsi yi ko, mu didyo se katutsiitsa kunata kitotolo ko. 
1TI.6.8	Habaanaa turi na byandya na binkuta, lo twemono kiminu mu bini bibyo. 
1TI.6.9	Ngo babo bari na nzala busina, bakoobwaanaa mu nsindukulu, mu myeete, na mu mburi nyiimunu dza buwulu na dzadzibi, dzikotisaana baatu kunsa mfukusulu na nzimbusulu. 
1TI.6.10	Mukwongo, ntiilu ya mboongo ngo mwaansi wa momanso mamabi; babamosi bakaangama mu yo, bayeki badziimbisa kanyi, na bakomono manyutu maaku mu mburi manyoongi.
1TI.6.11	Ngo ye muutu Nzaambi, bata misamu mimyo. Yende wesaka nsungumunu, kinzaambi, kanyi, ntiilu, nkindusulu-mutima, bundeembu. 
1TI.6.12	Nwaana nwaanunu yayibwete ya kanyi, kwaata kidziingu kya mantaangu momanso ki bari bakuteelele mbila, na ki wuri wateele kimbaangi kyakibwete ha busu bwa bambaangi balaka. 
1TI.6.13	Me nyikuloombiri ha busu bwa Nzaambi, nde wuhaanaa kidziingu kuri bitotolo byobinso, na ha busu bwa Kiristo Yesu, wateeri kimbaangi kyakibweete ha busu bwa Pontyo Pilato: 
1TI.6.14	kebe lutumu kwahele kuba mviindu, na kwahele kuba mi bakuseembele, natee ha kwiisa kumonokono Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo. 
1TI.6.15	Nde mbasi-tsuku, wunde wuri mu lwambwe, wuri mutumi mosi kitsu, mbyaasi ya bambyaasi na Mfumu ya bamfumu, kasoongo mu mantaangu mayelemene. 
1TI.6.16	Kuri wunde wuri, wunu nde kitsu wuri kafwaana ko, wadzakala kunsa buungi buri bwa kukokosolo pe, wuri muutu ti mosi kamumwii ko, na katsiitsa kumumono ko, kuba lukiinsu na mpinu dzahele manunu. Amene.
1TI.6.17	Leele kuri bisina bya ntaangu yimayi, yaa baba na masiiku ko, na yaa basiila nsiitu mu busina bwa mwaa-ntaangu mosi ko, ngo basiila nsiitu mu Nzaambi, nde kootuhaanaa byobinso mu busina mpisi tumono kiminu mu byo. 
1TI.6.18	Baleele bayirika mamabwete, baba bisina mu biyiriki byabibwete, bangaa-kikabu, baatu bayirima mu kukabula, 
1TI.6.19	bari mu kwekutikisa busina ha lufulu lwalubwete mu bo-meene, mpisi heki mu ntaangu yikwiisa, babaka kidziingu kyangwanwa.
1TI.6.20	Ye Timoteho, kebe maampu ma bari bakuha, yende webata nzoonsulu dza bungooyi dza mukangala, na nkalikisi dza madyeele mampya, 
1TI.6.21	mari babamosi munsa kwemasalila, bayeki basasika mu kanyi.
1TI.6.21	Bweese buba na beenu!
2TI.1.1	Me Pawulo, ntumu Kiristo Yesu, mu kutya kwa Nzaambi, bunu buri lusiilulu lwa kidziingu kya mu Kiristo Yesu, 
2TI.1.2	kuri Timoteho, mwaana wa mutima: bweese, ngebe na kiyeengi bifumunaana kuri Taata Nzaambi, na kuri Mfumu yeetu Kiristo Yesu biba na ye.
2TI.1.3	Me nkoobvutulaa matoondo kuri Nzaambi, yiyo yi nyisaambilaa mu mutima watsyeemeke, bunu bwaba saambilaa bakuutu. Nyisalilaa bubwo, mu ntaangu yi nyibambukilaa ye mwooyo, mu nsaambulu dzaami butsuku na mwiini kwahele kuhoto. 
2TI.1.4	Bu nyibaambuka mwooyo mu mansangasa maaku, nyibaana na musoongo walaka wa kumono ye, mpisi mba nyaluula mu kiminu. 
2TI.1.5	Me nyibaambuka mwooyo mu kanyi dyangwanwa diri mu ye, kanyi didyo dyatekisiri kuba mu Lowisi, mwankaaka yaaku ya mukyeetu, na mu nguri yaaku Enike, me nyirikiri kuyaaba ti diri mu ye se. 
2TI.1.6	Mu didyo, me nyikubaambula mwooyo ti: bweese kulula mbaawu mu kikabu kya Nzaambi kiri mu ye, ki wuri wataambula mu ntetukulu myooko mya me. 
2TI.1.7	Mukwongo, Nzaambi kasii kutuha mpeeve ya boomo ko, ngo ya mpinu, ya ntiilu na ya bundeembu.
2TI.1.8	Yaa ba na nsoni ko mu kuta kimbaangi mu Mfumu yeetu, bunu pe mu me nyiri mu bikonyi mu ntoono nde. Kasi mono mpasi ha kimosi na me mu ntoono Musamu Wamubwete, bunu buri mpinu dza Nzaambi. 
2TI.1.9	Nde watubvuukisa, na watuteele mbila yangisi, kari mu ntoono biyiriki byeetu ko, ngo kasi bunu buri bitaasi bya nde-meene na bweese bu kari katuha mu Kiristo Yesu, tekesele mantaangu mahela kuwa. 
2TI.1.10	Bweese bubwo bwayabakana mu lumalu, mu monokunu Mubvuukisi weetu Kiristo Yesu, wunde wasukisa lufwa, na wasa kuri ti mu Musamu Wamubwete bumwooyo buseme na mbolulu yihele kubweese kuba.
2TI.1.11	Mu ntoono Musamu Wamubwete wunde, me bayeki bansa mubikisi, ntumu na muyikisi. 
2TI.1.12	Mu ntoono yiyo se, me nyiri mu kumono mpasi dzimadzi, ngo nyahele na nsoni, bukuri me nyaari mu nani me nyiri nyasa kanyi, na nyabakula ti, nde wakuka mu kukebe maampu ma kari kampa, natee mu kiluumbu kikyo.
2TI.1.13	Holo kifwaani mu maampu mangwanwa ma wuri wayuka kuri me, mu kanyi na ntiilu bya mu Kiristo Yesu. 
2TI.1.14	Kebe maampu mamabwete mawuunguku mu ye, kuri Mpeeve Yangisi yidzakalaa mu beetuneenu.
2TI.1.15	Ye yaari dimadi ti bobanso bari ku Asya banyekele; mu bo kuri Fingelo na Eremongene. 
2TI.1.16	Hemese Mfumu kasa mpemisi mu nzo Onesiforo, bukuri nde wasyaamisini me mu mantaangu momanso, na kasii ba na nsoni ko mu bikonyi bya me, 
2TI.1.17	ngo nde katubukaana ku Loma, nde wasaka me mu kuheme, na wanzuukila. 
2TI.1.18	Hemese Mfumu kamuha miswa mya kutaambula mpemisi kuri Mfumu, mu kiluumbu kikyo. Na kisalu kyokinso ki kari kasala nde ku Efeso, ye-meene bvuriri kuyaaba.
2TI.2.1	Hango mwaana waami, bakila makwa mu bweese buri mu Kiristo Yesu. 
2TI.2.2	Myominso mi wuri wayuka kuri me, ha busu bwa bambaangi balaka, yaabisa myo kuri baatu bakwiikama, bakuka mu kuyikisa myo se kuri bakaka. 
2TI.2.3	Ye se taambula mpasi bunu muyongolo wamubwete wa Kiristo Yesu. 
2TI.2.4	Kuri muutu ko wuri kakotaana mu buyongolo, bweesiri kakaangama mu misamu mya kidziingu, mbuti tiiri kubweeye kuri wunde wa muholo mu kisalu. 
2TI.2.5	Bakoolwiikaana mudzumuni-ntiinu mpu ya ndulukulu ko, mbuti wahele kubvumina mangisi ma ntiinu. 
2TI.2.6	Muhati-manseke wukoomonaa mpasi, nde yelemini kutekesele kutaambula kikuuku kya bimbutu. 
2TI.2.7	Bakula mamo ma nyileele. Mukwongo, Mfumu sa kakuha madyeele mu myominso.
2TI.2.8	Baambuka mwooyo mu Yesu Kiristo, wabutukila mu kaanda dimadi dya Davidi, nde wafuluka mu bafwa, bunu buri Musamu waami Wamubwete, 
2TI.2.9	mu ntoono musamu wunde, me nyiri mu kumono mpasi mu bikonyi, buni muyiriki-mamabi; ngo kasi maampu ma Nzaambi mahele mu bikonyi. 
2TI.2.10	Hango-nkuumbu, me nyiri mu kwekiindisa mutima mu myominso, mu ntoono basoolu, mpisi heki bo se babaka mvuukulu yiri mu Kiristo Yesu, na nkeembu ya mantaangu momanso. 
2TI.2.11	Maampu mamama mayelemene mu kusiila kanyi:
2TI.2.11	«Mbuti tufwiiri kintwaari na nde,
2TI.2.11	lo sa twaba mwooyo kintwaari na nde se;
2TI.2.12	mbuti tukuundiri mpasi kintwaari na nde,
2TI.2.12	lo sa twatuma kintwaari na nde se;
2TI.2.12	mbuti tumutunini, lo nde se sa katutuna;
2TI.2.13	mbuti twahele kukwiikama, nde wuri wakwiikama,
2TI.2.13	bukuri nde lo kabangusina kutuna nyutu ya nde-meene ko.»
2TI.2.14	Babaambula mwooyo mu mamama, wubayingukila ha busu bwa Nzaambi, yaa beyumuna mu bitoolo ko. Mimyo myahele mufunu, mbuti ka wa kudziimbisa baatu bayuka myo ko. 
2TI.2.15	Sa makwa ye-meene, mu kumonokono ha busu bwa Nzaambi, bunu muutu wu bamwaatsiitsa, bunu kisari kihele kufwa nsoni, kikweyikisa maampu mangwanwa mu nyikusulu dzasuunguma. 
2TI.2.16	Bata nzoonsulu dza bungooyi dzamukangala, bukuri bari na nzoonsulu dza bubwo, sa bahamisa kukoto kunsa bungooyi; 
2TI.2.17	nzoonsulu dza bo dziri bunu mputa yibolosa muswinyi, yikweyalamika. Mu bo kuri Imenayo na Fileto, 
2TI.2.18	bo bayeki batatuka na ngwanwa, bu bakweleele ti mfulukulu yayeki yayirima, bakwebwiisa kanyi dya bamosi. 
2TI.2.19	Diri dyangwanwa ti lufulu lwa sa Nzaambi lwa makwa lwateleme, luri na kinyemu kyatina ti: «Mfumu yaari baatu baandi, na wunde wutaangunaa nkuumbu Mfumu, yelemini kutatuka na mamabi.»
2TI.2.20	Munsa nzo yayinene, kari dzini nkoombo dza woolo na dza palata dzikoobaanaa ko, ngo kubaanaa se dza miti, na dza tubuumbu. Dzamosi badzisalilaa mu lukiinsu, ngo dzakaka badzisalilaa kwahele lukiinsu. 
2TI.2.21	Ngo mbuti muutu tsyeemisini nyutu yaandi mu mamabi mamo, lo nde sa kaba lukoombo lwa lukiinsu, lwawuunguku, luri mufunu kuri Mfumu, mu kulusalila mu mpisi ma bayirikaa mamabwete.
2TI.2.22	Yitika mantiilu ma butuuti, saka nsungumunu, kanyi, ntiilu, na kiyeengi mu kintwaari na babo bayingukilaa Mfumu mu mutima watsyeemeke. 
2TI.2.23	Looso nzoonsulu dza buwulu na dza budzeeke, bu yaari kuri ti dzitwaalaa bikiindu. 
2TI.2.24	Kisari kya Mfumu wahele kuyelemene kunwaana, ngo yelemini kuba na musoongo mu baatu bobanso, wakuka mu kuyikisa, na wukuunda mamabi. 
2TI.2.25	Nde yelemini kuyikisa bari na muhaawu, mu bundeembu kuri ti kampe Nzaambi wubaheeri nyiingulu madyeele, mu kuyaaba ngwanwa, 
2TI.2.26	na babvutukila bitsimi byabibwete, na bapala mu siinga dya dyabulu, mu kari kabakaanga, mu kuri ti bayirika ma katii nde.
2TI.3.1	Yaaba dyo ti: mu biluumbu bya nsukulu, mantaangu ma mpasi sa miisa. 
2TI.3.2	Mukwongo, baatu sa baba na kifu, batiiri mboongo, bangaa-nzala-kubila, bangaa-masiiku, bangaa-saana, bari na nko kuri bataayi na banguri, bari batoonda ko, bahele kubvumina bya Nzaambi, 
2TI.3.3	bahele na ntiilu, bahele na kyaari, bangaa-makele, bahele na mangisi, bangaa-bumfuna, bataatu ba mamabwete, 
2TI.3.4	bakweyarika bambaasi, bangaa-kituunsi kya nkesi, bangaa-masiiku mabuunu, babvuriri kutya minkeembu ti na Nzaambi; 
2TI.3.5	bamonokono ti bangaa-kinzaambi, kasi bakwetuna mpinu dza kinzaambi. Tekele ba bubwo mbisa. 
2TI.3.6	Bamosi mu bo bakwekoto mu manzo, na mu masiinga ma bo, bakwebangusina bakyeetu bahele kukiinsuma, bari na kilemu kya masumu, na bakwenama mantiilu ma bitsuumbu-bitsuumbu; 
2TI.3.7	mpisi ntaangu bakweyika, ngo kasi bahele kubangisina kutubuka ku nyaabulu yangwanwa. 
2TI.3.8	Bunu Yanese bo na Yamberese babanwaanisa Moose, bunubwo se baatu bamaba bakwenwaanisa ngwanwa, madyeele ma bo mabiiya, na bo babwa mu mitariri kanyi. 
2TI.3.9	Ngo bo bari nyeendekele la ko, bukuri budzeeke bwa bo, sa bwamonokono ha busu bwa baatu bobanso, bunu bwaba monokono budzeeke bwa Yanese bo na Yamberese.
2TI.3.10	Ngo ye wanemi kwakubwete nyikusulu dzaami, ndyaatulu yaami, bitaasi byaami, kanyi dyaami, nkindusulu-mutima yaami, ntiilu yaami, kifiki kyaami, 
2TI.3.11	nkwamusunu na mpasi dzi nyamono me ku Antyoke, ku Ikonyo, ku Listara. Nkya nkwamusunu me nyahele kumono! Ngo mu dzodzinso Mfumu wankuula. 
2TI.3.12	Ngo bobanso batiiri kunata kidziingu kunsa kinzaambi mu Kiristo Yesu, sa baba bakwaamusu. 
2TI.3.13	Ngo baatu bababi na bangaa-bumpitu-bumpyoongo, sa bahamisa kudyaatila kunsa mabvuriri bubi, mu kwewumuna baatu, bu bari bawumuka bo-meene. 
2TI.3.14	Ngo ye wasiila kanyi mu ma wuri wayika, na ma wuri wabakula ti mangwanwa, bu yaari kuri na, wuri wamayikila. 
2TI.3.15	Kuholosono bulesi bwaaku, Matinu Mangisi ye wumayaari, mo makuka mu kuha ye madyeele, mu kubaka mvuukulu mu kanyi mu Kiristo Yesu. 
2TI.3.16	Momanso matinu, mu ntwalusulu ya Mpeeve ya Nzaambi bari bamatinina, na mari mufunu mu kuyikisa, mu kuseembe, mu kusuungika, mu kutwaalisa mu nsungumunu, 
2TI.3.17	mpisi heki muutu Nzaambi kaba wayirima, na kabaka biri mufunu mu nyirikulu momanso mamabwete.
2TI.4.1	Me nyikuyingukila ha busu bwa Nzaambi, na ha busu bwa Kiristo Yesu, nde wukwiisa kutsuundisa bamwooyo na bafwa, na mu monokunu yaandi na mu kimfumu kyaandi, 
2TI.4.2	yikisa Maampu, landukina mu ntaangu yayelemene na yahele kuyelemene, seembe, ŋaŋina, syaamisa, mu nkindusulu-mutima yoyinso kunsa nyikusulu. 
2TI.4.3	Mukwongo, sa kwaba ntaangu yiri, baatu babweese kukuunda kuyuka nyikusulu dzangwanwa ko, ngo bunu buri mantiilu maaku, bo sa basaka kuba na bayikisi balaka babaleele mi batiiri kuyuka. 
2TI.4.4	Bo sa babisa kuyuka ngwanwa, na sa basyeeteke mu kweyuka mankuma. 
2TI.4.5	Ngo ye, ba wasoongolo mu myominso, kuunda mpasi, sa kisalu kya budingisi, kukisa kisalu kyaaku.
2TI.4.6	Mukwongo, makila ma me meki matsaamuna ha yulu kikabu, na ntaangu ya mweendu waami yimwaatubuka. 
2TI.4.7	Me nyanweeni kikiindu kyakibwete, me mwaamana kudzumuna ntiinu, na nyakebe kanyi. 
2TI.4.8	Mu lumalu, ba mwaampungukila mpu ya nsungumunu, mbasi-tsuku yi nyakisa Mfumu, mutsuundisi wasuunguma, mu kiluumbu kikyo; kari kunu kuri me ko, ngo kuri bobanso se batiiri monokunu yaandi.
2TI.4.9	Ba na malwangukila mu kwiisa kuri me mu mawasu. 
2TI.4.10	Mukwongo, Dema wanyekele, mu lumalu nde weki kutya kwaandi misamu mya ntaangu yimayi, na wayensi ku Tesalonika; Kereseke ngo wuri wayensi ku Ngalatya, na Tito ku Dalamatya. 
2TI.4.11	Wuni Luka kitsu wuri na me. Holo Malako, mpisi lwiisa beenu boolo, mutwaala, bukuri nde wuri mufunu kuri me, mu ntoono kisalu. 
2TI.4.12	Me nyaheekiri Tikiko ku Efeso. 
2TI.4.13	Mu ntaangu yi wukwiisa, ntwaalikila kiyuungu ki nyasisiri ku Torowasi ku nzo Karpo, na mikaanda, mbiki ti myayiriku mu mikaanda mya bibulu. 
2TI.4.14	Alekandere, mutsuri-biseengu, wamonisini me mpasi dzalaka. Mfumu sa kamubvutukila mamo mayelemene na biyiriki byaandi. 
2TI.4.15	Ngo ye se, sa madyeele mu nde, bukuri nde wanwaanisini maampu meetu mu kiteesu kyamakwa.
2TI.4.16	Ha nyaba nwaanikina me buungu dyaami mu lwatete, kuri muutu ti mosi ko wambakisiri, ngo bobanso banyekiri. Ngo yaa babaka mafuumbu mu mimyo ko. 
2TI.4.17	Mfumu wambakisiri na wampeeri makwa, mpisi heki mu munwa me, maampu maba mayaabusu mu kiteesu kyakuka, na maba mayukukuna kuri makaanda momanso. Me bankuuriri mu munwa nkosi. 
2TI.4.18	Mfumu sa kankuula mu momanso mamabi ma banyirikila, na sa kamvuukisa mu kunkotoso mu kimfumu kyaandi kya mayulu. Nkeembu yiba kuri nde mu bibvu ngo bibvu! Amene.
2TI.4.19	Ha mboto kuri Piriska, kuri Akila, na ku nzo ya Onesiforo. 
2TI.4.20	Erasto wasii saala ku Korinto. Torofimo me nyamusisiri wabeele ku Mileto. 
2TI.4.21	Sa makwa mu kwiisa, tekesele ntaangu ya kyoosi yitubuka. Ebulo, Pude, Lino, Kolodya, na bampaangi bobanso bakuheekiri mboto. 
2TI.4.22	Hemese Mfumu kaba na kiluunsi kya ye! Bweese buba na beenu!
TIT.1.1	Me Pawulo, nkutu Nzaambi, ntumu Yesu Kiristo mu mitariri kanyi dya basoolu ba Nzaambi, na mu mitariri nyaabulu ngwanwa bunu buri kinzaambi, 
TIT.1.2	mu nsiitu dza kidziingu kya bibvu ngo bibvu kiri Nzaambi, nde wahele kuba ngaa-mpya, wasa nsiilulu tekesele mantaangu ma bibvu ngo bibvu. 
TIT.1.3	Nde wamonokoso maampu maandi, mu ntaangu yikatsimini nde-meene, mu nyaabusulu yibari batiisila me, bunu buri lutumu lwa Nzaambi, mubvuukisi weetu. 
TIT.1.4	Hemese bweese na kiyeengi, bifumunaa kuri Nzaambi Taata, na kuri Kiristo Yesu Mubvuukisi weetu, biba kuri ye Tito, mwaana waami wangwanwa mu kanyi dya ntwaari.
TIT.1.5	Me nyasiisiri ye ku Kerete mu ntoono yiri ti, ye saa mana kubweeyese misiiri, na kusuusa mu mpisi bvula bakulu ba babakala, bunu bu nyakutumini me; 
TIT.1.6	mbuti kubakimini muutu wahele na ntoono yi bamuseembele, wuri na mukasi mosi, wuri na baala bari na kanyi, bahele na kibila mu ndyaatulu, bunu pe bahele na nko. 
TIT.1.7	Mukwongo, mukuutu dibuundu wukebaa bya Nzaambi, kayelemini kuba na ntoono yi bamuseembele ko, wahele na masiiku, kari ngaa-mankesi ko, kari yaa-kinwi ko, kari ngaa-bikiindu ko, na kari wukwebakilaa mu bumbabu ko. 
TIT.1.8	Ngo nde yelemini kuba mutaamburi-banzeense, nduku mamabwe, wasoongolo, wasuunguma, wangisi, yaa kukebe nyutu yaandi. 
TIT.1.9	Nde yelemini kuba se wakaangama mu maampu ma bayelemene kusiila kanyi, mpisi kaba wakuka mu kusyaamisa baatu mu nyikusulu dzadzibwete, na mu kutungukila se babo bari na muhaawu.
TIT.1.10	Mukwongo, bangaa-nko, bangaa-nzoonsolo dzahele mufunu, na bangaa-mawunu balaka bari, mbiki ti ha kakati dya bateende bubakala. 
TIT.1.11	Ba bubwo bayelemene kubakaangisa minwa, bukuri bari mu kwekotoso kisaangila munsa makaanda mansiina. Bakweyikisa myahele kuyelemene, mu kubaka mufutu wa bumbabu. 
TIT.1.12	Mosi mu bo, wuri mubikiri wa bo-meene waleele ti: Bari Kerese, mpisi ntaangu bangaa-mpya, bibulu byabibi, bilyeebe biri kisalu kunu kudya."
Kimbaangi kimaki kiri kyangwanwa. Mu dyaambu didyo, ye yelemini kubaseembe mu makwa, mpisi baba bakuma mu kanyi,
bahele kwekaangama mu mankuma ma Bayudayo, na mu ntumunu dza baatu babisa kusalila ngwanwa.
Kuri babo batsyeemeke, lo byobinso byatsyeemeke; kuri babo bayeki babviimfuka na bahele na kanyi, lo kuri ti kimosi kyatsyeemeke ko; ngo madyeele ma bo na nsimunu bo byayeki byasumuka.
Bo bakweleele ti bayaari Nzaambi, ngo mu biyiriki bo bakwemutuna. Bo bayeki nkeensu na bangaa-tungu, bakoono kuyirika ntoono ti yimosi yayibwete.
Ye ngo wuri leele, myayelemene na nyikusulu dzadzibwete.
Babakala ba binuni baba na ndiilu na nwiinu byayelemene, baba bakiinsuma, basoongolo, bakuma mu kanyi, mu ntiilu, na mu kifiki.
Bakyeetu ba binuni se bwobumosi, mu kidziingu kya bo basoongo nzelu yayelemene mu bangisi. Yaa baba na makele ko, yaa baba bankutu ba nwiinu malu ya mawaamba ko, ngo baba bayikisi ba mamabwe,
mpisi heki bayikisa bantuumba, bwakutiila balumi na baala,
baba basokomo, bakiinsa manyutu maaku, bakwesa bisalu mu nzo, babweeye mutima, bakwetumuma kuri balumi baaku, mpisi heki maampu ma Nzaambi mahele kuba masaanu.
Syaamisa minkuula se bwobumosi, baba basokomo
mu myominso. Ye-meene se, soongo kifwaani mu biyiriki byabibwete, nsyemukunu na lukiinsu kunsa nyikisulu.
Maampu ma ye hemese maba matsyeemeke, mahele na bwa kumanwaanisina, mpisi heki bataatu bafwa nsoni, bahele kubaka ntoono yayibi yi batuseembele.
Bankutu baba batumuma kuri bamfumu ba bo-meene mu myominso, baba na mbweeyulu, yaa baba na muhaawu ko,
yaa beyiba ko, ngo bamonokoso mu myominso kanyi dyadibwete, mpisi babweeyese mu myominso, nyikusulu dza Mubvuukisi weetu Nzaambi.
Mukwongo, bweese bwa Nzaambi Mubvuukisi, bwamonokono kuri baatu bobanso.
Bwo buri mu kwetuyikisa, mpisi heki bu tubisiri bungooyi na nyiimunu dza nsi, twenata kidziingu kya ntaangu ya lumalu, mu kusokomo, mu nsungumunu na mu kinzaambi,
mu kwekiingila nsiitu yayibwete, na monokunu nkeembu ya Nzaambi wadzaangama, na ya Mubvuukisi weetu Yesu Kiristo.
Nde wayekiri nyutu yaandi mu ntoono beetu, mpisi katukuula mu momanso mamabi, na kutsyemekese kaanda dya nde-meene dyasoolu, diri na kuheme mu biyiriki byabibwete.
Ye yelemini kudzoonsolo mu mamo, kusyaamisa na seembe mu lutumu lwolunso. Muutu yaa kakunyaafuna ko.
Baambula mwooyo kuri bo ti, bayelemini kuba batumuma kuri baatu balukiinsu na kuri bari na lutumu; baba na bintambukulu, na baba bayirima mu mpisi kiyiriki kyakibwete.
Muutu kutuka pe, kuba pe bangaa-bikiindu, baba na bumpoombo, basoongo bundeembu kuri baatu bobanso.

Mukwongo, mu ntaangu yayikulu beetuneenu se twaba biwulu, bangaa-nko, badziimbila, twaba mu bunkutu bwa nyiimunu na biminu bya bitsuumbu-bitsuumbu, twaba kwelutisa ntaangu mu mamabi na mu musoki, twaba baatu bari babele na bakwebelesene bo na bo.
Ngo mu ntaangu yamonokini mbweeyulu na ntiilu ya Nzaambi Mubvuukisi weetu mu baatu,
nde watubvuukisa, kari mu ntoono biyiriki byansuungumunu, bi twaba twayirika ko, ngo mu ngebe dzaandi, mu muswaaka wa mbutukulu yamoono, na mu nkitukulu yamoono ya Mpeeve Yangisi.
Mpeeve yiyo nde kari katsyaamuna ha yulu beetu, kwa mansaalisi mu Yesu Kiristo Mubvuukisi weetu,
mpisi heki mu bweese bwaandi, tuba twalulukusu, na tuba bakondiri ba saala, bunu buri nsiitu dza kidziingu kya bibvu ngo bibvu.

Maampu mamama mayelemene mu kusiila kanyi, na me ntiiri ti ye yirika kutswiikisa dyaambu didyo, mpisi heki bamwaasiila kanyi mu Nzaambi, batsimina na baheele mutima mu biyiriki byabibwete. Mimyo miri myamibwete na miri mufunu kuri baatu.
Yelemini kwebata nkalikisi dza buwulu, miloongo mya kinkaaka, mayumu na kubakana mu mitariri mangisi: bibyo byahele mufunu na byabuunu.
Muutu wukwekotoso nkabunu, wumanaa kumulubula lwatete na lwadzoolo, wumuwuungiri.
Ye yaari kuri ti, muutu wa bubwo wawumuka, wuyirikaa masumu, na wabwiisa nyutu yaandi nde-meene.
Mu ntaangu yi nyisindika me Artema kuri ye, bunu pe Tikiko, lo salila makwa mu kwiisa ku nyiri me ku Nikopoli, bukuri kukwo, me nyiri nyatsima kulutisila ntaangu ya kyoosi.
Ha kuri Dzena, nzoonsi, na Apolo bibari na nzala byo mu budyeengi bwaaku, mpisi heki baba ki bahelele pe.
Baatu ba beetuneenu se, bayelemini kuyika kuheele mutima mu biyiriki byabibwete, mu kubaka bibari na nzala byo bya mufunu, mpisi heki bahele kuba baatu bahele na bimbutu.
Bobanso bari na me hamaha, bakuheekiri mboto. Ha mboto kuri banduku baturi mu kanyi. Bweese buba na beenu-banso.
Me Pawulo, boroko dya Kiristo Yesu, na mpaangi Timoteho, kuri Filemone, mbaasi yeetu ya mutima na ya kisalu,
kuri kibusi Afya, kuri Arkipo, mbaasi yeetu ya binwaanunu, na kuri dibuundu dikutukunaana mu nzo yaaku.
Bweese na kiyeengi bifumunaana kuri Taayi dyeetu Nzaambi, na kuri Mfumu Yesu Kiristo, biba na beenu.
Me nyibvutulaana matoondo, mantaangu momanso, kuri Nzaambi yaami, bu nyikutoolaana mu nsaambulu dzaami,
bu nkooyukaana badzoonsolo mu ntiilu na kanyi bi wuri na byo mu Mfumu Yesu, na mu ntoono bangisi bobanso,
kuri heki kintwaari kya kanyi dyaaku, kiba na keketee mu nyaabulu mamabwe momanso, mari mu beetu mu ntoono Kiristo.
Me nyamwii kiminu kyalaka na nyataamburi mboondulu, mu ntoono ntiilu yaaku; bukuri mu ye mpaangi, mitima mya bangisi myadzuunini.
Mukwongo, bu nyiri na nsiitu dzalaka mu Kiristo, mu kukutuma mamo ma yelemene,
nyibweese kukuyingukila, mu ntoono ya ntiilu, bunu bu nyiri, me Pawulo mu lumalu kinuni, na se boroko dya Kiristo Yesu,
me nyikuyingukila mu ntoono mwaana me wa mubakala, Onesimo, wu nyiri nyabuta kunsa bikonyi.
Mu ntaangu yaluta, nde waba wahele mufunu; ngo mu lumalu, weki mufunu kuri ye na me.
Me mbweesiri kumuheeke kuri ye, nde makila ma me-meene.
Me mbeeri ntiiri kumukebe hari me-meene, mpisi heki, ha kibeendu kya ye, nde kansalila mu ntaangu yi nyiri mu bikonyi, mu ntoono Musamu Wamubwete.
Ngo me nsiiri kutya kuyirika ntoono kwahele kitsimi kya ye ko, mpisi kiyiriki kyaaku kyakibwete, kihele kuba mu kukwiikisa, ngo bunu buri nyukulu yaaku.
Kampe mu ntoono yiyo Onesimo kabeeri wahaambuka na ye mu mwaa ntaangu, mpisi heki, ye wumutaambula kwakinkulu,
kari bunu nkutu ko; ngo bu bvuriri bubwete ti na nkutu, mpaangi ya mutima; mbiki ti mu me, ngo bvula-bvula mu ye, mu kimuutu na mu Mfumu.
Hango-nkuumbu, mbuti ye wuhololo me bunu mbaasi yaaku, lo mutaambula bunu me.
Mbuti nde wakuyirikila mamabi, bunu pe wuri na kibiimbu kya ye, lo ntetikele myo.
Meme Pawulo, ntinini mu kooko kwa me-meene, me sa nyafuta, mu kuhele kuleele kuri ye ti, ye-meene wuri kibiimbu kuri me.
Heehe, mpaangi, nyirikila mamo mu Mfumu. Dzuunisa mutima waami mu Kiristo.
Mu nsiitu mu bintambukulu bya ye, me nyikutinini bu nyaari ti, sa yirika mabvuriri kiteesu ti na ma nyikuleeriri.
Mu ntaangu yo yimosi, yirikila me se kibeendu ki wuntambukila; me nyiri na nsiitu ti mu ntoono nsaambulu dzeenu, me sa bamvutula kuri beenu.
Epafale, mbaasi yaami mu Kiristo Yesu, wu turi mu boroko wukuheekiri mboto;
Malako, Aristarako, Dema, Luka, bakwesala kintwaari na me, se ba kuheekiri mboto.
Hemese bweese bwa Mfumu Yesu Kiristo buba na kiluunsi kya beenu.
Mu ntaangu yayikulu, Nzaambi wadzoonso kuri bataayi beetu mu babikiri, mu dzoonsolo dzalaka na dza bitsuumbu-bitsuumbu.
Mu biluumbu bya mpotulu bimabi, nde wadzoonso kuri beetu mu mwaana wu kari kasa mukondiri bitotolo byobinso, mu nde se kari kayirika nsi.

Nde wuri kuseme kwa nkeembu yaandi, na kifwaani kya nzelu yaandi, nde wakwaata nsi mu mpinu dza maampu maandi; bu kamana kutsyeemese baatu mu masumu, nde wadzakala ha lubakala lwa Mwa-mpuungu kunu kinsongi-yulu.
Mwaana wayeki nkati bvuriri na bambasi, ngo kari kakondolo nkuumbu yibvuriri bubwete na bo.
Mukwongo, Nzaambi wahele kuleele ti kuri mosi mu bambasi ti:
«Ye wuri Mwaana me,
lumalu me nyikubutiri.»
Na wahele bweese kuleele ti:
«Me sa nyaba Taayi kuri nde,
na nde sa kaba Mwaana kuri me.»
Na mu ntaangu yi kabweese kusuusa Mwaana watete mu nsi, nde waleele ti:
«Bambasi ba Nzaambi bobanso bamutsukumina.»
Mu ntoono bambasi, nde waleele ti:
«Nde wusaa bambasi baandi bunu biteembu,
na wusaa bisari byaandi bunu milaka mya mbaawu.»
Ngo kasi mu ntoono Mwaana, nde waleele ti:
«Ho! Nzaambi, mboloko yaaku yiri ya bibvu ngo bibvu.
Na lutumu lwa Kimfumu kyaaku, lutumu lwa nsungumunu.
Ye watya nsungumunu, na wabele bubayi,
mu didyo Nzaambi, Nzaambi yaaku,
kari ka kukila maasi ma kiminu,
na kubvula kutya ye ti na bambaasi baaku.»
Na wabweese kuleele ti:
«Mfumu, ye wuri, kunu mbandukulu, wayirika butoto,
mayulu ngo biyiriki bya myooko myaaku;
byo sa byaluta, ngo kasi ye, bunu wuri,
na byobinso sa byafuuka bunu binkuta;
na ye sa wabifutuka bunu kiyuunga,
na sa byakituka bunu bu kituka kinkuta,
ngo kasi ye wuri bwobumosi, na mibvu mya ye miwa ko.»
Nde wahele kuleele kuri ti mosi mu bambasi ti:
«Dzakala ha lubaka lwa me,
natee ku nyisuusa me, bataatu baaku,
baba nkata-miilu myaaku.»
Bambasi bobanso, mampeeve ma bari baheeke mu kisalu
mu ntoono babo bakondolo mvuukulu.
Hango-nkuumbu, beetu tuyelemini kuhololo mu bunkete bwalaka, mamo ma turi twayuka mpisi tuhele kuwumuka.
Mukwongo, mbuti maampu mayaabisiri bambasi mayende mu mana, na mbuti bobanso basinini mangisi, na basii nko bataamburi museendu wayelemene.
Ngo dyaburi beetu tubvuukila, mbuti tunyaafuni mvuukulu yayinene yiyo, yiri Mfumu wabaandikiri kuyaabisa, tumi babo bayukiri beki tswiikisa kuri beetu,
mu kusiingisa kimbaangi kya Nzaambi mu bidiimbu, mu bimaangu, na biyiriki bya mpinu bya bitsuumbu-bitsuumbu, na mu bikabu bya Mpeeve Yangisi, bunu buri kutya kwaandi.
Mukwongo, kari kuri bambasi ko, nde kari kaha lutumu lwa nsi yikwiisa, yi turi mu kudzoonsolo.
Ngo mu Matinu, muutu mosi wata kimbaangi waleele ti:
«Muutu, na kari, kuri ye wumubambukila mwooyo?
Bunu pe, mwaana muutu na kari, kuri ye wumutsimina?
Ye wamukulula mwaa-kiteesu kibvuriri buntele na kya bambasi,
ye wamulwiika lukoongolo lwa nkeembu na lwa lukiinsu,
ye wasuusa byobinso kunsa bitaambi byaandi.»
Mukwongo, bu kasuusa byobinso kunsa lutumu lwaandi, lo kuri kitotolo ti kimosi ko kyahele kuba kunsa lutumu lwaandi. Mu lumalu, beetuneenu twakiri kumono pe, ti byobinso biri kunsa lutumu lwaandi;

ngo kasi tumono kuri ti, Yesu, wunde wubakuriri mu mwaa-kiteesu kibvuriri buntele, ti na kya bambasi, mu ntoono mpasi dza lufwa, nde bamulwiika lukoongolo lwa nkeembu na lwa lukiinsu, mpisi heki mu bweese bwa Nzaambi, nde kabiimba lufwa mu ntoono baatu bobanso.

Mukwongo, bwaba bwayelemene kuri wunde wuri, byobinso biri mu ntoono ya nde, na byayirimina kuri nde, mu kunata baala balaka mu nkeembu, na kukukisa mvuukulu ya bo, mu mpasi dza wunde wabaandikiri mvuukulu yiyo.
Bukuri muhe bungisi, na bataamburi ba bungisi bobanso, bafumuna mu muutu mosi. Mu ntoono yiyo, nde wahele kumono nsoni mu ku bateele ti bampaangi baandi,
na wuleele ti:
«Me sa nyayaabisa nkuumbu yaaku kuri bampaangi baami,
me sa nyakusiika ha kakati dya dibuundu.»
Na wubweese kuleele ti:
«Me sa nsa nsiitu mu nde.»
Wubweese kuleele ti:
«Me ndewu, na baala ba mpa zaambi.»
Ngo bukuri baala babo bari na nyutu ya muswinyi na makila, na nde se wabaka nyutu ya bubwo, mpisi heki mu lufwa lwaandi, nde kamana makwa ma wunde waba na lutumu mu lufwa, ngo dyabulu,
na kukuula, babo bari mu ntoono boomo bwa lufwa, baba kunsa bunkutu mu kidziingu kyaaku kyokinso.
Mukwongo, diri dyangwanwa ti, nde wahele kwiisa mu kubakisa bambasi ngo mu kubakisa bapalila mu Abalaami.
Mu didyo, nde kaba kafwanikina na bampaangi baandi mu myominso, mpisi kaba mukuutu bangaanga-nzaambi, ngaa-ngebe na wakwiikama mu kisalu kya Nzaambi, mu kufuta masumu ma baatu.
Bukuri, nde-meene bu kamono mpasi, mu nsindukulu, lo wakuka mu kubakisa babo bakotaana mu nsindukulu.
Hango, bampaangi bangisi, beenu luri kintwaari mu mbila ya ku yulu, siilee mutima mu wunde wuri ntumu, na mukuutu bangaanga-nzaambi, wu turi twasiila kanyi, ngo Yesu.
Nde wakwiikama kuri wunde wamusooriri, «bunu bwaba Moose mu nzo yaandi yoyinso.»
Mukwongo, munkeembu wa nde bvuriri bunene ti na wa Moose, bukuri mutuungi-nzo, wubvulaa kubaka lukiinsu ti na nzo yo-meene.
Mukwongo, mpisi nzo yiri yatuungu kuri muutu, ngo watuunga byobinso Nzaambi.
Moose waba wakwiikama mu nzo yaandi yoyinso, bunu kisari mu kuta kimbaangi mu misamu mi baketi kuleele.
Ngo Kiristo, wuri bunu Mwaana mu nzo, na nzo yiyo ngo beetu, mbuti tukebiri kifiki na kimweese kya nsiitu.
Hango-nkuumbu, bunu buleele Mpeeve Yangisi:
«Lolo di, mbuti luyukiri mbeembu yaandi,
lo yaa lukubisa mitima myeenu ko, bunu mu ntaangu ya tungu,
mu kiluumbu kya nsiitsulu ku nsi yankatu,
kuri bataayi ba beenu, baholaa, bakotisiri me mu nsindukulu, mu kutsiitsa me,
na bo bamwiini biyiriki bya me,
mu mibvu makuumi mana.
Hango-nkuumbu, me nyabakiri kiseendu kikyo nkesi,
na me nyaleeriri ti: "Bo bakwewumuka mu mitima mpisi ntaangu,
na bahele kuyaaba manzila maami."
Mu bubwo, me nyalabiri kunsa nkesi dzaami ti:
bo ka bakoto mu mpuumunu yaami ko.»
Seenee madyeele, bampaangi, mpisi kuhele kuba mu beenu muutu ti mosi, wuba na mutima-bubi, wahele na kanyi, wutatuka na Nzaambi yamwooyo,
ngo kasi, syamisineenu beenu na beenu mpisi kiluumbu, mbuti nyabusulu ya «lolo di» bunu yiri, mpisi heki ti mosi mu beenu kahele kukubisa mutima, bu kabwiiri mu mpumukunu ya masumu.
Bukuri beetu turi bakweyeende kintwaari na Kiristo, mbuti tukebiri na keketee kibeendu kyeetu ku mbandukulu natee ku manunu.
Bunu bu diri dyaleele ti:
«Lolo di, mbuti luyukiri mbeembu yaandi,
lo yaa lukubisa mitima myeenu ko, bunu mu ntaangu ya tungu.»
Mukwongo, ba na bari bayukaana mbeembu bayitungukiri? Buri kari bobanso babo bapariri mu Ngipiti, mu ntwalusulu ya Moose ko?
Ba na nde kabakiri nkesi mu makuumi mana ma mibvu? Buri kari babo bayirikiri masumu, bari baholaa bafwiiri mu nsi yankatu ko?
Kuri ba na nde kalabiri ti: «Bo ka bakoto mu mpuumunu yaandi ko», mbuti ka kuri babo basiiri nko ko?
Na beetu tumono ti bo basii kubangisina kukoto ko, mu ntoono kuhele kwa kanyi.
Ngo tuseenee madyeele, lusiilulu lwa kukoto mu mpuumunu yaandi bu lwakiri, muutu mu beenu kahele kumono kuri ti, nde wasaala ku lumperi.

Bukuri beetuneenu, turi babo bataambula Musamu Wamubwete, bunu buri babamosi; ngo kasi, bo basii bakila ndaandu mu maampu ma bayukiri ko, bukuri bo basii bvuutuna mu kanyi, kintwaari na bambaasi bayukiri mo ko.
Mukwongo, beetuneenu bangaa-kanyi, turi mu kukoto mu mpuumunu bunu bu kari kaleele ti:
«Kunsa nkesi dzaami me nyalabiri ti:
Bo ka bakoto mu mpuumunu yaami ko!»
Ti bukuri biyiriki, byawa kuyirima kuholosono kunu mbandukulu nsi.
Mukwongo, mu Matinu mwaleele mu ntoono kiluumbu kyansaamu ti: «Na Nzaambi wawuuma mu kiluumbu kyansaamu mu bisalu byaandi byobinso.»
Na ha kibeendu kinikyo, nde bweese kuleele ti: «Bo ka bakoto mu mpuumunu yaami ko.»
Hango bukuri dyaleele kuri ti, babamosi bakoto mu mpuumunu, na babo batekisiri kutaambula Musamu Wamubwete, bakoto ko mu ntoono nko,
nde wabweese kusoolo kiluumbu «lolo di». Mantaangu bu maluta, nde waleele mu mikuunga mya Davidi, bunu bu katekesele kuleele ti:
«Lolo di, mbuti luyukiri mbeembu yaandi
lo yaa lukubisa mitima myeenu ko.»
Mukwongo, mbuti Yoswa wabakotisiri mu mpuumunu, nkani Nzaambi kaketi kudzoonsolo mu kiluumbu kikimi, ha mambisa haho ko.
Hango, kwakiri kiluumbu kya mpuumunu, mu ntoono baatu ba Nzaambi.
Mukwongo, wunde wukotiri mu mpuumunu yaandi, lo wuumini se mu bisalu byaandi, bunu bwa wuumini Nzaambi mu bisalu byaandi.
Ngo, tubingikileenu mu kukoto mu mpuumunu yiyo, mpisi heki kuhele kuba muutu wubwa bwobumosi mu nko.

Mukwongo, maampu ma Nzaambi mari mwooyo, mari na mpinu, mabvuriri kutwa ti na mpisi saabala dya mabusu moolo, dipaakaa natee haambiri kiluunsi na muheebulu, biyikulu na muluku. Mafyongokinaa, ma kwetsuna muutu, na bitsimi bya mutima.
Kwahele kiyiriki ti kimosi kyahele kumonokono ha busu bwaandi, byobinso biri mpene na byayalulu ha miisu myaandi, kuri nde mbasi-tsuku tuyalimina mabuungu.
Hango, bu turi na mukuutu bangaanga-nzaambi wataba mayulu, Yesu, Mwaana Nzaambi, tukwaatee na keketee kimbaangi kya kanyi.
Mukwongo, mukuutu bangaanga-nzaambi wu turi na nde, wakuka mu kutubakisa mu buyonsi bweetu. Nde bamukotoso mu nsindukulu mu myominso bunu beetuneenu, ngo kasii bwa mu masumu ko.
Hango, tukokosoleenu na nsiitu yoyinso ha teke mboloko ya bweese, mpisi tutaambulee ngebe, na bweese mu kubaka lubakusu mu ntaangu yayelemene.

Mukwongo, mpisi mukuutu bangaanga-nzaambi wasoolu ha kakati dya baatu, na bamusuusa mu kusala mu ntoono baatu mu mitariri Nzaambi, mpisi kaha bikabu na kadzusa bibulu byaha mu kikabu mu ntoono masumu.
Nde wakuka mu kuba na nyukulu, mu bari kunsa lubu na mu badziimbila, bukuri nde-meene se wuri kunsa buyonsi.
Mu ntoono buyonsi bubwo, nde yelemini kudzusa bibulu byaha mu bikabu mu ntoono masumu ma nde-meene na ma baatu.
Kuri muutu wutaambula lukiinsu lulwo mu nde-meene ko, ngo wunu wataambula mbila Nzaambi, bunu Aaloni.
Bunubwo se, Kiristo kasii holo mu nde-meene nkeembu ya kuba mukuutu bangaanga-nzaambi ko, ngo nde wayitaambula kuri wunde waleeriri ti:
«Ye ngo mwaana waami,
lolo di me nyikubutiri.»
Bunu bu kari mu kuleele kwakaka ti:
«Ye wuri ngaanga-zaambi mu mantaangu momanso,
mu kiteesu kya Melekisedeke.»

Nde wuri mu biluumbu bya kidziingu kya muswiini waandi, wasaambila na wayiingikila, mu misaakulu myamila na mansangasa, wunde waba wakuka mu kumubvuukisa mu lufwa, na nde wataambula mvutu mu ntoono kutumuma kwaandi.
Ti bukuri waba Mwaana, nde wayika kuba na bintambukila mu mi kamwiinini mpasi.
Bu kakukisa kiteesu kyaandi, nde wayeki, wunde wuhaanaa mvuukulu ya mantaangu momanso, kuri bobanso bamutambukilaa.
Nzaambi waleele mu nde ti, mukuutu bangaanga-nzaambi mu kiteesu kya Melekisedeke.
Mu ntoono yiyo beetu turi na myalaka mya kuleele, na miri mpasi mu kubaangula, bukuri beenu lwayeki na lunzingu mu kubakula misamu.

Beenu nkani lwayeki bayikisi na kidzika, kasi beenu, kubweese kusaka ti nkani muutu kaluyikisa misamu, nkati mya mbandukulu mya maampu ma Nzaambi, na lweki mu kiteesu kya kutya beene, nkani ka byandya byakuba ko.
Mukwongo, mpisi wunde wakiri mu kwenwa beene, lo wakiri kuyaaba pe kusobokoso maampu ma nsungumunu, bukuri nde wakiri mwaa-mwaana wansoombo.
Ngo byandya byakuba bya baatu babuuka, bo bari mu nsalulu yaaku bayeki bayaaba kusobokoso mamabwe na mamabi.

Hango-nkuumbu, yaa tubeenee munu mu nyikusulu dzatete dza mu Kiristo ko, ngo tusakeenu nyikusulu dza baatu babuuka. Yaa tutuungee lufulu lukimi ko, mu kubweese kuyiinga madyeele, mu kusiisa biyiriki byafwa, na mu kusa kanyi mu Nzaambi;
nyikusulu mu mitariri mbotokulu, ntetukulu myooko, mfulukulu ya bafwa, mutsuundu wa manunu.
Mimyo beetu tuyirika, mbuti heki Nzaambi heeri miswa.
Mukwongo, baatu bari, bamwaataambula buungi, bamwaabiimba kikabu kya ku yulu, bamwaataambula Mpeeve Yangisi,
bamwaamono luwu lwa maampu ma mamabweete ma Nzaambi, na bamwaayaaba mpinu dza nsi yikwiisa,
ngo babwiiri, lo diri dya mpasi kuri bo mu kubweese kuyiinga madyeele. Mu didyo, mu bo-meene lo babweese kukomono Mwaana Nzaambi, na kuha nzila mu kumutuka.
Mukwongo, butoto bubaanaa bunokono mamvula mu ntaangu ngo ntaangu, lo bumenisaa bitiiti biri mufunu kuri bahati ba manseke. Butoto bubwo butaambulaa lusakumunu lwaandi kuri Nzaambi.
Ngo mbuti bwo kubuta mpaanga na minkangi, lo bwahele na mufunu, na hasii hantele lo buri kunsa mpopi, na manunu kubuyoko mbaawu.
Ngo banduku ba mutima, ti bukuri turi mu kudzoonsolo bubwo, beetu tuyirikiri kuyaaba mu mitariri beenu, ti luri mu kiteesu kibvuriri bubwete, na lwakwaata mvuukulu.
Mukwongo, Nzaambi wahele na bubayi, mu kudzimbikina kisalu kyeenu, na ntiilu yi luri lwasoongo mu nkuumbu yaandi, bu lwasariri bangisi, na bu luri mu kunamitina kubasalila.
Beetu tutiiri ti mpisi muutu mu beenu, kasoongo kifiki kyokimosi, mu kutubula nsiitu mu kiteesu kyakuka, natee kumanunu,
mpisi luhele kuba bilyeebe, ngo luba basombisiri ba babo bari mu kanyi na nkindusulu-mutima, bataambula saala dya nsiilulu.
Mukwongo, Nzaambi kabaanaa wusa lusiilulu kuri Abalaami, bu kaba wahele na muutu wubvuriri bukuutu na nde wa kulaba, nde walaba mu nkuumbu ya nde-meene,
waleele ti: «Ngwanwa, kusakumuna, me nyikusakumuna, na kufunusa, me nyikufunusa.»
Mu bubwo, Abalaami, bu kakiindisa mutima, wataambulaa mi bamusiiriri nsiilulu.
Mukwongo, baatu babaanaa balaba maalu, lo mu nkuumbu ya wubvuriri bukuutu, mu kumana mpaka, na kutswiikisa maalu.
Mu didyo, Nzaambi bu kaba watya kusoongo na pwelelee, kuri bakoondiri ba lusiilulu, bitaasi byaandi biri byayiingaa ko, nde walaba maalu,
mpisi heki mu misamu myoolo miri myayiingaa ko, miri lo Nzaambi wahele kusa mpya, tutaambuleenu nsyamusunu dzalaka, mu kukwaata na keketee nsiitu dzi bari batutaasila;
dziri bunu kinko kya kidziingu kyeetu, kyakomono mu makwa na keketee, kyakaanga natee mu nsaanda Nzo-nzaambi ya ku yulu.
Mumwo mwatekisiri kukoto Yesu mu ntoono beetu, nde wayeki mukuutu bangaanga-nzaambi mu mantaangu momanso mu kiteesu kya Melekisedeke.
Mukwongo, Melekisedeke yimayi, waba mbyaasi Saleme, ngaanga-nzaambi ya Mwa-yulu; nde wayende mu kubwaana Abalaami, wanangukini ku mudziingu wu kabwiisiri bambyaasi, na wamusakumuna.

Abalaami, kuri nde kaheeri kikuuku kyakuumi, mu byobinso bi kabakiri. Ngo mbuti mu kubaangula nkuumbu Melekisedeke, lo dyatete nde «mbyaasi ya nsungumunu» tumi se mbyaasi Saleme, haho lo ti «mbyaasi ya kiyeengi.»
Nde wahele na taayi, wahele na nguri, wahele na muloongo kinkaaka, wahele na mbandukulu biluumbu, wahele na manunu kidziingu, wafwanikina na Mwaana Nzaambi, nde ngaanga-nzaambi mu mantaangu momanso.
Monee buri bunene bwa wunde wuri, Abalaami, nkaaka, kaholaa wumuheeri kikuuku kyakuumi, mu bibvuriri bubwete bi kabakiri.
Baala ba Levi bo se, bataambula kisalu, bari na ntumunu mu kuyisila kikuuku kyakuumi kuri baatu, bunu buri mangisi, haho lo ti, kuri bampaangi ba bo-meene, bari bo se bapalila mu Abalaami.
Melekisedeke, wuri waba wahele mu muloongo kinkaaka kya bo, wataambula kikuuku kyakuumi kuri Abalaami, na wasakumuna wunde wataamburi nsiilulu.
Ngo, kwahele nkalikisi, wa mukuutu koosakumunaa wa kilesi.
Hamaha, kikuuku kyakuumi, baatu bari lo bafwiiri bakookitaambulaa, ngo kunii muutu wu bari baleele ti wuri mwooyo.
Lo tutsiitsiri kuleele ti, ku kimbisa kya Abalaami, Levi mutaamburi kikuuku kyakuumi, nde se waheeri kikuuku kyakuumi.
Mukwongo, nde waba wakiri mu mwooyo Abalaami nkaaka, mu ntaangu ya ba kweemubwaana Melekisedeke.

Ngo mbuti nyirimunu yakuka yaba kubakila mu kisalu kya bungaanga bwa Nzaambi mu baala ba Levi, bunu buloombolo mangisi ma baatu, lo nkya mufunu baketi kumono, mu kuba na kisari kikimi mu kiteesu kya Melekisedeke, nkani ka mu kiteesu mu kya Aaloni ko wu bari basoolo?
Mukwongo, kisalu kya bungaanga bwa Nzaambi kiyiingana, lo mangisi se mayelemini kuyiinga.
Bukuri wunde wu bari mu kudzoonsolo mu misamu mimami, wa mu kitsuumbu kikimi, kyahele na muutu wasariri kisalu kya dziku.
Mukwongo, diri dyayabakana ti Mfumu yeetu wapalila mu Yuda, kitsuumbu, kiri Moose kasii leele musamu ti mosi ko, mu mitariri bangaanga-nzaambi.
Didyo dyamonoko na pwelelee, habaanaa ngaanga-nzaambi yikimi, yiri bunu Melekisedeke, yitelemini.
Nde wuri lo weki ngaanga-nzaambi, ngo kari bunu buri ntumunu dza mangisi ma kimuutu ko, kasi bunu buri mpinu dza kidziingu kyahele manunu.
Bukuri diri dyaleele ti:
«Ye wuri ngaanga-zaambi mu mantaangu momanso,
mu kiteesu kya Melekisedeke.»
Mukwongo, lutumu lwalukulu lwayeki lwayisulu, bukuri lwaba lwahele na makwa, na lwahele mufunu.
Bukuri mangisi mahele kunata kitotolo ti kimosi, ku nyirimunu yakuka, ngo beetu twakoto mu nsiitu yibvuriri bubwete, mu yo beetu tukokisilaa kuri Nzaambi.
Mimyo myayirimini mu ndabulu maalu, ngo kasi bakaka bayeki bangaanga-nzaambi, kwahele kulaba maalu.
Ngo nde wayeki ngaanga-nzaambi mu ndabulu maalu ma wunde waleeriri kuri nde ti:
«Mfumu wayeki walaba,
kabweese kuyiinga bitsimi ko:
Ye wuri ngaanga-nzaambi mu mantaangu momanso.»
Mu kiteesu kikyo, Yesu wayeki mutamuni lulelusunu lubvuriri bubwete.
Ngo bakaka bamaba, bari balaka mu kuba bangaanga-nzaambi, bukuri lufwa lukoobakabukisa mu kunamitina kisalu.
Ngo nde bukuri wanamitina kuba mwooyo mu mantaangu momanso, wuri na kingaanga-nzaambi kiri kyawaanaa ko.
Hango-nkuumbu, nde wakuka mu kubvuukisa kwa kinkulu, babo bakookokosolaa mu nde kuri Nzaambi, bukuri nde wuri mwooyo mu mantaangu momanso, mu kusaambila mu bo.
Mukwongo, kuri beetu mukuutu bangaanga-nzaambi waba wayelemene ngo wabubwo. Nde wangisi, wahele na mamabi, wahele na masumu, wahaambuka na bangaa-masumu, na bamunaakisa ku nkati yulu.

Nde wahele na nzala kusa busaanaa bakuutu ba bangaanga-nzaambi bakaka, mu kudzusa bibulu bya kuha mu kikabu mpisi kiluumbu, dyatete mu masumu ma nde-meene, tumi mu ma baatu. Bukuri mimyo nde wayirikiri mbala mosi, bu kaheeri nyutu ya nde-meene.

Mukwongo, mangisi mabyaalisaa baatu bari na buyonsi, mu kuba bakuutu ba bangaanga-nzaambi; ngo kasi maampu ma ndabulu maalu mayisa ha mambisa ma mangisi, mabyaalisa Mwaana, watubuka mu nyirimunu yakuka, mu mantaangu momanso.
Musamu wubvuriri mufunu, mu mi turi mu kuleele, ngo wumawu: beetu turi na mukuutu bangaanga-nzaambi wa bubwo, wadzakala ha lubakala lwa mboloko ya bumbyaasi mu mayulu.
Kisari mu nzo yangisi na mu musaampu wangwanwa, watuungu kuri Mfumu, nkani ka kuri muutu ko.
Mukwongo, mpisi mukuutu bangaanga-nzaambi, bamubyaalisaa mu kuhaanaa bikabu na kudzusaa bibulu byaha mu kikabu; haho hari mufunu kuri nde se mu kuba na kitotolo, ki kaha.
Mbuti nde waba ha butoto, nkani kaketi kuba ngaanga-nzaambi ko, bukuri kuri bakimi bakoohaanaa bikabu bunu buri mangisi.

Bo bakoosalaa kisalu, mu kusombosolo kifwaani kya bitotolo bya ku yulu, bunu bwaba yaabisa Nzaambi kuri Moose, mu kutuunga musaampu. Nde wamuleele ti: «Yirika myominso, bunu buri kifwaani kya ma bakusoongiri ku yulu mulaandu.»
Kasi mu lumalu, nde wabaka kisalu kyasoboko, kibvuriri mufunu, bukuri nde wuri munkabu-kati wa lulelusunu lubvuriri bubwete, lu basiiriri nsiilulu dzibvuriri bubwete.
Mukwongo, mbuti lulelusunu lwatete lulwo, lwaba lwahele na mya maseembu, nkani baketi kusaka lwadzoolo ko.
Ngo mu kubaŋaŋina, nde wabaleele ti:
«Monee, biluumbu biri mu kukwiisa, bu leele Mfumu,
me sa nyasa lulelusunu lwamoono
na nzo Isaheli na ya Yuda.
Lwo lubweese kuba bunu buri lulelusunu,
lu nyasiiri na bataayi ba bo ko,
mu kiluumbu ki nyabakweeti mu kooko,
mu kubapalisa mu nsi ya Ngipiti.
Me nyabayekiri, bukuri bo-meene,
basii namitina kuba mu lulelusunu lwaami ko,
bu leele Mfumu.
Lulelusunu lu nyisa me na nzo ya Isaheli,
luri bumabu:
ha mambisa ma biluumbu bibyo,
bu leele Mfumu:
me sa nyabaha mangisi maami,
me sa nyamatina mu mitima mya bo:
me sa mba Nzaambi bo
na bo sa baba baatu baami.
Ka kuba muutu ti mosi ko,
wuyikisa mbaasi yi bari nsi mosi,
bunu mpe wuleele kuri mpaangi yaandi ti: yaaba Mfumu!
Mukwongo, bobanso sa bayaaba me,
kuholosono bilesi natee bakuutu mu bo,
bukuri me sa nyahemesene lumvuki lwa bo,
na ka nyibweese kubaambukila mwooyo mu masumu ma bo ko.»
Habaanaa wudzoonsolo mu lulelusunu lwamoono, lo nde sii kuri ti lwatete luba lwalukulu; ngo bibyo byeki byabikulu na byanuna, byeki bele mu kudziimbila.
Lulelusunu lwatete lwaba na mikele mya lusaambulu, na nzo yangisi ya ha butoto.
Mukwongo, mu musaampu watete wu batelimisi, wu baba leelaana ti nzo yangisi, mwaba kitetukulu kya mwiinda, taabala, na mampa maha mu kikabu.
Ku mbisa nsaanda yamoolo, kwaba kihekiri ki baba teelaana ti kibeendu kyangisi na ngisi.

Mumwo mwaba dziku dya woolo, di baba yokilaana mananaasi, na sanduku dya lulelusunu dyalata woolo mpele na mpele, munsa dyo mwaba kisa kya woolo kyaba na maana, mwaba se luboto lwa Aaloni, lwaba na bifulu, na matari ma lulelusunu.
Ha yulu sanduku haba bakeluba ba biteki bya nkeembu, basa mposi ha kibeendu ki bayiitulaa makila ma ndoombulu mpemisi mu masumu. Kwahele kwaandi mufunu mu kunonono mutatu.
Bitotolo bibyo byaba byasuusa mumwo, na bangaanga-nzaambi, mu mpisi ntaangu, baba kotaana mu musaampu watete, mu kusa kisalu kyaaku.
Mu musaampu wamyoolo, wunu mukuutu bangaanga-nzaambi, waba kotaana mbala mosi mu mubvu, na makila ma kuha kikabu mu ntoono lumvuki lwa nde-meene, na lwa baatu.
Mpeeve Yangisi yaba soongaana bubwo ti, nzila ya nzo yangisi yakiri kudzibula pe, bukuri musaampu watete waba wakiri wateleme.
Yiyo nkuma mu ntaangu ya lumalu, yisoongo ti bikabu, na bibulu byadzusu mu kikabu, byahele kukuka mu kunata mu nyirimunu yakuka, mu nsimunu yaandi, muutu wunde wukoosaambilaa.
