Mimyo mini mikele mya kimuutu, mu mitariri byandya, bya kunwa na nswaakulu nyutu ya bitsuumbu-bitsuumbu, mi bari baha mya kubvumina natee mu ntaangu ya nyiingulu misamu.

Kasi Kiristo wayisa bunu mukuutu bangaanga-nzaambi, mu bitotolo byabibwete byeki haaka. Nde wakoto mu musaampu wubvuriri bunene, na wubvuriri kuyirima, wahele kuyirima mu myooko mya baatu, haho lo ti wahele kuba wa biyiriki bya nsi yimayi.
Nde wakoto mbala mosi mu nzo yangisi, kari na makila ma bantaba na ma bangoombo ko, ngo na makila ma nde-meene, mu kutamuna nkuululu yahele manunu.
Bukuri, mbuti makila ma bantaba, na ma bangoombo, na lufutu lwa mukasi ngoombo, lu bayitila ha yulu basumuka, lubahaanaa bungisi mu ntoono nsyemusunu ya muswiini,
lo makila ma Kiristo, waheeri nyutu yaandi yahele na kipfuumi, mu Mpeeve ya mantaangu momanso kuri Nzaambi, mabvuriri kutsyeemese nsimunu yeetu mu biyiriki byafwa, mu kusalila Nzaambi yamwooyo.

Mu didyo, nde kari munkabu-kati wa lulelusunu lwamoono, mpisi heki lufwa lwaandi, bu lwayisa mu kukuula baatu mu lumvuki lu basiiri, mu lulelusunu lwatete, babo bayuka mbila, bataambula Saala dya mantaangu momanso, di bari babasiila.
Bukuri haho hari misiku mya muutu mu masaala, diri mufunu mu kusoongo kuri ti muutu wunde wafwa.
Mukwongo, misiku mya muutu mu masaala ndaandu kuri muutu wunde weki wafwa, ngo habaanaa muutu wakiri mwooyo, lo miri ndaandu ko.
Mu didyo, lulelusunu lwatete, ka lwaketi kubaandika kwahele makila ko.

Moose, kamanaa kutaanga ntumu lumosi-lumosi, bunu buri mu mangisi, ha busu bwa bobanso, ha keki holaana makila ma baala ba bangoombo na ma bantaba, mu kusaanga na maampa, na kuholo kimpaala kya isopi kyakaanga myoosi mya bibulu myabeenge; tumi ha kanyaka mo ha yulu mukaanda mangisi, na ha yulu baatu bobanso,
na waleele ti: «Mamama ngo makila ma lulelusunu lwatuma Nzaambi mu beenu.»
Nde wanyaka se makila ha yulu musaampu na ha yulu bisalulu byobinso bya lusaambulu.
Byobinso mpaangi-pe biri byatsyeemusu mu makila, bunu bu loombolo mangisi, na ka kuri mpemisi ko, kwahele nsyamukunu makila.

Ngo mbuti bibyo byafwanikina na bitotolo bya ku yulu byatsyeemusu mu nzila yiyo, lo diri mufunu ti bitotolo bya ku yulu byo-meene, biba byatsyeemusu mu nzusulu bibulu bibvuriri bubwete byaha mu kikabu.

Mukwongo, Kiristo wahele kukoto mu manzo mangisi, matuungu mu myooko mya baatu, mari kini kifwaani kya nzo yangisi yangwanwa, ngo wakoto mu yulu dyo-meene, mu kumonokono lumalu ha busu bwa Nzaambi mu ntoono beetu.
Kari mu kuri ti kaha nyutu yaandi mbala dzalaka ko, bu koosaanaa mukuutu bangaanga-nzaambi wukotaa mu nzo yangisi Mpisi mubvu, na makila mahele kuba ma nde-meene.

Bukuri, lo nde keti kumonaa mpasi mbala dzalaka, kuholosono kwayirimini nsi. Ngo kasi mu lumalu, Kiristo wamonokono mbala mosi, ku manunu ntaangu, mu kuyaala masumu mu mpeelu nyutu ya nde-meene bunu kikabu.
Ngo bukuri dyadzeengu kuri ti, baatu bafwa mbala mosi kitsu, ha mambisa haho, mutsuundu wiisiri,
bunubwo se, Kiristo bamuha mu kikabu mbala mosi, mu kuyusula masumu ma fundu-fundu dya baatu, na kumonokono lwadzoolo kwahele masumu, kuri babo bamukiinga, mpisi kabaha mvuukulu.

Mangisi ma Moose mahele kusoongo bunu buri bitotolo, ngo kasi kini kifwaani kya bitotolo bikwiisa; na nzusulu bibulu byaha mu kikabu, mpisi mubvu, kwahele manunu, yahele kubangisina kunata ku nyirimunu yakuka, babo bakokosolaa kuri Nzaambi.
Mbuti babo basambukila mu kiteesu kikyo, bakotaambulaa nsyemukunu ya masumu mbala mosi, nkani lo bahele bweese kuba kunsa kibila mu nsimunu yaaku, na nkani bayeki bahoto kuha bikabu.
Ngo nzusulu bibulu byaha mu kikabu yiyo, yikoohaanaa mbambukulu mwooyo mu masumu, mpisi mubvu.
Bukuri kuri ti bele ko ti, makila ma bangoombo na ma bantaba mayusula masumu.
Hango-nkuumbu, bu kayisa ha nsi nde waleele:
«Ye wasii tya kuri ti bakudzusula kibulu na bakuha kikabu ko,
ngo kasi ye wampa nyutu.
Ye wasii mono kiminu ko,
mu nzusulu na nyokulu bibulu,
na mu bikabu mu ntoono masumu.
Ngo me nyaleele ti: "Ho! Nzaambi, mono, me nyiisiri,
mu kuyirika kutya kwa ye,
bunu bu diri dyatinu mu nkwaala mukaanda, mu ntoono me."»

Tekesele mamo nde waleele ti: «Ye wasii tya na wasii mono kiminu ko, mu nzusulu ya bibulu na mu bikabu, mu nyokulu bibulu na mu bikabu, mu ntoono masumu.» Bikabu bibyo babihaanaa bunu bu loombolo mangisi.
Hango nde wubweese kuleele ti: «Mono, me nyiisiri mu kuyirika kutya kwa ye.» Mu didyo, nde yisiri nsambukulu yatete na suusiri nsambukulu yamoolo.
Mu kutya kukwo, beetu turi twataambula bungisi, mu Yesu Kiristo waheeri nyutu yaandi bunu kikabu lwo lumosi.
Mpisi ngaanga-nzaambi wutelemaa mpisi kiluumbu mu kusa kisalu kyaandi, na mu kudzusa bibulu byaha mu kikabu mbala dzalaka, ngo byo byahele kubangisina kuyusula masumu.
Ngo kasi, nde bu kaheeri kikabu kya kudzusa mu ntoono masumu, wadzakala ha lubakala lwa Nzaambi kwakinkulu.
Mu lumalu, nde wuri mu kukiinga, natee ku basuusiri bataatu baandi, kuri baba nkata-miilu myaandi.
Mukwongo, mu kikabu kyokimosi, nde kari kanata ku nyirimunu yakuka kwakinkulu, babo ba kari kaha bungisi.
Mpeeve Yangisi se yiri mu kutuswikisila dyo. Nde wuleele ha mambisa haho ti:
«Lumalu ngo lulelusunu lu nyikaanga me beetu na bo,
ha mambisa ma biluumbu bibyo, bu leele Mfumu:
me sa nyabaha mangisi maami mu mitima,
na me sa nyamatina mu bitsimi bya bo.»
Na ti: «Me mbweese kubambukila mwooyo, mu masumu ma bo, na mu lumvuki lwa bo, ti mu mwaa-ntaangu mosi ko.»
Ngo haho hari mpemisi, lo babweese kuha kikabu mu ntoono masumu ko.
Hango bampaangi, beetuneenu turi na nsiitu ya kukoto mu nzo yangisi mu makila ma Yesu.
Nde watudzibukila nzila yamoono na yamwooyo, ha lumbisa lwa nsaanda yiri nyutu yaandi,
na turi na ngaanga-nzaambi yayinene, mu nzo ya Nzaambi.
Ngo hemese tukokosoleenu mu mutima wa mutsiina, na kanyi dyakuka, kuri mutima watsyeemese mu bitsimi byabibi, na nyutu yaswaaku mu maampa matsyeeme.
Hemese tukebeenu nsiitu yi turi mu kweyaabisa, kwahele mpololo-bito, bukuri wunde wasa lusiilulu wakwiikama.
Hemese tukebesenee manyutu beetu na beetu, mu kubaka nsyamusunu mu ntiilu na mu biyiriki byabibwete.
Yaa tuyekelee dibuundu dyeetu ko, buri kifu kya babamosi, ngo tusyaamisineenu beetu na beetu, bu tuyaari kuri ti kiluumbu kikokisiri.
Bukuri mbuti tunamitini mu kweyirika masumu, mu kutya kwa beetu-meene, ha mambisa ma kuyaaba ngwanwa, lo kusii nzusulu bibulu mu ntoono masumu ko,
ngo bisiiri lo kunu kukiinga mutsuundu wansisi na mbaawu ya makwa, mbasi-tsuku yiyoko bangaa-tungu.
Mpisi wusinina mangisi ma Moose, lo kusa kumudzusa kwahele kyaari, mbuti kuri baatu boolo bunu pe batatu, bata kimbaangi mu ma kayirikiri.
Heki lo buri beenu lutsima bubeele bunene bwa maseembu, ma baha kuri wunde wusaana Mwaana Nzaambi, wunyaafuna makila ma lulelusunu ma kari kabakala bungisi, na kutuka Mpeeve ya bweese?
Mukwongo, beetu tuyaari wunde waleele ti: «Me nyibvutula kitete, me nyiha museendu», na wabweese kuleele ti: «Mfumu sa katsuundisa baatu baandi.»
Diri dyansisi mu kubwa mu myooko mya Nzaambi yamwooyo.
Baambukeenu mwooyo mu biluumbu byatete, biri beenu lumanaa kutaambula buungi, beenu lwakuunda kikiindu kyakinene na kya mpasi.
Mu mantaangu mamosi, baba kwelutuka na kwelukwaamisa ha busu bwa baatu; mu mantaangu makaka beenu lwaba mu kibari kya babo ba baba yirikila ma bubwo.

Mukwongo, beenu lwakabula mpasi dza babo baba mu boroko, na beenu lwataambula mu kiminu, ti baluhosono na bitotolo byeenu, bu lwaba luyaari kuri ti luri na busina bubvuriri bubwete, na buri bwawaana ko.
Ngo yaa luyekele nsiitu yeenu ko, mu yo muri museendu wamunene.
Mukwongo, beenu luri na nzala kuba na kifiki, mu kukukisa kutya kwa Nzaambi, na kutaambula bi kari kasa lusiilulu.
Bukuri dyatinu ti:
«Hasiiri hantele, mwaa ntaangu yantele,
na wunde wukwiisa sa kiisa,
kadziingila ko.
Ngaa-kusuunguma waami sa kaba mwooyo mu kanyi,
ngo mbuti yekiri, lo muheebulu waami kamono kiminu mu nde ko.»
Beetu turi babo bakooyekelaa mu kudziimbila ko, ngo turi babo bari na kanyi mu kukala miheebulu myeetu.
Kanyi ngo nsiitu mu bitotolo bi bakookiingaa, bitotolo bya nsiitu, nkangumunu yangwanwa mu bitotolo bi bahele kumono.
Mu kanyi didyo, bari ba bateelele bankaaka kimbaangi.
Mu kanyi, beetu tukoobakalaa ti mansi mayirimini mu maampu ma Nzaambi, kuri lo bitotolo byamonokono, byayirimina mu bitotolo byahele kumonokono.

Mu kanyi, Abele kaheeri kuri Nzaambi kikabu kya kudzusa kibvuriri bubwete ti na kya Kayini. Mu kanyi didyo, nde bari bamuteelele kimbaangi ti nde wasuunguma, Nzaambi nde-meene wata kimbaangi mu bikabu byaandi. Mu kanyi didyo nde kakiri mu kwedzoonso ti bukuri wayeki wafwa.
Mu kanyi, Enoki bamunata ku yulu mpisi kahele kumono lufwa, na basii bweese kumumono ko, bukuri Nzaambi wamuneti, ngo tekesele bamunata, nde bamuteeriri kimbaangi ti wabweeye kuri Nzaambi.
Ngo mbuti kanyi dyo pe, lo kuri muutu wubweeye kuri Nzaambi ko; bukuri wunde wukokosolo kuri Nzaambi, yelemini kutaambula ti Nzaambi wuri, na nde koohaanaa museendu kuri babo bamusakaa.

Mu kanyi, Nowa wataambula ndubululu kuri Nzaambi, mu ntoono bitotolo byaba byakiri kumonokono pe, mu mutima wa kinzaambi nde watuunga nzo ya kiluungu, mu kubvuukisa nzo yaandi; mu kanyi nde kari kabwiisa nsi, na mu kanyi nde kayeki mukondiri saala dya nsungumunu.
Mu kanyi, Abalaami katumumini mu mbila yi kayukiri, mu kweende ku nsi yi kaba kayelemene kutaambula bunu saala, na wayende kwahele kuyaaba ku kaba kweende.
Mu kanyi, nde wayende kwedzakala ku nsi ya lusiilulu, buni ku nsi ya bunzeense, nde waba dzakalaana kunsa musaampu bunu ba Isaki na Yakobe, bari bakondiri ba saala dya lusiilulu lwo lumosi na nde.
Bukuri nde waba kiingaana bvula diri na lufulu lwamakwa, diri Nzaambi ngo muteesi na mutuungi.
Mu kanyi, Sara nde se, ti bukuri waba kisita na mibvu myaba myeki myaluta, nde wabangusini kusa busoombi, bukuri nde wamwiini ti wunde wasa nsiilulu wakwiikama.
Hango-nkuumbu, mu muutu mosi, wuri weki wayaaba lufwa, mwabutuka biseendu biri kufuna bunu bambwetete ku yulu, na bunu munyeenge mu simu dya mubu wuri bwa kutaangula pe.
Bobanso babo bafwiila mu kanyi, kwahele kutaambula bitotolo bya nsiilulu, ngo kasi, babitariri ku la na bamono kiminu mu byo, bo babakuri ti banzeense bari, na bidyeengi ha butoto.
Mu nzoonsulu dza bubwo, bo baba soongaa ti bakwesaka nsi.
Ngo mbuti baba kwetsimaana nsi yi basiisiri, nkani baketi kubaka ntaangu ya kubvutuka;

kasi mu lumalu, bo bari mu musoongo mu nsi yibvuriri bubwete, haho lo ti nsi ya ku yulu. Hango-nkuumbu, Nzaambi wahele na nsoni mu bo, kuri ti bamuteele Nzaambi bo, bukuri nde wayeki wabayirikila bvula.
Mu kanyi, Abalaami ba mutsiitsa, kari lo heeri mwaana mu kikabu, na nde waha Isaki, mwaana waandi ndemosi, bukuri wataamburi nsiilulu
mu nde dzileele ti: «Mu Isaki, ye wubaka baala.»
Nde waba na kitsimi ti, Nzaambi wakuka mu kufulukisa muutu wafwa, mu didyo nde kabweesiri kubaka mwaana waandi, bunu ti nkuma.
Mu kanyi, Isaki se wasakumuna Yakobe na Esawu, mu ntoono kidziingu kikwiisa.
Mu kanyi, Yakobe bu kaba mu kufwa, wasakumuna mosi mosi mu baala ba Yosefi, na nde watsukuma kuri wasikima mu nto luboto lwaandi.
Mu kanyi, Yosefi bu kaba weki ku nsukulu kidziingu kyaandi, wanzoonsolo mu mpalulu baala ba Isaheli, na waha ntumunu mu mitariri biyisi byaandi.
Mu kanyi, Moose kamana kubutuka, taayi na nguri bamusweekiri mu mangoondo matatu, bukuri bamwiini bubwe bwa mwaana, na basii ba na boomo ko mu musiku wa mbyaasi.
Mu kanyi, Moose kamana kubuuka, wabisiri bamuteele ti nde mwaana wa mwaana Falaho wa mukyeetu.
Nde wasooriri mu kumono mpasi kintwaari na baatu ba Nzaambi, ti na kukeembe mu masumu, mu mwaa-ntaangu yantele.
Nde wamwiini ti, kuba wasaanu bunu Kiristo, bubwo busina bubvuriri bunene ti na busina bwa ku Ngipiti. Bukuri nde waba talilaana museendu.
Mu kanyi, nde wasisa Ngipiti, kwahele kubata nkesi dza mbyaasi; bukuri nde waba wateleme na keketee, bunu muutu wuri mu kumono wunde wuri bamumonaa ko.
Mu kanyi, nde wayirika Paaka na nyakunu makila, mpisi heki mudzusi kahele kubelemene baala ba bo, babutuka batete.
Mu kanyi, bo basabukiri mubu wabeenge, bunu bakwedyaata ha butoto bwakana, kasi bari Ngipiti batsiitsaana kusabuka, bawii kudyaama mu maampa.
Mu kanyi, bibaka bya Yeriko byabwiiri, bamanaa kubidyengekele mu biluumbu nsaamu.
Mu kanyi, Lakabi ngaa-buyala, kasii fwa ko, kintwaari na bangaa-tungu, bukuri nde wataamburi bakoondolo ba mansweeki mu kiyeengi.
Nki nyibweese kuleele? Mukwongo, ntaangu yo pe mu kudzoonsolo mu myominso mitariri Ngedehoni, Baraki, Samsoni, Yefeta, Davidi, Samweli, na babikiri,
bo bari mu kanyi, babwiisa bimfumu, basalila nsungumunu, bataambula bi babasiiriri nsiilulu, bakaanga minwa mya bankosi,
badzimisa mambaawu mamakwa, babvuuka mu lufwa lwa mu saabala, babweese kubaka makwa ha mambisa ma buyonsi, basoongo bunkanyi mu mudziingu, bayitikisa mikaangu mya bayongolo mya banzeense.
Bakyeetu babweese kutaambula mfulukulu baatu baaku baba bafwa.
Bakaka babanyonyo manyutu, ngo babisiri kuri ti babakuula, mpisi babaka mfulukulu yibvuriri bubwete.
Bakimi, bamono mpasi dza munsiku na dza nkwaasulu, natee se na dza mu bikonyi na dza mu boroko;

babamosi babadzusula mu matari, babatabala mu kwaasa, bafwiila mu saabala, bani babakweyimaana kuri balwaata mikaanda mya bimeeme bunu pe mya bantaba, kwahele kuba na kitotolo, kuri babakwaamisa na bababamisa.
Nsi yaba yahele kuyelemene mu bo, babakweyimaana mu mansi mankatu, mu milaandu, mu mantari na miduku.
Bobanso babateeriri kimbaangi kya kyakibweete, mu ntoono kanyi dyaaku, kwahele kutaambula bi babasiiriri lusiilulu.
Nzaambi waba wataasila kitotolo kibvuriri bubwete, mpisi heki bo bahele kutubuka mu nyirimunu yakuka kwahele beetu.
Mu didyo, beetuneenu se, bukuri bambaangi balaka batudyengekele, tuloosee mpisi kilemu na masumu mahele na mpasi mu kutunzungukila, na tudzumunee ntiinu mu kifiki, mu kiteesu ki bari batutakala.

Tusyeetulee kisoosi kuri Yesu, mubaandiki na mukukisi kanyi, nde wuri, ha kibeendu kya kiminu ki bamusoongiri, wakuunda mpasi dza kuruwa, bu ka nyaafuna nsoni, na wadzakala ha lubakala lwa Nzaambi na lwa mboloko yaandi.
Beenee na bitsimi mu wunde wakuunda nwanusunu dza bangaa-masumu, mpisi luhele kuholo-bito, na bitsimi byeenu bihele kubvutuka mambisa.
Beenu lwakiri kutanda mpe mu kunwaanisa masumu, natee mu kiteesu kya makila.
Beenu lwadzimikini nsyamusunu dzi bari baluha bunu ti kuri baala:
«Mwaana waami, yaa nyaafunaa nseembulu dzi kuseembele Mfumu ko,
na yaa holo-bito ko mbuti nde wukuŋaŋana.
Mukwongo, Mfumu kooseembaana wu katiiri,
nde wulataa mpisi mwaana wu Kakootaambulaa.»
Mu nsungukulu ya beenu-meene, beenu luri mu kwekuunda mpasi, Nzaambi wuhololo beenu buni baala baandi. Mukwongo, nkya mwaana wuri taayi kamuseembaa ko?
Mbuti beenu bakooluseembaa bunu bu baseembelaa baala bobanso ko, lo beenu luri baala bangwanwa ko, ngo baala bari taayi wahele kubayaaba.
Beetuneenu twaba na bataayi ba muswinyi, baba kwetuseembaana, na twaba babvuminaana; ngo dyaburi tuhele kubvula kutumuma kuri Taayi dya mampeeve, mpisi tuba mwooyo?
Bo baba kwetuseembaana mu mwaa-ntaangu yantele, bunu bu baba kwemwiinaa bo, ngo kasi Nzaambi kutuseembe mu ndaandu ya beetu-meene, mu kuri ti katuha bungisi.
Mpisi nseembulu hatete dzikoomonokaa bunu ntoono ya kiminu ko, ngo bunu ya ngebe, kasi ku mankula dzikoobutaa kimbutu kya kiyeengi na kya nsungumunu kuri babo bataamburi nyikusulu.
Hango-nkuumbu, kumisee myooko myeenu myahele makwa, na maboongo meenu makwetekete.
Suungukee manzila ma lukwedyaatila mu miilu myeenu, mpisi heki mubeeru kuulu kahele kusuumbuka ngo katsiinika.
Namitinee kwesa kiyeengi na bobanso, na kweba kunsa bungisi, buri, mbuti buheriri, lo kuri muutu ti mosi ko wumono Mfumu.
Seenee madyeele, mpisi muutu kahele kubisa bweese bwa Nzaambi, na kuhele kuba mwaansi wankari wumene mu kukotoso kisaangila, na kubiyisa baatu balaka.
Yaa kuba muutu ti mosi, wakiyala bunu pe, wahele kwebvumina bitotolo byangisi, bunu Esawu wayarikiri bukuutu bwaandi mu kilaambu kimosi.

Mukwongo, beenu luyaari ti, ha mambisa haho, nde bu katiiri kutaambula lusakumunu bunu saala, bamuwuungula. Nde kasii baka mpwaani ti mosi ko, ya kuyiinga kitsimi kya taayi, ti bukuri wasaka lusakumunu lulwo mu mansangasa.
Beenu lwasii kokosolo bebele na kitotolo, kiri lo bakikweeti ko, kiri mu kuya mbaawu, kunsa butsuku na mampimbisi, na kiteembu kya makwa,
na mbeembu ya mvumvuri, na lusuku lwa makwa lwa bitoolo kuri babo baba yukaana, bayingukila kuri bahele bweese kubaleele ntoono ti mosi ha yulu haho.
Bukuri baba bahele kubangisina kukuunda lutumu lumalu: «Mpisi wubelemene mulaandu, ti hayuka kibulu, lo kumudzusila mu matari.»
Mi bamwiini myaba mibvuriri nsiisi, na Moose waleele ti: «Me nyiri na kinkuukulu na nyiri mu kutekete.»
Ngo kasi beenu lwakokosiri bebele na mulaandu wa Syoni, na bvula dya Nzaambi ya mwooyo, Yerusalemi dya ku yulu, na mafuunda ma bambasi makutukina mu munkeembu,
bebele na dibuundu dya babutuka batete, batinuma ku mayulu, na Nzaambi mutsuundisi wa bobanso, na biluunsi bya basuunguma batubuka ku nyirimunu,
bebele na Yesu munkabu-kati wa lulelusunu lwamoono, na makila ma nyakunu mabvuriri kudzoonso kwakubwe, ti na makila ma Abele.

Seenee madyeele, mu kuhele kubisa kuyuka wunde wudzoonso. Bukuri mbuti, babo babisiri kuyukula wunde waba balubulaana ha butoto, basii bvuuka mu nseembulu ko, lo beetuneenu se, tubvuuka mu nseembulu ko, mbuti tubisiri kuywiila wunde wudzoonso ku mayulu.
Mu ntaangu yayikulu, mbeembu yaandi yatembisiri butoto; ngo mu lumalu nde wasa lusiilulu, wuleele ti: «Me sa nyabweese kuteembese lukimi, kari bunu butoto ko ngo na yulu se.»
Ntoono yiri ti: «Nde wubweese kuteembese lukimi», yisoongo kuri ti, bitotolo bi bayirikiri sa byanyingina na kukituka, mpisi heki bibyo biri byanyingina ko binamitina kuba.
Ngo bukuri sa twataambula kimfumu kiri kyaningina ko; tubvutulee matoondo na tusalilee Nzaambi bwayelemene, kunsa kinzaambi na mu kibvumi.
Mukwongo, Nzaambi yeetu, nde mbaawu yikoonyengisaa.
Hemese ntiilu ya kimpaangi yinamitina kuba.
Yaa ludzimikina ntambukulu banzeense ko, bukuri mu yo, baatu babamosi bataamburi bambasi kwahele kuyaaba.
Tsiminee bari mu boroko, bunu ti beenu se luri kintwaari na bo mu boroko, tsiminee babo ba bakwekwaamisa, bunu ti beenu se luri nyutu mosi na bo.
Hemese makweele maba makiinsa kuri bobanso, na mbuka ya makweele yaa yiba yasumunu ko, bukuri Nzaambi sa katsuundisa biyala na bangaa-kimpala.
Ndyaatulu yeenu, yaa yiba yatwaalusu mu ntiki-mboongo ko, monee kiminu mu bini bi luri na byo. Bukuri nde-meene Nzaambi waleele ti: «Me nyikupatila ko, me nyikuyekele ko.»
Mu didyo, beetu turi na nsiitu mu kuleele ti:
«Mfumu ngo mubakisi waami,
me nyiba na boomo ko;
muutu lo nki kasa me?»
Tsiminee babo bakwelutwaalisa, bo baluyaabisa maampu ma Nzaambi. Monee bwaba nsukulu kidziingu kya bo, na namee kifwaani kya kanyi dya bo.
Yesu Kiristo wuri bwobumosi dzoono, lumalu na na mu mantaangu momanso.

Yaa lutala ko ti, baluwumuna mu nyikusulu dza bitsuumbu-bitsuumbu dzanzeense. Bukuri buri bwabubwete, ti mutima kaba wasyaamusu mu bweese, nkani ka mu mangisi ma byandya, mari babo bakoomabvuminaa, babakilaa mo ndaandu ko.
Beetuneenu turi na dziku, diri bisari bya musaampu, byahele na miswa mu kudiila byandya haho.
Mukuutu bangaanga-nzaambi koonataa makila ma bibulu mu nzo yangisi, mu ntoono mpemusunu masumu, ngo byo-meene bibulu kubiyokolo ku mbisa bula.
Mu didyo se Yesu, mu kuri ti kaha bungisi kuri baatu mu makila ma nde-meene, nde wamono mpasi ku mbisa bvula.
Hango, tupaleenu ku mbisa bula mu kwemubwaana, na kutaambula kuri ti tuba basaanu bunu nde.
Bukuri ka turi na bula bwakinkulu ko, ngo turi mu kwesaka bula bwa ntaangu yikwiisa.
Mu nde, tuhenee kikabu kya ndumusu ya mpisi ntaangu kuri Nzaambi, haho lo ti, mikuunga misiika nkuumbu yaandi.
Yaa ludzimikina nyirikulu mamabwe ko, na kwebakisina beenu na beenu, bukuri Nzaambi wumonaa kiminu mu bikabu bya bubwo.

Beenee na bintambukulu kuri babo bakwelutwaalisa, na beenee batumuma kuri bo. Mukwongo, bo bakwekebe miheebulu mya beenu, bukuri bo sa batambikisa mabuungu. Seenee bubwo mpisi bo besala kisalu mu kiminu, nkani ka mu kwekuuma ko, bukuri babaa bakwekuuma, lo mimyo myahele ndaandu kuri beenu.
Saambileenu mu beetu. Mukwongo, beetu tuyirikiri kuyaaba ti turi na nsimunu yayibwete, mu nzala kuba na ndyaatulu yayibwete mu myominso.
Me nyiluyingukila kwalaka ti saambileenu, mpisi heki me mwasula na kubvutuka kuri beenu.
Hemese Nzaambi ya kiyeengi, wafulukisi mu bafwa Mfumu yeetu Yesu, mutari wamunene, mu ntoono makila ma lulelusunu lwa na mu mantaangu momanso,
kaluha makwa ma kuyirika myominso myamibwete, mu kukukisa kutya kwaandi, kayirika mu beetu mamo mamabwete, ha busu bwa Yesu Kiristo, kuri nde kuba nkeembu mu bibvu ngo bibvu. Amene!
Bampaangi, me nyiluloombo ti kuundeenu maampu mamama ma nsyamusunu, bukuri mwaa-myantele me nyiri na myo mya kulutinina.
Yaabee ti mpaangi yeetu Timoteho bamupalisiri mu boroko, mbuti wasiri na kwiisa kuri me, lo sa twiisa beetu na nde mu kulumono.
Heenee mamboto kuri batwaalisi beenu bobanso, na kuri bangisi bobanso. Bampaangi bari Italya ba luheekiri mboto.
Bweese buba na beenu-banso!
Me Yakobo, nkutu Nzaambi na ya Mfumu Yesu Kiristo, kuri makaanda kuumi na moolo matsamukina mu mansi, mboto yeenu!
Bampaangi baami, lubaanaa lukotiri mu nsindukulu dza bitsuumbu-bitsuumbu, lo monee kiminu kyalaka,
bu luyaari ti, nsiitsulu ya kanyi dyeenu yibutaa kifiki.
Kifiki kiyelemini kusala kisalu kyakuka, mpisi beenu luba na nyirimunu yayibwete, na luba bakuka kuri luhele kuhelele kitotolo ti kimosi.
Ngo mbuti muutu mu beenu wahele na madyeele, lo kaloombo kuri Nzaambi, wuhaanaa kuri bobanso kwa mungengi, na kwahele biŋaŋunu, na sa kamuha mo.
Ngo kasi, kaloombo mu kanyi kwahele kuketekese, bukuri wunde wuketekesaana wafwanikina na mupaku maampa wa mubu, waningusu na wanaangunu mu kiteembu.
Mukwongo, muutu wa bubwo, lo yaa katsima kwaandi ko ti, lo taamburi kitotolo kuri Mfumu.
Wunde muutu ngaa-maketi-keti, wukwewunga mu manzila maandi momanso.
Hemese mpaangi ya muwelu, kaba na kimweese bu bamudzaangisiri,
ngo kasi wa kisina kaba na kimweese bu bamukuriri, bukuri nde sa kaluta bunu kifulu kya kitiiti.
Mukwongo, ntaangu yipariri na mwiini wamakwa, yikanisini kitiiti, kifulu kyaandi kisonokini na bubwete bubeeri na kifulu buwiiri. Bwobumosi se wa kisina sa kakuuka kunsa bisalu byaandi.
Muutu wukuunda nsindukulu wuri mu lwambwe, bukuri bu bameeni kumutsiitsa, nde sa kataambula lukoongolo lwa bumwooyo lwataambukila Nzaambi kuri bamutyaanaa.
Muutu wukotiri mu nsindukulu, yaa kaleele ko ti: "Nzaambi wuri mu kunsidukula"; bukuri Nzaambi ka katsiitsa kuba wasindukulu mu mamabi ko; na nde-meene ka kasindukulaa muutu ko.
Ngo mpisi muutu wubaanaa wasindukulu mu nyiimunu dza nde-meene, dzimukokaana na dzimukoondaana;
tumi nyiimunu dziyelaana, dzibutiri masumu, na masumu mayelaana, mabutiri lufwa.
Bampaangi baami ba mutima, yaa luhumuka kweenu ko.
Mpisi kikabu kyakibwete, na mpisi kimbwanga kyayirima, lo kya ku yulu, kifumunaa kuri taayi dya buungi, kuri nde kwahele nsobokoso na mposi yayiinga kibeendu ko.
Mu kutya kwaandi, nde watubuta mu maampu ma ngwanwa, mu kuba bunu mintekesele mu biyiriki byaandi.
Yaabee dyo bampaangi baami ba mutima ti, mpisi muutu yelemini kuba na malwangukila mu kuyuka, ngo wahele na mawasu mu kudzoonso na mu kubaka nkesi;
bukuri nkesi dza muutu dzikookukukisaa nsungumunu ya Nzaambi ko.
Hango-nkuumbu, bu lumwaalooso myominso myamviindu, na biyiriki bya mutima-bubi, taambuleenu mu kidzuunu maampu makunu mu beenu, makuka mu kubvuukisa miheebulu myeenu.
Beenee bakwesalila maampu, nkani ka bani bakwemayuka ko, bakwewunukuna bo-meene.
Bukuri, mbuti muutu wuyuka maampu, ngo wahele kumasalila, lo wa bubwo wafwanikina na muutu wukengisiri kidziri kya nde-meene mu lumweenye.
Mukwongo, nde bu kameeni kukengese nyutu yaandi, weensi, na hanaho dzimikini bunu bu kari.
Ngo wunde, wuyekamaa na wusaa kikuundi mu mangisi makuka ma bunsaalisi, kwahele kuba muyuki wuri na bunzimbu, ngo wukukisaa biyiriki, lo nde sa kaba mu lwambwe kunsa kisalu kyaandi.
Mbuti muutu wumono kuri ti nde munsaambiri, ngo wahele kubangisina kutwaalisa ludima lwaandi, na wukwewunukuna nde-meene, lo nsambukulu yaandi yiri ya mungengi.
Nsambukulu ya ngwanwa, na yahele nsumukunu ha busu bwa Taayi Nzaambi, ngo yimayi: kweyilimina bisaani na bafwiilila balumi, kunsa mpasi dzaaku, na kukebe nyutu yaandi mu nsumukunu dza nsi.
Bampaangi baami, yaa lusalila bubayi ko, mu kanyi di luri na dyo mu Yesu Kiristo, Mfumu yeetu ya nkeembu.
Mukwongo, mbuti muutu mosi, walwaata lungele lwa woolo, na binkuta bikweseme, kotiri mu nzo-nkutukunu yeenu, na wamuwelu se walwaata binkuta byamviindu kotiri,

ngo beenu lusyeetuka kuri walwaata binkuta bikweseme lumuleeriri ti: "Ye, dzakala ha kibeendu kyakibwe ki"; na kuri muwelu lumuleeriri ti: "Ye ngo wuri teleme hamaha, bunu pe dzakala ha nkata-miilu mya me ha".
Buri haho kari nsobokoso luri mu kusa mu beenu-meene ko? Na kari lweki batsuundisi bari na mfyongokunu yayibi ko?
Bampaangi baami ba mutima, yukeenu: Buri kari Nzaambi ko wasooriri bari bawelu mu mya nsi ngo bisina mu mitariri kanyi, na bakondiri ba Kimfumu ki kari kasa lusiilulu kuri babo bamutyaanaa?
Ngo kasi beenu lwasaanini muwelu. Buri kari bisina bakookwelubamisaana, na bakookwelunataana ha mbasi ya mutsuundu ko?
Buri kari bo bakwesaana nkuumbu yayibwe, yibari balutangukina ko?
Mbuti ngwanwa beenu lukukisaa ngisi ya kimfumu bunu buri Matinu: "Tya mbaasi yaaku bunu ye-meene", haho lo luyirikaa mamabwe.
Ngo mbuti beenu luri bangaa-bubayi, lo luyirika masumu, na lufwaanaa nsoni mu mitariri mangisi, bukuri lweki basinini ba mangisi.
Bukuri wunde wukebaa mangisi momanso, ngo bwiiri mu ntoono mosi, lo bakimini mu momanso.
Mukwongo, wunde waleele ti: "Yaa ta kimpala ko", waleele se ti: "Yaa dzusa ko". Ngo mbuti ye wahele kuta kimpala, kasi dzusiri, lo ye weki musinini mangisi.
Mu didyo, dzoonseenu na salileenu, bunu beenu luba batsuundusu, mu ngisi ya bunsaalisi.
Mukwongo, mutsuundu wahele na ngebe kuri wunde wahele na ngebe; ngo muutu ngaa-ngebe wahele na boomo bwa mutsuundu.
Bampaangi baami, mbuti muutu wuleele ti nde wuri na kanyi, ngo wahele na biyiriki, lo nkya ndaandu? Buri kanyi dya bubwo lo dimubvuukisiri?
Mbuti mpaangi mosi, bunu pe kibusi kimosi, bari mpene, na bahele na mbyandya bya mpisi-tsuku,
ngo mosi mu beenu wubaleeriri ti: "Yendeenu mu kiyeengi, lwateenu binkuta bya kyoosi, na yukuteenu", ngo kasi wahele kubaha biri mufunu mu nyutu, lo nkya ndaandu?
Bunubwo se buri mu kanyi, mbuti dyahele na biyiriki, lo dyafwa mu dyo-meene.
Ngo muutu habaanaa wuleele ti: "Ye wuri na kanyi, ngo me nyiri na biyiriki. Sa soongo me, kanyi dya ye kwahele biyiriki, na me nyikusoongo kanyi mu biyiriki bya me."
Ye wutaambula ti Nzaambi yomosi yiri, bwabubwe wuyirikaa; mampeeve mamabi se mataambula na matekitaa.
Dzeeke dya muutu! Yaaba kuri ti, kanyi dyahele na biyiriki, lo dyahele mufunu.
Buri Abalaami, taayi dyeetu, kari mu biyiriki kari kalulukusu, bu kaheeri mwaana waandi, Isaki, mu kikabu ha yulu dziku ko?
Wumono ti, kanyi dyaba salisinaa na biyiriki byaandi, na mu biyiriki, kanyi dyatubuka mu kiteesu kyakuka.
Matinu mayende mu mana: "Abalaami kasanaa kanyi mu Nzaambi, ngo bamwiini dyo ti wasuunguma, na bamuteele ti nduku Nzaambi".
Lumono ti muutu wuri walulukusu mu biyiriki, nkani ka munu mu kanyi kitsu ko.
Bunubwo se, Lakabi ngaa-buyala, mu biyiriki kari kalulukusu, bu kataamburi bantumu, na bu kabayitikisi mu nzila yikimi.
Mukwongo, bunu buri nyutu yahele na muwuumunu yiri yafwa, bunubwo se kanyi dyahele na biyiriki diri dyafwa.
Bampaangi baami, yaa luba balaka mu kweyikisa ko, yabeenu ti mutsuundu wa beetu bayikisi sa kabvulila makwa.
Mukwongo, beetu-banso turi mu kwebwa kwalaka. Mbuti muutu wahele kubwa mu nzoonsulu, lo wunde muutu wakuka, wubangisina kutwaalisa nyutu yaandi yoyinso.
Mbuti tukaangaana kisuunguki mu minwa mya makavaalu, lo mu kuri ti batumuma kuri beetu, na tutwaalisaa manyutu ma bo momanso.
Monee se mabwaatu, bwooso mabeele mu bunene, masindukulu mu biteembu bya makwa, lo mo mari matwaalusu mu mwaa kisuunguki kyantele, kunu kutiiri munati.
Bunubwo se, ludima mwaa-kinamu kyantele, ngo kikwebilika mu bitotolo byabinene.
Monee meti! Mwaa-mbaawu yantele yikooyokaa musitu bwooso kabeele mu bunene
Ludima se luri bunu mbaawu, nsi ya bubayi; ludima lwasuusu ha kakati dya binamu byeetu, lusumunaa nyutu yoyinso, na luyokaa kidziingu kyokinso, bu luri lwanamuku mu mbaawu lubila.
Mukwongo, mpisi kitsuumbu kya bibulu bya ku bitiiti, kya banoni, kya banyoko, na kya bibulu bya mu maampa, kyayukusu na kyayeki kyayukusu kuri kitsuumbu kya muutu;
Ngo ludima, kuri ti mosi mu baatu, wubangisina kuluyukusu ko, bubi buri bwakubwiisila pe, lwaluula mu misya midzusaana.
Mu lwo, tusakumunaa Mfumu wuri Taata; na mu lwo se tubulilaa baatu mampopi, bari mu kifwaani kya Nzaambi.
Mu munwa ndemosi mupala lusakumunu na mampopi. Bampaangi baami, bwahele kuyelemene ti buba bubwo.
Buri mu nto yomosi, lo mukeri palisiri maampa madzuuna na mankari?
Bampaangi baami, buri mungenge lo butiri mfilu, bunu pe mubviinya lo butiri ngenge? Pele, nto ya maampa ma mungwa, ka yitsiitsa kupalisa maampa madzuuna ko?
Nani mu beenu wuri ngaa-madyeele na wayika? Kasoongo dyo mu ndyaatulu yayibwete, na mu biyiriki byaandi bya kidzuunu na bya madyeele.
Ngo mbuti beenu luri na musoki wankari, na mpeeve ya nwanusunu mu mitima myeenu, lo yaa luba na masiiku ko, na yaa lwekitula ngwanwa mu mpya ko.
Madyeele ma bubwo, makoofumunaa ku yulu ko, ngo kasi ma nsi, ma kimuutu na ma mampeeve mamabi.
Mukwongo, haho hari musoki na nwanusunu, hanaho se hari kisaangila, na nsalulu yoyinso yayibi.
Ngo kasi madyeele ma ku yulu, hatete mari nkati matsyeemeke, tumi ma kiyeengi, madzuuna, matumuma, maluula mu ngebe na mu bimbutu byabibwete, mahele na munsoori na mahele na bumpitu-bumpyoongo.
Kimbutu kya nsungumunu kiri kyakunu mu kiyeengi, kuri babo basalila kiyeengi.
Kuri kukoofuminaa midziingu, na nwanusunu ha kakati dya beenu? Buri kari mu mantiilu meenu mamabi, makwenwaana munsa binamu byeenu ko?
Beenu lukwenyiima, na lwahele kubaka, lukwedzusa, lukwesa musoki, na kalutsiitsa kutaambula ko. Lukwenwaana na lukwesa midziingu, lwahele kubaka bukuri lwaloombaa ko.
Beenu lukweloombo na lwahele kutaambula, bukuri luloombaa kwakubi, mu nzala kuyukutisa mantiilu meenu.
Bangaa-kimpala! Buri beenu lwahele kuyaaba ti kinduku na nsi ngo kitaatu na Nzaambi? Mpisi wunde wutiiri kuba nduku nsi, lo kitukiri mutaatu Nzaambi.
Buri beenu lutsimini ti, kwa mungengi Matinu mari mu kuleele ti: "Nzaambi tiiri mu bukwa mpeeve yi kari kasuusa mu beetu"?
Nzaambi kootuhaanaa bweese bubvuriri bunene, hango-nkuumbu diri dyaleele ti: "Nzaambi wutungukilaa bangaa-masiiku, ngo kasi wuhaanaa bweese kuri bakuluka".
Ngo tumumee kuri Nzaambi, tungukilee dyabulu, na nde sa kayitika la na beenu.
Kokosolee kuri Nzaambi, na nde sa kakokosolo kuri beenu. Swaakee myooko myeenu, beenu bangaa-masumu. Tsyeemesee mitima myeenu, beenu bangaa-maketi-keti.
Beenee mu ngebe, kotee bufwiiri na dileenu. Biseyu byeenu bikituka bufwiiri na kiminu kyeenu kikituka ngebe.
Kulukeenu ha busu bwa Mfumu, na nde sa kaludzaangisa.

Bampaangi, yaa lwekelesene ko, wunde wusa makele mu mpaangi yaandi, bunu pe wutsuundisa mpaangi yaandi, lo wudzoonsolo bwabubi mu mangisi, na wutsuundisa mangisi; ngo mbuti ye wutsuundisa mangisi, lo ye wuri wukukisaa mangisi ko, ngo kasi mutsuundisi.
Mosi kitsu wuri mukaangi-mangisi na mutsuundisi, nde wakuka mu kubvuukisa na mu kufuukisa; ngo ye na wuri mu kutsuundisa mbaasi?
Haheki mu lumalu kuri bakweleele ti: «Lumalu bunu pe bweepari, beetu sa tweende ku bvula didyo, sa twadzakala kukwo mubvu mosi, sa twasa mumbungu, na sa twabaka ndaandu»;
beenu lwahele kuyaaba bubeele kidziingu kya beenu bweepari. Mukwongo, beenu luri bunu mubuungi wuri, kapalaa mu mwaa-ntaangu, ha mambisa haho dziimbiri.
Ha kibeendu kya kuleele ti: «Mbuti Mfumu tiiri, beetu sa twaba mwooyo, na sa twayirika mamama bunu pe mamo.»
Beenu mu lu, lukwesa kimweese mu masiiku meenu; mpisi kimweese kya bubwo lo kyakibi.
Ngo wunde wuyaari kuyirika mamabwe, kasi wahele kumayirika, lo mamo masumu kuri nde.
Haheki, mu lu kuri beenu bisina, dileenu, fulee misaakulu mu mpasi dzeenu dzi lubwilikila.
Busina bwa beenu bwasumuka, na binkuta byeenu byeki byadya kuri bansyelisi,
woolo na mboongo dzeenu byeki byabwilikila nkaa-nkaala, na nkaa-nkaala yiyo sa yalufuunda, na sa yayoko manyutu meenu bunu mbaawu. Beenu lwakutukisi busina mu biluumbu bya mpotulu.
Monee, mufutu bisari byatoriri manseke meenu, wu lwakweeti beenu, wuri mu kufula misaakulu, na nyayulu dza batori dzayukukuni mu makutu ma Mfumu ngaa-mikaangu.
Beenu lwaneti kidziingu kyaluwu ha butoto, na kidziingu mu lwambwe, lwadiisiri manyutu meenu mu kiluumbu kya nzusulu bibulu.
Beenu lwakesiri mukanu, lwadzusiri muutu wahele ntoono, wahele kulutuungukila.
Ngo bampaangi, kiinduseenu mitima, natee nyisulu Mfumu. Monee muhati-manseke, nde wukiingila bimbutu bya butoto bya ntalu, wukiindisaa mutima natee ku katoriri bimbutu bitekesele na bisyeelele.
Beenu se kiindusee mitima, kumisee mitima myeenu, bukuri nyisulu Mfumu yeki bebele.
Bampaangi, yaa lwesilisina minyoongi beenu na beenu ko, mpisi luhele kuba batsuundusu. Monee mutsuundisi telemini ha mweelu.
Bampaangi, holeenu kifwaani mu mpasi na mu nkindusulu-mutima ya babikiri badzoonsiri mu nkuumbu ya Mfumu.
Monee, beetu tuleelaa kuri babo bakuundaa mpasi, ti bari mu lwambwe. Beenu lwayukiri kifiki ka Yobi, na lwamwiini nsukulu yaba yitiiri Mfumu, ti Mfumu waluula mu bundeembu na wubakila ngebe.
Bampaangi baami, tekesele momanso, yaa lwelaba maalu ti mu yulu, ti mu butoto, ti mu maalu makimi ko. Ngo kuri beenu, heehe diba heehe, pele diba pele, mpisi luhele kubwa mu mutsuundu.
Muutu mu beenu kubama kari mu kubama? Kasaambila. Muutu mu kiminu kari? Kayimbila mikuunga.
Muutu mu beenu kubeele kari kabeele? Katumisa bakulu ba babakala ba dibuundu, mpisi bamusambikila, na bamukila maasi mu nkuumbu Mfumu.
Lusaambulu lwa kanyi sa lwabvuukisa mubeeru, na Mfumu sa kamutelemese; na mbuti beeri wayirika masumu, lo sa kataambula mpemisi.
Lomboseneenu mampemisi beenu na beenu, na sambisineenu beenu na beenu, mpisi lutaambula butsiina. Lusaambulu lwa muutu wasuunguma, luri na makwa malaka na lukoosalaa.
Eliya waba muutu wuri bitsimi bunu buri beetu. Nde wasaambila mu kukaandika bvula, na bvula yasii kunoko ha butoto ko, mu mibvu mitatu na mangoondo masaamunu.
Tumi, nde wabweese kusaambila, na yulu dyanokoso bvula, na butoto bwaha bimbutu byaandi.
Bampaangi baami, mbuti mosi mu beenu dziimbiri, na weki la na ngwanwa, na muutu wumubvuturi,
lo kayaaba ti: wunde wubvutula ngaa-masumu mu nzila yasuunguma, lo sa kabvuukisa muwuumunu nde mu lufwa, na sa kafuka fundu-fundu dya masumu.
Petelo, ntumu Yesu Kiristo, kuri babo basoolu, badzakala ku bunzeense, batsamukina mu mansi ma Ponto, Ngalatya, Kapadokya, Asya na Bitinya,
bunu buri nyaabulu yatekesele ya Taata Nzaambi, mu mpeelu bungisi ya Mpeeve, mu ntumumunu na nyakunu makila ma Yesu Kiristo.
Bweese na kiyeengi biba byafunusu kuri beenu!
Nzaambi, Taayi dya Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo kaba wasakumunu! Nde wuri, bunu buri bunene bwa ngebe dzaandi, watubuta mu mbutukulu yamoono, mu nsiitu dzamwooyo, mu mfulukulu ya Yesu Kiristo mu bafwa,
mu ntoono saala diri dyabiiyaa ko, dyabviimfukaa ko, na dyakitukaa ko, di bari balusweekele mu mayulu,
beenu luri lwakebu mu mpinu dza Nzaambi, mu kanyi, mu ntoono mvuukulu yayirima mu kuba yayabukusu mu ntaangu ya manunu.
Mu didyo, beenu luri mu kiminu, ti hayuku mu lumalu, beenu luyelemini kubama mu mwaa-ntaangu yantele, mu ntoono nsindukulu dza bitsuumbu-bitsuumbu,
Mpisi heki nsiitsulu ya kanyi dyeenu, yibvuriri ntalu, ti na woolo dyatsyeemese mu mbaawu kasi difuukaana, yibaka ndaandu ya nsiikulu, ya nkeembu na ya lukiinsu, mu ntaangu yiyabakana Yesu Kiristo.
Beenu lutiiri wunde wuri lwasii kumumono ko, na mu lumalu kwahele kumumono lwasa kanyi mu nde. Beenu luri mu kutirimuka mu kiminu kyahele bwa kuleelele, kya nkeembu,
mu kutaambula ndaandu ya kanyi, ngo mvuukulu ya miheebulu myeenu.
Babikiri basaka kuyaaba na bafyongokono musamu wa mvuukulu yiyo, na babikula mu ntoono bweese bwa beenu.

Bo bafyongokono mu kuyaaba, mu nkya ntaangu bunu pe mu nkya kiteesu, misamu myatekisiri kubayaabisa Mpeeve ya Kiristo miyirima. Misamu mimyo mitariri mpasi dza Kiristo, na munkeembu wukwiisa ha mambisa.

Babayaabisa kuri ti, dyaambu di baba kwesalilaana dyaba diri dya bo-meene ko, ngo dya beenu. Na mu lumalu bayikisi ba Musamu Wamubwete bamwaluyaabisa dyo, mu Mpeeve Yangisi yafumuna ku yulu. Bambasi se batiiri kuyaaba dyaambu didyo.
Hango-nkuumbu, beeneenu balubuka, beeneenu bari na ndiilu na nwiinu byayelemene, sileenu nsiitu dzodzinso mu bweese bu balutwalikila, mu ntaangu yimonokono Yesu Kiristo.
Bunu baala bari na bintambukulu, yaa lunama kifwaani kya nyiimunu dza ntaangu yayikulu ko, yi lwaba lwakiri kunsa lubu.
Ngo bunu buri wunde waluteele mbila, wuri wangisi, beenu se beenee bangisi mu ndyaatulu yeenu yoyinso.
Bukuri diri dyatinu ti: «Beenu sa lwaba bangisi, bukuri me nyiri wangisi.»

Na mbuti beenu luteelaa mu lusaambulu ti Taata, wunde wahele na kimpengeki, wutsuundisa muutu-muutu bunu buri biyiriki byaandi, lo dyaatileenu mu kibvumi, mu ntaangu ya kidziingu kyeenu mu nsi ya bunzeense yi,
bu luyaari kuri ti, kari mu bitotolo bifuukila ko, mboongo bunu pe woolo, beenu bari balukuula mu ndyaatulu yeenu yabuunu, yi luri lwakondolo kuri bataayi beenu,
ngo mu makila mantalu ma Kiristo, mari bunu ma mwaana kimeeme, kyahele na kipfuumi na kyahele na mpita.
Nde wayabakana tekesele nyirikulu nsi, na wamumonokoso mu ntaangu ya manunu mu ntoono beenu.
Mu nde, beenu lwasa kanyi mu Nzaambi, wamufulukisa mu bafwa, na wamuha nkeembu, kuri heki kanyi dyeenu, na nsiitu yeenu biba mu Nzaambi.
Beenu lwatsyeemese miheebulu myeenu mu kutumuma kuri ngwanwa, mu dyaambu dya ntiilu ya kimpaangi, yahele na bumpitu-bumpyoongo. Tilisineenu beenu na beenu kwalaka mu mutima watsyeemeke,
bu lwayeki lwabutuka mu mbutukulu yamoono, kari mu mumbutu wubolaa ko, ngo mu wuhelaa kubolo, mu maampu ma mwooyo ma Nzaambi mahelaa kusuka.
Bukuri
«Mpisi muutu wuri bunu kitiiti,
na nkeembu yaandi yoyinso
yiri bunu kifulu kya kitiiti,
kitiiti kikanaa, na kifulu kibwaanaa,
ngo kasi maampu ma Mfumu madziingulaa mu mantaangu momanso.»
Mamo ngo maampu ma bari baluyaabisa bunu Musamu Wamubwete.
Ngo looseenu momanso mamabi, momanso mamawunu, bumpitu-bumpyoongo, musoki, na makele.
Bunu mwaa-baala bansoombo, dilileenu beene dyadibwete, dya maampu ma Nzaambi, mpisi heki mu nde beenu lubuuka mu kubaka mvuukulu,
mbuti lwabiimbiri ti Mfumu wuri wa mubwete.
Kokosolee kuri nde, tari dyamwooyo dyaloosu kuri baatu, ngo kasi dyasoolu na dyantalu kuri Nzaambi,
na beenu-meene se, bunu matari mamwooyo, beene batuunguma mu nzo ya kimpeeve, mu kuyirika kingaanga kyangisi, mu kuha bikabu byayoku byakimpeeve, byataambulu kuri Nzaambi mu Yesu Kiristo.
Hango-nkuumbu, mu Matinu muri ti:
«Monee, me nyisuusa mu Syoni
tari dya ha kuumbu dyasoolu na dyantalu,
na mpisi wusiila kanyi mu dyo, lo kafwa nsoni ko.»
Hango, lukiinsu luba kuri beenu lwasa kanyi; ngo kasi kuri babo bahele kusa kanyi,
«Tari dyaloosiri batuungi,
dyeki dyanguri ha kuumbu.»
Na dyeki:
«Tari dya mbumukunu makya,
na dya mbwiilulu makubu.»
Bo bari mu kubuminaa makya mu dyo, bukuri bahele kusa kanyi mu maampu, na mu bubwo bari babataasila.

Ngo kasi beenu, luri kitsuumbu kyasoolu, kabu dya bangaanga-nzaambi ba mbyaasi, kaanda dyangisi, baatu babakama kuri Nzaambi, mu kweyaabisa mamabwe, ma wunde waluteele mbila, mu kupala mu mampimbisi na kukoto mu buungi bwaandi bwansisi.

Beenu bari, mu ntaangu yayikulu, lwasii ba mukaangu baatu ko, kasi mu lumalu beenu lweki mukaangu baatu ba Nzaambi. Mu ntaangu yayikulu, Nzaambi kasii kulumwiinina ngebe ko, kasi mu lumalu nde wulumonono ngebe.
Banduku ba mutima, me nyilusyaamisa bunu minzakikiri miri ku bunzeense, mu kukaanga mutima, mu kuhele kubwa mu nyiimunu dza muswinyi, dzikwenwaanisa muheebulu.

Beenee na ndyaatulu yayibwete ha kakati dya bangooyi, mpisi heki ti hayuku bakwelufutukila misamu, bunu bayiriki ba mamabi, lo bo bamono biyiriki byeenu byabibwe, na bakeembise Nzaambi mu kiluumbu ki kakwiisa kulumono.
Beenee batumuma kuri mpisi lutumu lwa baatu, mu ntoono Mfumu, ti hayuku kuri mbyaasi wubvuriri lutumu,
ti hayuku kuri batumi, bakari kaheeke mu kweseembe bayiriki ba mamabi, bunu pe mu kwesiika bayiriki ba mamabwe.
Bukuri kutya kwa Nzaambi bumabu kuri: mu nyirikulu mamabwe, beenu lukaanga minwa mya baatu ba madzeeke, bahele na nyaabulu.
Beenee bunu baatu bari na bunsaalisi, na bunsaalisi bubwo, yaa buba bunu nsaanda mu kwefuka bubi ko; ngo beenee bunu bankutu ba Nzaambi.
Kiinseenu baatu bobanso, tyeeneenu bampaangi ba luri mu dibuundu, bvuminee Nzaambi, kiinseenu mbyaasi.
Bisari bya mu nzo, biba byatumuma mu kibvumi kyokinso, kuri bamfumu baaku; kari kunu kuri bari na mutima wamubwete, na bari na bundeembu ko, ngo se na kuri bari mutima wamubi.
Bukuri bweese buri, mbuti mu ntoono kibvumi mu Nzaambi, muutu wukuundaa mpasi mu kubama kwahele kibila.
Mukwongo, nkya mvuumfu yiri, mbuti beenu lukuunda nseembulu, dza mamabi ma luyirikiri? Ngo mbuti luyirika mamabwe na lukuundiri mpasi, lo bubwo bweese ha busu bwa Nzaambi.
Mukwongo, mu bubwo bari baluteele mbila, bukuri Kiristo se wabamini mu ntoono beenu; nde walusisikila kifwaani, mpisi heki beenu lunama mu bitaambi byaandi.
Nde wuri kasii yirika masumu ko, na mu munwa waandi mwasii ba mawunu ko.
Nde bamutuka, ngo kasii bvutula kitari ko; wamono mpasi, ngo kasii ŋaŋa ko, kasi wayekiri nyutu kuri mutsuundisi wasuunguma.
Mu nyutu yaandi, nde wanata masumu meetu ha yulu muti, mpisi heki bu tufwiiri mu masumu, tuba mwooyo mu ntoono nsungumunu. Mu biwa byaandi beenu luri lwatsinukusu.
Mukwongo, beenu lwaba bunu bimeeme bikweyiima; ngo kasi mu lumalu, lumwaabvutuka kuri mutari na mukebi miheebulu myeenu.
Bwobumosi beenu bakasi, tumumeenu kuri balumi beenu, mpisi heki ti hayuku babamosi babisa kusiila kanyi mu maampu, baba babakama kwahele maampu, ngo mu ndyaatulu ya bakasi baaku,
bu bamono ndyaatulu yeenu ya bungisi kunsa kibvumi.
Monokunu yeenu ya ku mbasi yaa yiba mu: mfu dzahandu, bilebete bya woolo, bunu pe ndwaatulu binkuta byabibwe ko,
ngo bibyo byasweeku kunsa mutima muutu, biri byabiiya ko, bya mpeeve ya bundeembu, na ya kiyeengi, biri na ntalu yayinene ha busu bwa Nzaambi.
Mukwongo, bubwo mu ntaangu yayikulu, bakyeetu bangisi, baba na nsiitu mu Nzaambi, baba kwebweeyisaana manyutu maaku, mu kwetumuma kuri balumi baaku.
Bunu Sara, waba watumuma kuri Abalaami, wu kaba kweteelaana «Mfumu». Beenu lwayeki baala baandi ba bakyeetu, bu luyirikaa mamabwe, na bu luhelaa kuba na boomo mu kitotolo ti kimosi.

Balumi se bwobumosi, dzakaleenu mu kintwaari kunsa nyukusunu, bunu bu luyaabiri buyonsi bwa kitsuumbu kya bakyeetu. Bakiinseenu, bukuri bo se bari bakoondiri ba saala dya bweese bwa kidziingu. Yirikee bubwo, mpisi heki nsaambulu dzeenu dzihele kuba dzakakusulu.
Ha mambisa haho, yukusunee beenu-banso, kabusinee mpasi, tyeenee bampaangi, beenee bangaa-ngebe, beene bakuluka,
yaa lwebvutula mamabi mu mamabi ko, bunu pe kitari mu kitari ko. Ngo kasi yendee lwesakumuna, bukuri mu bubwo bari baluteele mbila, mpisi heki lutaambula lusakumunu ngo saala.
Mukwongo,
«Mpisi wutiiri kubaka kidziingu na kumono biluumbu bya kiminu,
lo kakebe ludima lwaandi mu mamabi,
na bibori byaandi mu kuhele kweleele mya mpya,
kalooso mamabi na kayirika mamabwete,
kesaka kiyeengi na kanamitina kusalila mu kyo.
Bukuri miisu mya Mfumu miri ha yulu basuunguma,
na makutu maandi maywiilaa nsaambulu dza bo;
kasi busu bwa Mfumu buri kitatu na babo bayirikaa mamabi.»
Na wuyirikila beenu mamabi, mbuti beenu luri bangaa-kuheme mu mamabwe?
Ngo ti hayuku, beenu lukotiri mu mpasi mu ntoono nsungumunu, lo beenu luri mu lwambwe. Yaa luba na boomo bwa bo ko, na mutima yaa kasa mambaawu ko.
Dumusee Kiristo Mfumu kunsa mitima myeenu. Beene bayirima mu mantaangu momanso, mu kukalila buungu, kuri mpisi wunde wulufuula, nsiitu dziri mu beenu,
ngo diba mu bundeembu, mu kibvumi, na mu bitsimi byabibwete, mpisi heki mu ntoono yi bari mu kulusaanina, babo balusaana bafwa nsoni, mu kumono mu ndyaatulu yeenu yayibwete mu Kiristo.
Mukwongo, bubvuriri bubwete, mbuti bubwo buri kutya kwa Nzaambi, mu kumono mpasi mu nyirikulu mamabwe, ti na kumono mpasi mu nyirikulu mamabi.
Bukuri Kiristo wamono mpasi, lwo lumosi mu masumu; nde wasuunguma wamono mpasi mu ntoono bahele kusuunguma, mpisi heki kalunata kuri Nzaambi. Nde bamudzusiri mu muswinyi, ngo Mpeeve yamufulukisi.
Mu bubwo se, nde kari kayende mu kuyikisa biluunsi byaba mu boroko,

byabisiri kusa kanyi mu ntaangu yayikulu, yaba namitinaa nkindusulu-mutima ya Nzaambi, mu biluumbu bya Nowa, bi kaba kwetuunga nzo ya kiluungu, munsa yo baatu bantele, miheebulu mpoomo myabvuukiri mu maampa.
Kikyo kyaba kifwaani kya mbotokulu, yilubvuukisa mu lumalu, mbotokulu yiyo yiri ya nswaakulu mviindu dza muswinyi ko, ngo ntambukulu Nzaambi mu kitsimi, mu nzila ya mfulukulu Yesu Kiristo,
nde wuri bu kayende ku yulu, wuri ha lubakala lwa Nzaambi. Bambasi, na baatu bari na lutumu na bari na mpinu, bari kunsa lutumu lwaandi.
Ngo Kiristo bu kamono mpasi mu muswinyi, beenu se holeenu kitsimi kya bubwo bunu kinwaanunu, ti muutu wu mwaamono mpasi mu muswinyi, mwaahoto kuyirika masumu,
mpisi heki beenu lunata kidziingu kya muswinyi, mu ntaangu yisiiri, bunu buri kutya kwa Nzaambi, nkani ka buri nyiimunu dza baatu ko.

Bukukiri! Bukuri mu ntaangu yaluta beenu lwayirikiri mi tiiri bangooyi, bu lwabee kwedyaatila kunsa buyala, nyiimunu, nkolulu malu, ndiilu na nwiinu bya mawaamba, na nsaambukulu-biteki yiri ntoono yayibi.
Mu didyo, bo bamono dyo dyankimukunu, ti beenu lwahele kubweese kweba kintwaari na bo, kunsa mawaamba ma buyala, ngo bari mu kwelusaana.
Bo sa batambikisa biyiriki byaaku, kuri wunde wayirima mu kutsuundisa bamwooyo na bafwa.
Mukwongo, mu bubwo, bari bayikisa Musamu Wamubwete kuri bafwa se, mpisi baba batsuundusu mu muswinyi bunu bu tiiriri baatu, na baba mwooyo mu Mpeeve bunu bu tiiriri Nzaambi.
Nsukulu bitotolo byobinso yeki bele. Ngo dyaatileenu mu madyeele, na beenee na ndiilu na nwiinu byayelemene, mu ntoono lusaambulu.
Tekeselee meti, kutilisina kwalaka beenu na beenu, bukuri "ntiilu yifuukaa fundu-fundu dya masumu".
Yendee lwetaambula bambaasi beenu na beenu, kwahele kwemunguta.
Mpisi muutu, bunu buri kikabu kikari kataambula, kasalila kyo mu ndaandu ya bobanso, bunu bakebi bababwete ba mabweese ma Nzaambi, ma bitsuumbu-bitsuumbu.

Mbuti muutu wudzoonso, lo kadzoonso bunu nde wutubula maampu ma Nzaambi; mbuti muutu wusala, lo kasalila mu makwa ma muha Nzaambi, mpisi heki mu momanso, Nzaambi kaba wakeembusu mu Yesu Kiristo, kuri nde kuri nkeembu na mpinu mu bibvu ngo bibvu! Amene.
Banduku ba mutima, yaa lukimuka ko, mu kuba kunsa nsindukulu dzamakwa dzi mwaalutubukula, bunu ti ntoono yanzeense.
Ngo bukuri beenu luri na kikuuku mu mpasi dza Kiristo, lo monee kiminu, mpisi heki mu ntaangu yiyabakana nkeembu yaandi, beenu lutirimika mu kiminu.
Mbuti bakwelutuka mu ntoono nkuumbu ya Kiristo, lo beenu luri mu lwambwe, bukuri Mpeeve ya nkeembu ya Nzaambi yiwuumaa ha yulu beenu.
Mukwongo, muutu ti mosi mu beenu, yaa kamono mpasi ko, bunu ti nde mudzusi kari, bunu pe ngaa-kwiibi, bunu pe muyiriki-mamabi, bunu pe ngaa-kintori.
Ngo mbuti nde mpasi kumono mu nkuumbu ya mukiristo, lo yaa kamono nsoni ko, ngo kakeembese Nzaambi mu nkuumbu yiyo.
Bukuri kimaki ngo kilookolo kya kubaandika mutsuundu mu nzo ya Nzaambi. Ngo mbuti bandukiri mu beetu, lo buri bubeele nsukulu ya babo, babisa kusa kanyi mu Musamu Wamubwete wa Nzaambi?
Heki,

mbuti wasuunguma kubvuukila ha wuri dya mukuungi,
1PE.4.18	lo buri bubeele mu muutu wahele na kinzaambi na mu ngaa-masumu?
Hango, babo se bamonaa mpasi bunu buri kutya kwa Nzaambi, bayekele miheebulu mya bo kuri Muyiriki wakwiikama, mu nyirikulu mamabwe.
Me nyisyaamisa bakulu ba babakala bari ha kakati dya beenu. Me se nyiri mukulu-bakala bunu bo, mbaangi mu mpasi dza Kiristo, na nyiri kintwaari mu nkeembu yiba yayabakana.

Buunguleenu mpuumbu ya Nzaambi yiri ha kakati dyeenu. Kebeenu yo mu bunkete, kari mu kukwiikisa ko, ngo mu mutima-bubwete bunu buri kutya kwa Nzaambi, kari mu kubaka mufutu mu bumpilikisi ko, ngo mu kuheme,
kari mu kuba bunu bamfumu, ha yulu babo balukwetwaalisa ko, ngo mu kuba kifwaani kyakibwete kuri mpuumbu.
Tumi ha monokono mukuutu batari, beenu lutaambula lukoongolo lwa nkeembu luri lwabiiya ko.

Bunubwo se, bituuti, beenee batumuma kuri bakulu ba babakala. Beenu-banso lwaateenu nkulukulu bunu musweele ha busu bwa bambaasi, bukuri: «Nzaambi wutungukilaa bangaa-masiiku, ngo kasi wuhaanaa bweese kuri bakuluka.»
Ngo kulukee kweenu kunsa koko kwa Nzaambi kwa mpinu, mpisi kaludzaangisa mu ntaangu yayelemene.
Mubwoongokileenu bitsimi byeenu byobinso bya mpasi, bukuri nde wuri na lusaambu mu beenu.
Beene bangaa-ndiilu na nwiinu byayelemene, beenee naana. Mutaatu weenu dyabulu, wuri mu kwedyengekele bunu nkosi yi kwewuma, yi kwesaka wu kamingutina.
Mutungukileenu na keketee mu kanyi, bu luyaari kuri ti bampaangi beenu se, bari mu kwekuunda mpasi dzodzimosi ha nsi.

Nzaambi ya mabweese momanso, waluteele mbila mu kukoto mu nkeembu yaandi yahele manunu mu Kiristo Yesu, bu lumwiini mpasi mu mwaa-ntaangu, sa kabweese kalutelemese nde-meene, sa kalukumisa, sa kaluha makwa na sa kalusa na keketee.
Kuri nde kuba mpinu mu bibvu ngo bibvu! Amene.

Mu lubakusu lwa Silvano, wu nyihololaa me bunu mpaangi yakwiikama, me nyilutinini mwaa-mukaanda wumawu, mu kulusyaamisa na mu kuta kimbaangi, ti bweese bwa Nzaambi bu luri lwasiila nsiitu buri bwangwanwa.
Dibuundu dyasoolu bunu beenu, diri ku Babiloni diluheekiri mboto. Malako se mwaana waami wuluheekiri mboto.
Beenu na beenu se helesenee mamboto mu nyumutunu ya ntiilu.
Kiyeengi kiba kuri beenu-banso luri mu Kiristo.
Simehoni Petelo, nkutu na ntumu Yesu Kiristo, kuri babo bataambula kanyi diri ntalu yo yimosi na dya beetu, mu nsungumunu ya Nzaambi yeetu, na ya Mubvuukisi Yesu Kiristo.
Bweese na kiyeengi biba byafunusu kuri beenu, mu nyaabulu yangwanwa ya Nzaambi, na ya Yesu Mfumu yeetu.
Mpinu dza kinzaambi kyaandi, dzatuha byobinso biri mufunu mu kidziingu na kinzaambi, mu nyaabulu ya ngwanwa ya wunde watuteele mbila, mu nkeembu yaandi na mu makwa maandi.
Mu byo bari bamusiila nsiilulu dzantalu na dzibvuriri bunene, mpisi heki mu dzo, beenu luba kintwaari mu nzelu ya kinzaambi, mu kubata nyiimunu dzadzibi dziri mu nsi.
Mu didyo, bvuleenu kusalila makwa momanso. Bweeseenu ha yulu kanyi dyeenu, nzelu yayibwete, ha yulu nzelu yayibwete, nyaabulu,
ha yulu nyaabulu, nkebulu nyutu, ha yulu nkebulu nyutu, kifiki, ha yulu kifiki, kinzaambi,
ha yulu kinzaambi, nzala-baatu, ha yulu nzala-baatu, ntiilu.
Mukwongo, lubaanaa luri na mamo, na mabuukila mu beenu, lo maluha bubolo ko, na malusa bisita ko, mu nyaabulu Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo;
ngo muutu wahele na mamo, lo wafwa miisu, bunu pe wahele kwemono biri ku la, wayeki wadzimbikina nsyemukunu mu masumu maandi mamakulu.
Hango-nkuumbu, bampaangi, bvuleenu kusalila makwa mu kukumisa mbila yi bari baluteele, na nsoolulu yibari balusoolo, bukuri lubaana luyirika mamo, lo luri mbwiilulu mu mamabi ko.
Mukwongo, mu bubwo, nkotulu mu Kimfumu kyahele manunu, kya Mfumu na Mubvuukisi weetu Yesu Kiristo, yiba yaha kuri beenu mu bunsaalisi.
Hango-nkuumbu, me nyelemini kwelubaambula mwooyo mu misamu mimyo mpisi ntaangu, ti bukuri lumiyaari kwaandi, na lwayeki lwakaangama mu ngwanwa ya lumalu.
Me nyitsima ti diri dyadibwete, ti me nyilubaambulaa mwooyo mpisi luba naana, mu ntaangu yoyinso yi nyakiri me mu musaampu wumawu,
bu nyaari ti ntaangu ya kuyekele musaampu waami yeki bebele, bunu bwa nsoongiri Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo.
Me sa nsalila makwa, mpisi heki, ha mambisa ma mfwiilu yaami, beenu lubambukilaa misamu mimyo mwooyo, mu mpisi mpwaani yi lubaka.
Mukwongo, kari mu kwenama bimpa byabalu mu madyeele ko, beetu turi twaluyaabisila mpinu na monokunu ya Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo, ngo beetu-meene, twaba bambaangi bamono mu miisu bunene bwaandi.
Mukwongo, nde wataamburi lukiinsu na nkeembu kuri Taata Nzaambi. Mbeembu yayukukuna kuri nde mu nkeembu yayinene ti: «Wumawu ngo mwaana waami wa mutima, mu nde me nyimonaa kiminu.»
Mbeembu yiyo, beetu twayiyuka yafumuna ku yulu, bu twaba na nde ha yulu mulaandu wangisi.

Na beetu turi na maampu ma mbikululu mabvuriri nsiitu. Beenu luri mu kuyirikaa bwabubwe mu kusa madyeele mu mo, bunu mu mwiinda wukoohaanaa buungi ha kibeendu kya mampimbisi, natee kukya bwiisi, na kupalila mbwetete ya kipari mu mitima myeenu.
Tekeseleenu kuyaaba dyo ti: mpisi mbikululu ya Matinu, ka yitsiitsa kuba yabaangulu bunu bu tiiriri muutu ko.
Mukwongo, mbikululu kari mu ntiilu ya baatu dziri dzayisa ko, ngo kasi mu ntwalusulu ya Mpeeve Yangisi, baatu bari badzoonsolo mu nkuumbu ya Nzaambi.

Kwaba babikiri bampya kunsa baatu, bunubwo se, sa kwaba bayikisi bampya, ha kakati dya beenu. Bo sa bakotoso mu madyeele nyikusulu dza nzimbusulu, na sa batuna Mfumu yabakuula, bo sa basakisa mfukusulu ya bo-meene na sisuu.
Baatu balaka sa babanama kunsa buyala bwaaku; na mu ntoono bo, nzila ya ngwanwa sa yaba yasaanu,
na mu ntiki-mboongo, mu dzoonsolo dza lupyelu bo sa babadiilila manene. Kuri bo kuholosono na kidzika, mutsuundu wuri mu kwesala, na mfukusulu yaaku yahele kubwa tolo.
Mukwongo, Nzaambi kasii wuungula bambasi basumukini ko, ngo wabakaangiri mu bikonyi, na wabatubiri ku lubila lwa mampimbisi, ku kari kabawuunguka mu ntoono mutsuundu.
Nsi yayikulu se nde kasii kuyiwuungula ko, ngo wabvuukisiri Nowa muutu wampoomo, muyaabisi nsungumunu, ha katweesi mbuukulu maampa mu nsi ya baatu bahele na kinzaambi.
Nde wakese mukanu wa mfukusulu kuri mabvula ma Sodoma na Ngomora, bu kamakitula lufuta, mu kusoongo kuri baatu bahele na kinzaambi kifwaani kya mamo makwiisa ku mankula.
Nde wabvuukisiri Loti ngaa-kusuunguma, waba kwebamaana mu ntoono ndyaatulu dza buyala, dza baatu bahele na mangisi.

Mukwongo, nde ngaa-kusuunguma, bu kaba kwedzakalaana ha kakati dya bo, mu kiluumbu ngo kiluumbu, nde waba kwebamaana mu muheebulu waandi wasuunguma, bu kaba kwemonaana na kweyukaana mamabi ma baba kweyirikaana.
Mamo masoongo ti, Mfumu yaari kukuula bangaa-kinzaambi mu mpasi, na kukebe bahele kusuunguma mpisi baba baseembu mu kiluumbu kya mutsuundu,
mbiki ti babo batiiri kweyukutisa muswinyi, mu nyiimunu dzasumuka, na bakwenyaafuna bumfumu.
Babo ngo bangaa-nzala-kubila, bangaa-masiiku, bahele na boomo mu kwesaana biluunsi bya nkeembu,
koomosoko na bambasi, babvuriri makwa na mpinu, bahele kuteesele biluunsi bya nkeembu bibyo nzoonsulu dza nsaanunu, ha busu bwa Mfumu.
Baatu babo bakwesaana bi badziimbiri, ngo bo se sa bafwa bunu bibulu byahele na madyeele, bi bayirikiri mu ntoono yiri ti, byekaangama mu myeete kuri babidzusa;

bo sa bataambula mamabi bunu mufutu wa mamabi. Bo bakwemono kiminu, mu kweyukitisa manzala ma muswinyi mwiini-ngeembe. Bo ngo mviindu na nsoni, bakwemono luwu mu mpya dzaaku, mu kweyirika minkeembu mya ndiilu kintwaari na beenu.
Miisu mya bo myaluula mu kimpala, na banamitina mu kweyirika masumu. Bakwekoondo baatu bahele kukwiikama, mitima mya bo myayuku mu ntiki-mboongo, bo ngo baala ba mpopi.
Bu bamana kusiisa nzila yasuunguma, bayeki bawumuka mu kwenama nzila ya Balaami mwaana Bosoro, watiiri mufutu wa mamabi.
Nde wataamburi biŋaŋunu mu ntoono kusinina kwa mangisi kwa nde-meene: mpuunda ya baba bu yapalisa mbeembu ya muutu, yahotoso bulawuku bwa mubikiri.
Baatu babo ngo manto mahele maampa, mibuungi mikweyende mu kiteembu, bari babawungukila mampimbisi ma bu bokoro.
Mukwongo, bakwedzoonso misamu myaminene myahele mufunu, bari mu kwekoondo mu nyiimunu dza muswinyi, mu buyala, babo babvuukila ha wuri dya mukuungi dya baatu bawumuka.
Bo bakwetaasila baatu bunsaalisi, buni bo-meene bankutu ba bifu byabibi. Bukuri, mpisi muutu wuri nkutu kuri bibyo bi kari katumuma.

Mukwongo, mbuti babaanaa bamwabvuuka mu nsumukunu dza nsi, mu ntoono nyaabulu ya Mfumu na Mubvuukisi weetu Yesu Kiristo, babweesiri kuba bakaangama lukimi mu nsumukunu dzidzo, na beki batumuma, lo kiteesu kya bo kisyeeriri, kyeki kibvuriri bubi ti na kyatete.
Mukwongo, bwaketi kubvulila bubwe kuri bo, mu kuhele kuyaaba nzila ya nsungumunu, ti na kuri bamanaa kuyiyaaba, bayekiri lutumu lwangisi, lu bari babatubukila.
Ma leele nkuma yangwanwa ma mwaa kubatubukila: «Mbwa yibweesiri kubvutukila biluku byaandi», na: «ngulu yibayoosiri, yibvutukiri ku tamba.»
Banduku ba mutima, wumawu ngo mukaanda wamyoolo, me nyiri mu kulutinina. Mu myo myoolo, me nyilubaambula mwooyo, mpisi nyilusyaamisa mu mitariri madyeele ma bukensekelee mari mu beenu,
na lubaambuka mwooyo mu maampu matekisiri kuyaabisa babikiri bangisi, na mu lutumu lwa bantumu beenu, lwa Mfumu na Mubvuukisi.
Tekeseleenu kuyaaba dimadi ti, mu biluumbu byansukulu, bangaa-munsiku sa biisa na munsiku waaku, sa bedyaatila bunu buri mantiilu ma bo-meene,
na kweleele ti: «Lusiilulu lwa nyisulu yaandi buri luri kuyirima pe? Mukwongo, kipilu kya fwiiri bakuutu, momanso mari bunu, bwaba mu mbandukulu nyirikulu bitotolo byobinso!»
Mukwongo, bo batiiri kudzimbikina dimadi ti: mayulu maba mu ntaangu yayikulu, na mu maampu ma Nzaambi, butoto bwayirimini mu maampa na maampa,
Mu bibyo se, nsi yayikulu yiri yadyaamina mu maampa na yiri yafuukusu.
Ngo mayulu na butoto bya lumalu, mu maampu momamosi, biri byawuunguku mu ntoono mbaawu, na byakebu mu kiluumbu kya mutsuundu, na kya mfukusulu baatu, bahele na kinzaambi.
Ngo banduku ba mutima, kuri ntoono mosi yiri beenu yaa luhele kuyiyaaba ko: kiluumbu kimosi kuri Mfumu, kiri bunu fuunda dya mibvu, na fuunda dya mibvu diri bunu kiluumbu kimosi.

Mfumu wahele kudziingila mu kukukisa nsiilulu dzaandi, bunu buri mu kwetsima babamosi ti wuri mu kudziingila; ngo nde wukiindisaa mutima mu beenu, bukuri katiiri ko ti babamosi bafuuka, ngo nde tiiri ti baatu bobanso biisa ku nyiingulu madyeele.

Kiluumbu kya Mfumu sa kiisa na sisuu bunu ngaa-kwiibi. Mu kiluumbu kikyo mayulu sa maluta mu kiyomo kya makwa. Bitotolo bikweluluka sa byasulumuka, na butoto na biyiriki biri mu bwo sa byaba byafuukusu.
Ngo mbuti heki bubwo, ti byobinso sa byasulumuka, lo nkya baatu, beenu luyelemini kuba mu ndyaatulu ya bungisi, na mu kinzaambi,
bu luri mu kwekiinga na kwebingukila nyisulu kiluumbu kya Nzaambi! Mu kiluumbu kikyo, mayulu makweluluka sa masulumuka, na bitotolo bikwehense mu mbaawu sa byanyengemuke.
Ngo beetu turi mu kwekiingila, bunu buri lusiilulu lwaandi, mayulu mamoono na butoto bwamoono, mumwo muba nsungumunu.
Hango-nkuumbu, banduku ba mutima, bu luri mu kwekiingila mamo, seenee makwa, mpisi nde kiisa kalutangusina mu kiyeengi, kuri lwahele na maka na mi baluseembele
Holuleenu nkindusulu-mutima ya Mfumu yeetu, bunu mvuukulu yeenu. Bunubwo se, mpaangi yeetu ya mutima, Pawulo, kari kalutinina, bunu buri madyeele ma bari bamuha.

Bunubwo se kari katina mu mikaanda myominso, mi kari mu kudzoonsolo mu mamama. Munsa mikaanda mimyo, misamu myamosi miri mpasi mu kubakula, na baatu bahele na madyeele, na bahele kukwiikama, bakwemikitula bunu bu basaana se mu Matinu makaka, mu kusakisa mfukusulu ya bo-meene.
Ngo beenu, banduku ba mutima, bu lumwaalubuka, seenee madyeele, mpisi heki luhele kuba bawumunu, mu nzimbusulu ya baatu bahele na mangisi, na luhele kubwa mu nsiitu ya beenu-meene.
Buukeenu kunsa bweese, na nyaabulu ya Mfumu na Mubvuukisi weetu Yesu Kiristo. Kuri nde, kuba nkeembu lumalu, natee mu kiluumbu kyahele mbandukulu na manunu! Amene.
Mamo maba munu mbandukulu, ma turi twayuka, ma turi twamono mu miisu myeetu, ma turi twakengese na ma turi twabelemene mu myooko myeetu, mu ntoono maampu ma kidziingu,
kidziingu kikyo kyamonikini, beetu twakimono, turi mu kuta kimbaangi, tuluyaabisa kidziingu kyahele manunu, kyaba kuri Taata na kyamonikini kuri beetu.
Mamo ma turi twamono, ma turi twayuka, tuyaabisa mo se kuri beenu, mpisi heki beenu se luba mu kintwaari na beetu. Ngo kintwaari kyeetu, kintwaari na Taata na Mwaana waandi Yesu Kiristo.
Beetu turi mu kutina mamama, mpisi heki kiminu kyeetu kiba kyakuka.
Wumawu ngo mukeensu wu turi twayuka kuri nde, na wu turi mu kuyaabisa kuri beenu: Nzaambi ngo buungi, na mu nde, mwahele mampimbisi ti mamosi.
Mbuti tuleelaa ti turi kintwaari na nde, ngo tudyaatila kunsa mampimbisi, lo tufuta mpya, na ka twasalilaa ngwanwa ko;
mbuti beetu tudyaatila kunsa buungi, lo turi mu kintwaari beetu na beetu, na makila ma Yesu, Mwaana waandi, matutsyeemisaa mu mpisi sumu.
Mbuti tuleeriri ti twahele na masumu, lo tuwunukunaa beetu-meene, na ngwanwa ka yiri mu beetu ko.
Mbuti tutambukilaa masumu meetu, lo nde wuri wakwiikama na wasuunguma, mu kutuhemesene masumu meetu, na mu kututsyeemese mu mpisi lumvuki.
Mbuti tuleelaa ti twahele na masumu, lo tusaanaa kuri ti Nzaambi kaba ngaa-mpya, na maampu maandi ka mari mu beetu ko.
Mwaa-baala baami, me nyilutinina mamama, mpisi luhele kubwa mu masumu. Ngo mbuti muutu bwiiri mu masumu, lo turi na Nkariri kuri Taata, ngo Kiristo Yesu, ngaa-kusuunguma.
Nde ngo kikori mu ntoono masumu meetu, kari munu mu masumu ma beetu ko, ngo se mu masumu ma nsi yansiina.
Mu dimadi beetu tubakulaa ti twayeki twamuyaaba, mbuti tukebaa ntumu dzaandi.
Mpisi wunde wuleelaa ti: «Me nyayeki nyamuyaaba», ngo wahele kukebe ntumu dzaandi, lo nde ngaa-mpya, na mu nde ngwanwa yo pe.
Wunde wukebaa maampu maandi, lo ngwanwa mu nde, ntiilu ya Nzaambi yayeki yakuka. Mu didyo, beetu tuyaabilaa ti turi mu nde.
Wunde wuleelaa ti wasa kikuundi mu nde, lo yelemini kudyaatila se, bunu bu kadyaatiri nde.
Banduku ba mutima, me nyahele kulutinina lutumu lwamoono; ngo kasi lutumu lwalukulu lu lwataamburi beenu, kuholosono kunu mbandukulu. Lutumu lwalukulu lulwo ngo maampu ma luri lwayuka.
Mukwongo, lutumu lwamoono me nyiri mu kulutinina; didyo diri dyangwanwa mu nde na mu beenu, bukuri mampimbisi mari mu kuluta, na buungi bwangwanwa bweki mu kuseme.
Wunde wuleelaa ti wuri kunsa buungi, ngo wubelaa mpaangi yaandi, lo natee lu nde wuri kunsa mampimbisi.
Wunde wutyaanaa mpaangi yaandi, lo wasa kikuundi kunsa buungi, na mu nde mpwaani ya kubwa mu masumu yo pe.
Wunde wubelaa mpaangi yaandi, lo wuri kunsa mampimbisi, wukwedyaatila kunsa mampimbisi, na wahele kuyaaba ku kakweyende, bukuri mampimbisi mamudzusa miisu.
Me nyitinina kuri beenu mwaa-baala, bukuri masumu ma beenu mayeki mahemusunu, mu ntoono nkuumbu yaandi.
Me nyitinina kuri beenu bataata, bukuri beenu lwayeki lwamuyaaba kuholosono kunu mbandukulu. Me nyitinina kuri beenu bituuti, bukuri beenu lwabwiisiri Ngaa-bubi.

Me nyatinini kuri beenu mwaa-baala, bukuri beenu lwayeki lwayaaba Taata. Me nyatinini kuri beenu bataata, bukuri beenu lwayeki lwamuyaaba kuholosono kunu mbandukulu. Me nyatinini kuri beenu bituuti bukuri beenu luri bangaa-makwa, na maampu ma Nzaambi masa kikuundi mu beenu, na beenu lwabwiisiri Ngaa-bubi.
Yaa lutya nsi ko, ti bitotolo biri mu nsi. Mbuti muutu tiiri nsi, lo kutya kwa Taata kwahele mu nde;
bukuri byobinso biri mu nsi, nyiimunu dza muswinyi, nyiimunu dza miisu na masiiku mu bya kidziingu, biri bya Taata ko, ngo kasi bya nsi.
Nsi yiri mu kuluta na nyiimunu dzaandi; ngo wunde wuyirikaa kutya kwa Nzaambi, lo wuri na kidziingu mantaangu momanso.

Mwaa-baala, ki ngo kilookolo kya mpotulu, bunu bu lwayukiri ti mutaatu Kiristo wuri mu kwiisa, mu lumalu bataatu ba Kiristo balaka bamwaakwiisa; mu didyo beetu tuyaari ti ki ngo kilookolo kya mpotulu.
Bo bapariri ha kakati dya beetu, ngo basii kuba ba beetu ko; bukuri mbuti ngo, baba ba beetu, nkani baketi kudzakala na beetu. Bo bapariri mpisi diba dyayabakana ti bobanso bari ba beetu ko.
Beenu lwataambula nkilulu kuri Wangisi, na beenu bobanso luyaari.
Me nyalutinini kari bukuri ti beenu lwahele kuyaaba ngwanwa ko, ngo bukuri beenu luyiyaari, na bukuri kuri mpya ti dzimosi ko, dzifumunaa kunsa ngwanwa.
Na wuri ngaa-mpya, mbuti ka wunde wutunaa ti Yesu kari Kiristo ko? Wunde ngo mutaatu Kiristo, wutunaa Taata na Mwaana.
Mpisi wunde wutunaa Mwaana, lo kari na Taata ko. Wutaambulaa Mwaana, lo wuri na Taata se.

Mamo ma lwayukiri kuholosono kunu mbandukulu, hemese masa kikuundi mu beenu. Mbuti mamo ma lwayukiri kuholosono kunu mbandukulu, masii kikuundi mu beenu, lo beenu se sa lwasa kikuundi mu Mwaana na mu Taata.
Na lu ngo lusiilulu lu kari kalusiila, kidziingu kya mantaangu momanso.
Me nyalutinini mamo mu dyaambu dya bakweludziimbisa.

Ngo beenu, nkilulu yi luri lwataambula kuri nde yasa kikuundi mu beenu, na lwahele na nzala kuri ti muutu kaluyikisa; kasi nkilulu yaandi yiri mu kuluyikisa mu momanso, na yiri yangwanwa, ka yiri yampya ko, bunu bu yiri mu kuluyikisa, seenee kikuundi mu nde.
Na mu lumalu, mwaa-baala, seenee kikuundi mu nde. Mpisi heki, mbuti nde monikini, lo tubeeneenu na nsiitu, na tuhelee kufwa nsoni la na nde, mu ntaangu ya nyisulu yaandi.
Mbuti beenu luyaari ti nde wasuunguma, lo yabee se ti mpisi wunde wusalilaa nsungumunu, lo wabutuka mu nde.
Monee nkya ntiilu Taata kari katutiila, mpisi heki batuteele baala ba Nzaambi, na turi se bo. Hango-nkuumbu, nsi yahele kutuyaaba, bukuri yahele kuyaaba nde.

Banduku ba mutima, mu lumalu turi baala ba Nzaambi, na bubwo mbasi-tsuku bu tubeenee bwakiri kumonokono pe. Tuyaari kuri ti: mbuti nde monokini, lo beetu sa twafwanikina na nde, bukuri sa twamumono bunu bu kari.
Mpisi wunde wuri na nsiitu dza bubwo mu Kiristo, lo wutsyeemikaa nde-meene, bunu bu kari katsyeemeke nde.
Mpisi wunde wuyirika masumu, lo wusininaa se mangisi, bukuri masumu ngo kusinina kwa mangisi.
Beenu luyaari kuri ti: Kiristo wamonikini mu kuyusula masumu, na mu nde mwahele masumu.
Mpisi wasa kikuundi mu nde, kayirikaa masumu ko; na mpisi wuyirikaa masumu, lo wakiri kumumono pe, na wakiri se kumuyaaba pe.
Mwaa-baala, muutu yaa kaludziimbisa ko. Wunde wusalilaa nsungumunu, lo wasuunguma bunu Kiristo wuri wasuunguma.
Wunde wuyirikaa masumu, lo wa dyabulu, bukuri kuholosono kunu mbandukulu dyabulu watobiri masumu. Mu dimadi Mwaana Nzaambi kamonikini, mpisi katsyaamuna biyiriki bya dyabulu.
Mpisi wunde wabutuka kuri Nzaambi kayirikaa masumu ko, bukuri mumbutu Nzaambi wasa kikuundi mu nde. Nde ka katsiitsa kuyirika masumu ko, bukuri wabutuka kuri Nzaambi.
Mu didyo, bayaabulaa baala ba Nzaambi, na baala ba dyabulu. Mpisi wunde wuhelaa kusalila nsungumunu kari wa Nzaambi ko; bunubwo se kuri wuhelaa kutya mpaangi yaandi.
Wumawu ngo mukeensu wu luri lwayuka kuholosono kunu mbandukulu: Twetilisineenu beetu na beetu.
Yaa tuba bunu Kayini ko, waba ngaa-bubi, na wadzusiri mpaangi yaandi. Heki mu nkya ntoono kamudzusiri? Bukuri biyiriki bya Kayini byaba byabibi, na bya mpaangi yaandi byaba byasuunguma.
Bampaangi, yaa lwekimuka ko, mbuti nsi yikwelubele.
Beetu tuyaari ti, twayeki twayisika mu lufwa mu kuluta mu bumwooyo, bukuri beetu tutyaanaa bampaangi. Wunde wahele kutya bampaangi, lo wafwa kwakinkulu.
Mpisi wunde wubelaa mpaangi yaandi, lo nde mudzusi, na beenu luyaa ti mpisi mudzusi, lo kidziingu kya mantaangu momanso kyahele kusa kikuundi mu nde.
Mu didyo, beetu twayeki twayaaba ntiilu, bukuri Kiristo waheeri kidziingu kyaandi mu ntoono beetu, na beetu se tuyelemini kuha kidziingu kyeetu mu ntoono bampaangi.
Mpisi wunde wuri na lubaku lwa nsi, na mwiini mpaangi yaandi watikila, ngo kaangiri mutima, lo dyaburi ntiilu ya Nzaambi yitsiitsa kuba mu nde?
Mwaa-baala, yaa twetiilee mu bini bibori ko; ngo twetiilee mu biyiriki na mu ngwanwa.
Mu dimadi, beetu sa twayaaba ti turi bangaa-ngwanwa, na ha busu bwaandi, sa twadzuunisa mitima myeetu.
Ngo mbuti mutima weetu wutubwiisa, Nzaambi bvuriri kudzaangama na mutima weetu, na nde yaari momanso.
Banduku ba mutima, mbuti mutima weetu wahele kutubwiisa, lo turi na nsiitu mu Nzaambi,
na mpisi ma tuloombo, tumataambula kuri nde, bukuri beetu tukebaa ntumu dzaandi, na tuyirikaa mamabwe ha busu bwaandi.
Lumalu ngo lutumu lwaandi: ti beetu tusa kanyi mu Mwaana waandi, Yesu Kiristo, na tutilisinee beetu na beetu, bunu bu kari katuha lutumu.
Wunde wukebaa ntumu dzaandi wasa kikuundi mu Nzaambi, na Nzaambi wasa kikuundi mu nde. Mu dimadi beetu tuyaabilaa ti, Nzaambi wasa kikuundi mu beetu, mu Mpeeve yi kari katuha.
Banduku ba mutima, yaa lwesiila kanyi mu mpisi mpeeve ko, ngo fyongokinee mampeeve, mbuti ma Nzaambi mari; bukuri babikiri bampya balaka bamwaakwiisa mu nsi.
Mu dimadi beenu luyaabula Mpeeve ya Nzaambi: mpisi mpeeve yitaambula ti Yesu Kiristo wayisa mu muswinyi, lo yiri ya Nzaambi;
na mpisi mpeeve yihele kutaambula Yesu, lo yiri ya Nzaambi ko; mpeeve yiyo ya mutaatu Kiristo, wu lwayukiri beenu ti wuri mu kwiisa, na mu lumalu weki mu nsi.
Mwaa-baala, beenu luri ba Nzaambi, na beenu lwabwiisiri babikiri bampya; bukuri wunde wuri mu beenu, bvuriri makwa na wunde wuri mu nsi.
Bo bari ba nsi; mu didyo, bakwedzoonsolo bunu buri nsi, na nsi yikwebaywiila.
Beetu turi baatu ba Nzaambi. Wunde wuyaari Nzaambi kootuywiila. Ngo wunde wuri kari wa Nzaambi ko, kakootuywiila ko. Mu didyo, beetu tuyaabilaa Mpeeve ya ngwanwa, na mpeeve ya mawunu.
Banduku ba mutima, tutilisinee beetu na beetu, bukuri ntiilu yiri ya Nzaambi. Mpisi wuri na ntiilu wabutuka kuri Nzaambi na yaari Nzaambi.
Wunde wahele na ntiilu, lo ka yaa Nzaambi ko, bukuri Nzaambi ngo ntiilu.
Bumabu ntiilu ya Nzaambi yiri yayabakana ha kakati dya beetu: nde waheeke Mwaana waandi ndemosi mu nsi, mpisi heki tuba mwooyo mu nde.
Ntiilu yiri bumabu: ka kuri ko ti beetu twatiiri Nzaambi, ngo kasi nde watutya, na waheeke Mwaana waandi, bunu kikori mu masumu meetu.
Banduku ba mutima, mbuti Nzaambi watutiila mu kiteesu kya bubwo, beetu se tuyelemini kwetilisina beetu na beetu.
Kuri muutu ko wumwaamono Nzaambi. Mbuti tutilisinaa beetu na beetu, lo Nzaambi wusanaa kikuundi mu beetu, na ntiilu yaandi mu beetu yayeki yakuka.
Beetu tuyaabilaa ti twasa kikuundi mu nde, na nde wasa kikuundi mu beetu, bukuri nde watuha Mpeeve yaandi.
Beetu twakengisiri na tuta kimbaangi ti Taata waheekiri Mwaana, bunu Mubvuukisi nsi.
Mpisi wunde wutaambula ti Yesu Mwaana Nzaambi, lo Nzaambi wasa kikuundi mu nde, na nde wasa kikuundi mu Nzaambi.
Beetu twayaaba, na twasa kanyi mu ntiilu yiri na Nzaambi mu beetu.
Nzaambi ngo ntiilu; mpisi wunde wasa kikuundi mu ntiilu, lo wasa kikuundi mu Nzaambi, na Nzaambi wasa kikuundi mu nde.
Mu didyo, ntiilu yiri yakuka ha kakati dya beetu, mpisi heki tubeeneenu na nsiitu mu kiluumbu kya mutsuundu, bukuri bunu bu kari nde, bunubwo se beetu turi mu nsi yimayi.
Boomo bwahele mu ntiilu; ngo kasi ntiilu yangwanwa yiyisilaa boomo, bukuri munsa boomo muri maseembu. Wunde wahele na boomo wayeki wakuka mu ntiilu.
Beetu tutyaanaa, bukuri nde watete watutiiri.
Mbuti muutu wuleele ti: «Me ntiiri Nzaambi», ngo wubelaa mpaangi yaandi, lo nde ngaa-mpya. Mukwongo, wunde wuhelaa kutya mpaangi yaandi yikamono, lo katsiitsa kutya Nzaambi ko, wu kahele kumono.
Lu ngo lutumu lu turi twataambula kuri nde: wunde wutya Nzaambi, lo katya se mpaangi yaandi.
Mpisi wunde wusa kanyi ti Yesu ngo Kiristo, lo nde wabutuka kuri Nzaambi, na mpisi wunde wutiiri mubuti, lo katya se wabutuka kuri nde.
Beetu tuyaaba ti tutiiri baala ba Nzaambi, mu ntaangu yi tukootyaanaa Nzaambi, na yi tusalilaa ntumu dzaandi.
Mukwongo, ntiilu ya Nzaambi yiri kuri ti, tukebee ntumu dzaandi; ngo ntumu dzaandi dzahele kuleme,
bukuri mpisi wabutuka kuri Nzaambi, lo waluuluka mu nsi, na ndulukulu ya kuluuluka mu nsi, ngo kanyi dyeetu.
Na waluuluka mu nsi, mbuti ka wunde wasiila kanyi, ti Yesu ngo Mwaana Nzaambi ko?
Yesu Kiristo ngo wunde wayisiri na maampa na makila, kari na mani maampa kitsu ko, ngo na maampa na makila; Mpeeve ngo muteeri kimbaangi, bukuri Mpeeve ngo ngwanwa.
Bambaangi batatu bari:
Mpeeve, maampa na makila, na bo batatu bari kintwaari mu kimbaangi kyokimosi.
Mbuti tutaambulaa kimbaangi kya baatu, lo kimbaangi kya Nzaambi kibvuriri bunene; bukuri kimaki ngo kimbaangi kya Nzaambi, ki kari kata mu Mwaana waandi.

Wunde wusiilaa kanyi mu Mwaana Nzaambi, wuri na kimbaangi mu nde-meene. Wunde wuhelaa kusiila kanyi mu Nzaambi, lo wusanaa kuri ti Nzaambi kaba ngaa-mpya, bukuri wahele kutaambula kimbaangi kya Nzaambi, ki kari kata mu Mwaana waandi.
Kimbaangi kikyo ngo ki: Nzaambi watuha kidziingu kya mantaangu momanso, na kidziingu kikyo kiri mu Mwaana waandi.
Wunde wuri na Mwaana, wuri na kidziingu; wunde wahele na Mwaana Nzaambi, wahele na kidziingu.
Me nyalutinini mamo mpisi luyaaba ti, beenu lusiila kanyi mu nkuumbu Mwaana Nzaambi, luri na kidziingu kya mantaangu momanso.
Dzimadzi ngo nsiitu dzi turi na dzo mu nde, mbuti tumuloombiri kitotolo, bunu buri kutya kwaandi, lo nde wutuywiilaana.
Na mbuti tuyaari ti nde wutuywiilaa, lo tuyaari se ti tutaambulaa bibyo bi tumuloombaa.

Mbuti muutu wumono mpaangi yaandi, wuyirika masumu mahele kunata ku lufwa, lo kaloombo, na Nzaambi sa kaha kidziingu kuri mpaangi yiyo, kuri babo bayirikaa masumu mahele kunata ku lufwa. Kuri sumu dinataa ku lufwa; ngo kari mu didyo ko me nyituma ti kasaambila.
Mpisi kuhele kwa nsungumunu masumu; ngo kuri masumu mahelaa kunata ku lufwa.
Tuyaari ti mpisi wabutuka kuri Nzaambi, lo kayirikaa masumu ko, bukuri Mwaana Nzaambi wumukebaa, na Ngaa-bubi kari mbelemene nde ko.
Tuyaari ti beetu turi baatu ba Nzaambi, na nsi yoyinso yiri kunsa bubi.

Ngo kasi tuyaari ti, Mwaana Nzaambi wayisa, na watuha madyeele mu kuyaaba Wangwanwa; na turi kunsa Wangwanwa, mu Mwaana waandi, Yesu Kiristo. Nde wuri Nzaambi yangwanwa, na kidziingu kya mantaangu momanso.
Mwaa-baala, seenee madyeele beenu-meene mu ntoono biteki.
Me Mukulu-bakala, kuri Mukyeetu wasoolu, na kuri baala baandi, ba nyiri nyatya mu ngwanwa. Ngo kari wunu me kitsu nyibatii ko, kasi bobanso se bamwaayaaba ngwanwa,
mu ntoono ngwanwa yasa kikuundi mu beetu, na sa yaba na beetu mu mantaangu momanso.
Hemese bweese, ngebe na kiyeengi bifumunaa kuri Taayi Nzaambi, na kuri Yesu Kiristo Mwaana wa Taayi, byeba na beetu, mu ngwanwa na mu ntiilu.
Me nyankeembiri kwalaka, bu nyamwiini ti baala baaku, bakwedyaatila mu ngwanwa, bunu buri lutumu lu turi twataambula kuri Taata.
Na mu lumalu di nyiloombo kuri ye, Mukyeetu, kari bunu ti lutumu lwamoono, me nyiri mu kutinina kuri ye ko, ngo luni lu turi twataambula, kuholosono munu mbandukulu ti, twetilisineenu beetu na beetu.
Ntiilu yiri kuri ti, twedyaatileenu bunu buri ntumu dzaandi. Lutumu lu luri lwataambula kuholosono munu mbandukulu, kuri ti beenu lwedyaatila mu nde.
Bawumuni balaka bamwaatsamukina mu nsi. Bo bahele kwetaambula ti Yesu Kiristo wayisa mu muswiini. Wunde ngo muwumuni, mutaatu-Kiristo.
Seenee madyeele beenu-meene, mpisi heki luhele kudziimbisa bi turi twasala, ngo lutaambula mufutu wakuka.
Mpisi wunde wuluta nyikusulu dza Kiristo, na wahele kusa kikuundi mu dzo, lo wahele na Nzaambi. Ngo wunde wasa kikuundi mu nyikusulu, lo wuri na Taata na Mwaana.
Mbuti muutu wiisiri kuri beenu, na wahele kutwaala nyikusulu dzidzo, lo yaa lumutaambula mu nzo yeenu ko, na yaa lumuha mboto ko.
Mukwongo, mpisi wunde wumuha mboto, lo wuri kintwaari mu biyiriki bya muutu wunde byabibi.

Mbee kwaandi na myalaka mya kulutinina, ngo me nsii tya kusalila kipapila na ntiinta ko, kasi nyiri na nsiitu mu kwiisa kuri beenu, na mu kudzoonsono kuri tutalisina mu miisu na miisu, mpisi heki kiminu kyeetu kiba kyakuka.
Baala ba kibusi kyaaku kyasoolu, bakuheekiri mboto.
Me Mukulu-bakala, kuri Ngayo nduku ya mutima, yi ntiiri mu ngwanwa.
Nduku ya mutima, me nyikutiisa ti ye baanguka mu myominso, na ba wamutsiina, bunu bwabaanguka se muheebulu waaku.
Mukwongo, me nyankeembiri kwalaka, mu bampaangi bayisiri na mu kimbaangi ki bateeri mu ye mu ngwanwa, kuri ti ye wukwedyaatila mu ngwanwa.
Kiminu kya me kibvuriri bunene, mu kuyuka ti baala ba me, ba kwedyaatila mu ngwanwa.
Nduku ya mutima, ye wuri mu kwesala mu nkwikumunu, mu ma wuri mu kweyirika mu bampaangi, na bunubwo se mu banzeense.
Bo bateeriri ye kimbaangi, ha busu bwa Dibuundu, mu ntiilu yi wuri na yo. Ye yelemini kubaha bi bari na nzala byo, mu budyeengi bwa bo, mu kiteesu kyayelemene mu Nzaambi.
Mukwongo, bo bayensikiri mu nkuumbu, kwahele kutaambula kitotolo ti kimosi kuri makaanda.
Mu didyo, beetu tuyelemini kutaambula ba bubwo, mpisi heki tuba bakwesala kintwaari mu ntoono ngwanwa.
Me nyatinini mwaa mantoono kuri dibuundu; ngo kasi Dyotelefe, wutiiri kweba watete mu bo, wahele kututaambula.

Hango-nkuumbu, mbuti me nyiisiri, lo sa nyamubaambula mwooyo, mu biyiriki byaandi, bi kari mu kweyirika: nzoonsulu dzadzibi, dzabudzeke mu beetu; kiminu bu kiheriri kukuka mu mamo, nde wubisa kutaambula bampaangi; na batiiri kwaaku kwetaambula bampaangi, nde wukwebakabukisa na wubapalisa mu dibuundu.
Nduku ya mutima, yaa wesombosolo mamabi ko; ngo sombosolo mamabwe. Wunde wusalilaa mamabwe wuri wa Nzaambi, na wunde wusalilaa mamabi, lo kamwii Nzaambi ko.
Baatu bobanso bateeriri Demeteryo kimbaangi kyakibwe. Ngwanwa yo-meene se yiri mu kumuteele kimbaangi. Beetu se tumuteele kimbaangi, na ye yaari ti kimbaangi kyeetu kyangwanwa.
Mbee kwaandi na myalaka mya kukutinina. Ngo nyahele kutya kusalila ntiinta na lusala.
Me nyiri na nsiitu, ti kidzika kyantele mbee nyikumwiini, na sa twadzoonsono kuri tutalisina mu miisu na miisu.
Hemese kiyeengi kiba na ye! Banduku bakuheekiri mboto. Ye se ha mboto kuri banduku, muutu-muutu mu nkuumbu yaandi.
Yuda, nkutu Yesu Kiristo, mpaangi Yakobo, kuri babo ba bari bateele mbila, batya mu Taayi Nzaambi, na ba bari bakebe mu Yesu Kiristo.
Hemese ngebe, kiyeengi na ntiilu bya Nzaambi, biba kuri beenu na fundu-fundu.

Banduku ba mutima, me mbeeri kwaandi na musoongo walaka mu kulutinina, mu dyaambu dya mvuukulu yeetu ya kintwaari, ngo mwiini mufunu mu kulutinina, mpisi nyilusyaamisa mu kunwaana mu ntoono kanyi, di bari bayakisa kwakinkulu kuri bangisi.

Mukwongo, baatu babamosi bayolomikini mu nsweeki, bari kuholosono na kidzika, batekesele kubatina mankuumbu mu mutsuundu wunde. Bo ngo bangooyi, bakwekitula bweese bwa Nzaambi yeetu mu buyala, na bakwetuna wunde wuri ndemosi Mutumi na Mfumu yeetu, Yesu Kiristo.
Me ntiiri kulubaambula mwooyo mu momanso ma luyaari ti, Mfumu kamanaa kubvuukisa lwo lumosi, kaanda ku nsi ya Ngipiti, ha lumbisa haho, nde wafuukisa bari basii kusa kanyi ko.
Bambasi bari basii kebe kibeendu kya bo-meene ko, ngo basisiri kikuundi kya bo-meene, nde wabawuunguka mu bikonyi bya bibvu ngo bibvu, kunsa mampimbisi, mu kiluumbu kyakinene kya mutsuundu.

Bunu buri Sodoma na Ngomora na mabvula ma badyengekele, masariri buyala bunu bo, mu kiteesu kyokimosi, na banemi bari na manyutu ma kinzeri kikimi, bo bari mu kifwaani kya baatu babwiilikila maseembu ma mbaawu ya mantaangu momanso.
Baatu bamaba se bwobumosi, bakwesa biwobiri, hamosi bakwesumuna manyutu, hakaka bakwenyaafuna lutumu, na bakwesaana bambasi bankeembu.
Ngo kasi, Mikaheli mbasi ya yikuutu, ha baba kalakanaa bo na dyabulu, mu kukaangina nyutu Moose, kasii tya kumuteesele mya nsaanunu ko, ngo nde bu kamuleeriri ti: "Mfumu kakuseembe!"
Ngo bamaba, hamosi bakwesaana myominso miri bahele kuyaaba, hakaka bakwefuuka mu myominso mi bakweyaabila mu kimuutu, bunu bibulu byahele na madyeele.
Kyaari kuri bo, bukuri banemi nzila ya Kayini, bo bayekimini mu mpumukunu ya Balaami mu ntoono mufutu, na bafuukiri kunsa tungu dya Kore.

Bamaba ngo bo, bangaa-kisaangila, kunsa ndiilu yeenu ya kimpaangi, bakwekeembe mu ndiilu ya mawaamba kwahele boomo, bakwebuungula manyutu ma bo-meene, bo ngo matuti mahele maampa, makweheembeke mu kiteembu, miti mya manunu ndoolo, myahele na bimbutu, myafwa mfwa dzoolo, myataabuka.
Bo ngo mipaku mya mubu mya kibakala, mitoombolaa fula dya nsoni dzaaku, bambwetete bakweyiima, ba bari bawungukila, mampimbisi ma bubokoro mu mantaangu momanso.
Mu bo, Enoki, wansaamu kubandikila mu Adami, kaba leele ti: «Mono, Mfumu wayisiri na fundu-fundu dya bangisi baandi,
mu kutsuundisa baatu bobanso, na kusa kuri ti babakula biyiriki byaaku bya bungooyi, mu ntoono misamu mikolo, mya muteesele bangooyi bangaa-masumu.»
Bo ngo bakwemunguta, bahele kumono kiminu mu kiteesu kyaaku, bakwedyaatila bunu buri nyiimunu dzaaku, na minwa mikwedzoonsolo mu masiiku, na bakwesiikila baatu mu ndaandu.
Ngo kasi, beenu banduku ba mutima, baambukee mwooyo, mu maampu matekisiri kuleele bantumu, ba Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo.
Bo baba leelaa kuri beenu ti: «Kumanunu ntaangu, sa kwaba bangaa-munsiku bakwedyaatila bunu buri nyiimunu dzaaku, dza bangooyi.»
Babo ngo bakwekotoso nkabunu, bakwedyaatila bunu bibulu, na bahele na Mpeeve.
Ngo beenu, banduku ba mutima, tuungumeenu beenu-mee ha yulu kanyi dyeenu dyangisi na ngisi, na saambileenu mu Mpeeve Yangisi.
Beenu-meene kebee manyutu kunsa ntiilu ya Nzaambi, bu luri mu kwekiingila ngebe dza Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo, mu kubaka kidziingu kyahele manunu.
